Pakuyamba Mulungu adalenga dzulu napants: Dziko likhanati lawumbiwa bwino-bwino, likhalibe chinthu. N'dima ukhadagwanila maboo, n'zimu wa Mulungu ukhafamba-famba padzulu pamadzi.
Mulungu adawona kuti kuwinika n'kwabwino. Adapatula kuwinika nan'dima.
Kuwinika, Mulungu adakuchemela kuti, “Masikati” N'dima nkuwuti “Usiku.” Usiku udapita machibese nkubwela, imweyi idawa ntsiku yakuyamba.
Mulungu adakonza chinthu, chakulekanisa madzi yapantsi namadzi yakudzulu.
Mulungu adachemela mbuto yapakatiyo kuti “Dzulu.” Usiku udapita machibese nkubwela, imweyi idawa ntsiku yachiwili.
Tsapano Mulungu adati, “Madzi yali pantsi padzulu ngayakochezane pambuto ibodzi, kuti pantsi pakuwuma pawoneke.” Bzidachita tenepo.
Mbuto yakuwumayo Mulungu adayipasa dzina lakuti “Dziko.” Madzi yadakochezana pabodzi adayachemela kuti “Nyanja.” Pamwepo Mulungu adawona kuti bzikhali bwino.
Mulungu adati, “Padziko lapantsi ngapamele bzakumela bzakusiyana-siyana, bzakumela bzin'chita mbewu nabzakumela bzim'bala michelo, bzentse kuteyeza mishowo yabzene.” Bzidachitika tenepo.
Padziko lapantsi padamela bzakumela bzakusiyana-siyana, bzim'bala michelo nabzakumela bzin'chita mbewu, bzentse kuteyeza mishowo yabzene. Pamwepo Mulungu adawona kuti bzikhali bwino.
Usiku udapita machibese nkubwela, imweyi idawa ntsiku yachitatu.
Mulungu adati, “Dzulu ngalikhale nachakuwinika kuti pawe nawusiku namasikati, pakhale nachilatizo chakuwonesa nyengo nantsiku nagole,
kuwinika kwadzululo kuwinikile pantsi.” Bzidachitika tenepo.
Mulungu adazakonza bzakuwinika bzikulu bziwili, chikulu chikhawinika masikati, ching'ono chikhawinika usiku, adakonza pomwe nyenyezi.
Mulungu adabziyikha mudzulu kuti bzimbawinika pantsi,
bzichitonga usiku namasikati, bzichipatula kuwinika nan'dima. Pamwepo Mulungu adawona kuti bzikhali bwino.
Usiku udapita machibese nkubwela, imweyi idawa ntsiku yachinayi.
Mulungu adati, “M'madzi ngamukhale bzakulengewa bzamoyo, n'dzulu mumbuluke mbalami.”

Nakutenepo Mulungu adalenga bzilombo bzikulu bzam'madzi, nabzamoyo bzimfakanya m'madzi, kuteyeza mishowo yabzene, nambalami zentse zimbuluka kuteyeza mishowo yazene. Pamwepo Mulungu adawona kuti bzikhali bwino.
Mulungu adabzidalisa nkuti, “Balanani muwande mudzadze nyanja, mbalami ngazibalane zidzadze dziko.
Usiku udapita machibese nkubwela, imweyi idawa ntsiku yachishanu.”

Mulungu adati, “Padziko ngapawe nabzilombo bzamoyo kuteyeza mishowo yabzene, nabzifuwo nabzinkwawa namimba, nabzilombo bzamudziko kuteyeza mishowo yabzene, nabzinkwawa namimba kuteyeza mishowo yabzene.” Bzidachitika tenepo.
Mulungu adalenga bzilombo bzapadziko kuteyeza mishowo yabzene, nabzifuwo kuteyeza mishowo yabzene, nabzinkwawa namimba kuteyeza mishowo yabzene. Pamwepo Mulungu adawona kuti bzikhali bwino.
Pamwepo Mulungu adati, “Ngatikonzeni munthu adalingana nayise, akhale ninga ise, azatonge ntsomba zamunyanja nambalami zan'dzulu, nabzifuwo nadziko lentse nabzentse bzinkwawa namimba padziko.”
Nakutenepo Mulungu adalenga munthu adalingana nayiye, adamulenga kulingana na Mulungu, adalenga mwamuna nankazi.
Mulungu adaadalisa, adati kwayiwo, “Balanani muwande, mudzadze dziko lentse lapantsi mulitonge, mutonge ntsomba zamunyanja, nambalami zan'dzulu, nabzilombo bzentse bzinfamba padziko lapantsi.”
Mulungu adati, “Wonani, ndakupasani miti inchita mbewu, namichelo inchosa mbewu kuti ikhale chakudya chanu.
Nyama zan'thengo nambalami zan'dzulu, nabzin'kwawa namimba, ndabzipasa miti yakugudila kuti ikhale chakudya chabzene.”
Pamwepo Mulungu adanyangana bzentse bzaadakonza, adawona kuti bzikhali bwino kwene-kwene. Usiku udapita machibese nkubwela, imweyi idawa ntsiku yachitanthatu.
Nakutenepo dzulu napantsi bzidamala, nabzentse bzikhali m'mwemo.
Ntsiku yachinomwe Mulungu adamaliza basa laakhachita, adapuma ntsiku yachinomwe kuphata basa lentse laadachita.
Nakutenepo Mulungu adadalisa ntsiku yachinomwe nkuyichita ntsiku yakuyela, nathangwe limwelo Mulungu adadalisa basa lentse laadachita lakulenga.
Uwu ndiwo m'mbadwe wakudzulu nawapantsi waadalenga.
Ndiyo ntsiku Chawuta Mulungu yaadalenga kudzulu napantsi,
miti yanthengo ikhanati yawapo padziko, miti yanthengo ikhanati yamela, pakuti Chawuta Mulungu akhanati wabvumbisa mvula padziko. Palibe munthu akhalima,
koma madzi yadachoka pantsi ndiyo yadatotesa padziko.
Pamwepo Chawuta Mulungu adakonza munthu nadongo lapantsi, adamufemela mpuye wamoyo m'mphuno mwake, munthu adakhala wamoyo.
Chawuta Mulungu adabzala munda chakumabveladzuwa kwa Edheni, ndimo mwaadayikha munthu waadakonzayo.
Kuchoka mudongo Chawuta Mulungu adamelesa miti ikhawoneka bwino m'maso, pomwe ikhali chakudya chabwino, muti wawumoyo udabzaliwa pakati pamundawo, namuti wakudziwa chabwino nachakuyipa.
Kamadzi kakhayelela kachichoka mu Edheni kachithiliza mundawo, kakhachoka m'mwemo kachipatukana kuchita tukamadzi tunayi.
Dzina lakakuyamba likhali Pishoni, ndiko kakhayelela kachizungunuka dziko la Havila, uko kukhana golidhe,
golidhe yamudziko m'mwemo niyabwino, muna minyala yabhidheliyamu naya onikisi.
Dzina lakamadzi kachiwili likhali Gihoni, ndiko kakhayelela kachizungunuka dziko lentse la Kushi.
Dzina lakamadzi kachitatu likhali Tigirisi, ndiko kakhayelela chakumabveladzuwa kwa Asiriya. Kamadzi kachinayi kakhali Ufuratesi.
Chawuta Mulungu adatola munthu nkumuyikha m'munda wa Edheni kuti alime nakuwuchengeta.
Chawuta Mulungu adawuza munthu kuti, “Michelo yentse yam'munda muno ungadye mwakutsudzuka,
koma muti umpasa nzelu zakudziwa chabwino nachakuyipa leka kudya, pakuti ntsiku yawuniwudya un'zafa.”
Pamwepo Chawuta Mulungu adati, “M'bzabwino lini kuti munthu akhale ali yekha. Ninimukonzela nthandizi aniyendelana nayiye.”
Nakutenepo Chawuta Mulungu adatola dongo nkukonza nalo bzilombo bzakusiyana-siyana bzan'thengo nambalami zentse zan'dzulu. Adabzibwelesa kwa munthu kuti abzipase madzina.
Munthuyo adapasa madzina bzifuwo bzentse, nambalami zentse zan'dzulu, nabzilombo bzentse bzan'thengo. Koma munthu akhanati wawona nthandizi akhayendelana nayiye.
Nakutenepo Chawuta Mulungu adachita kuti munthuyo agone tulo twakufa, paakhadagona tenepo iye adatola mbabvu yake ibodzi nkubwezapo pomwe nyama yake,
mbabvu imweyo yaadatola Chawuta Mulungu pamunthuyo ndiyo yaadakonza nayo nkazi, nkumpeleka kwamunthu.
Nakutenepo, mwamuna an'zasiya apayi wake naamayi wake, achiphatana nankazi wake, achikhala nyama ibodzi.
Pamwepo munthu nankazi wake wentse akhalibe kubvala, koma akhabva lini manyazi.
Tsapano nyoka ikhadachenjela kuposa nyama zentse zan'thengo zidalengewa na Chawuta Mulungu. Iyo idati kwankazi, “Ko Mulungu adalewa kuti, ‘Leka kudya michelo yamiti yam'munda muno?’ ”
Nkazi adati kwanyokayo, “Michelo yamiti yam'munda muno tingadye,
koma Mulungu adati, ‘N'chelo wamuti uli pakati pamunda tileke kuwudya panango kuwuphata, tikawudya tin'zafa.’ ”
Pakuti Mulungu an'dziwa kuti, mukawudya maso yanu yan'zafunguka, mun'zalingana na Mulungu, kudziwa chabwino nachakuyipa.”
Nkaziyo paadawona kuti mutiwo niwabwino kudya, pomwe kuti ukhawoneka bwino m'maso, ukhachitisa kuti munthu achenjele, adatola n'chelo wamutiwo nkudya, adapasambo mwamuna wake, iyembo nkudya.
Pamwepo maso yawo wentse ali awili yadafunguka, adadziwa kuti akhali pezi, adabzisonela masamba yamuti wankuyu nkubvala.
Iwo adabva n'jinchi wa Chawuta Mulungu achifamba-famba m'munda nthawe yakujenjelela chakumawulo, munthu nankazi wake adabisala Chawuta Mulungu nkati mwamiti yam'munda.
Koma Chawuta Mulungu adachemela munthuyo nkuti kwayiye, “Uli kuponi?”
Iye adati, “Ndabva kufamba-famba kwamukhachita m'munda, ndikhagopa, nathangwe lakuti ndikhali pezi, ndipo pandabisala.”
Mulungu adati, “Mbani wakuwuza kuti uli pezi, ko wadya nchelo wamuti wandidakuwuza kuti uleke kudya?”
Munthuyo adati, “Nkazi wamudandipasa ndiye adandipasa n'chelo wamutiwo, ine ndidadya.”
Pamwepo Chawuta Mulungu adati kwankaziyo, “Ko nchinyi ichi chawachita?”
Nkazi adati, “Nyoka ndiyo yandipumphsa, ndipo pandadya.”
un'zashupika kwene-kwene kuti uwone chakudya chinchoka m'mwemo, ntsiku zawumoyo wako wentse.
Munthu adapasa nkazi wake dzina lakuti Eva, pakuti ndiye akhali amayi wawanthu wentse wamoyo.
Chawuta Mulungu adakonzela Adhamu nankazi wake chakubvala chamakanda, nkuwabvadzika.

Tsapano Chawuta Mulungu adati, “Wonani, munthu walingana nayise, waakudziwa chabwino nachakuyipa. Anfunika lini kubvumiziwa kuchela n'chelo wamuti umpasa umoyo unsaya kumala achiwudya achikhala wamoyo kufika lini nalini.”
Nakutenepo Chawuta Mulungu adachosa munthu m'munda wa Edheni, kuti akalime pantsi paadachoka.
Iye adachosa munthuyo, nkuyikha makherubhi nabhemba likhang'ayima chakumabveladzuwa kwamunda wa Edheni, kuchichinjiliza njila ikhayenda kumuti wawumoyo.
Tsapano Adhamu adadziwa nkazi wake Eva, iye adaphata pathupi nkubala Kayini, adati, “Ndabala munthu, ndathandiziwa na Chawuta.”
Adazabala pomwe m'bale wake waadapasa dzina lakuti Abhelo. Abhelo akhachengeta mabila, Kayini adawa mulimi padziko.
Nakufamba kwanthawe Kayini adayendesa ntsembe yake kwa Chawuta kuchoka kumichelo yapantsi,
Abhelo adayendesambo chakuyamba chamabila yake, nabzipindi bzakununa bzachifuwocho. Chawuta adakondwa na Abhelo nantsembe yake,
Chawuta alibe kutambila Kayini nantsembe yake. Pamwepo Kayini adakalipa kwene-kwene, nkudodomesa pamaso.
Chawuta adati kwa Kayini, “Thangwe lanyi kukalipa? Thangwe lanyi kudodomesa nkhope?
Ko ukachita bwino ungaleke kutambiliwa? Ukaleka kuchita bwino, chakuyipa chinkutsandila pansuwo chichifuna iwepo, koma iwe unfunika kukunda.”
Kayini adati kwam'bale wake Abhelo, “Tiyende n'thengo,” paakhali n'thengomo, Kayini adasandukila m'bale wake Abhelo, nkumupha.
Pamwepo Chawuta adati kwa Kayini, “M'bale wako Abhelo ali kuponi?” Iye adati, “Nin'dziwa lini kuti ali kuponi. Ko ine ndine nin'chengeta m'bale wangu?”
Chawuta adati, “N'chinyi chawachita? Fala lagazi lam'bale wako lili kulila kwayine kuchoka pantsi.
Tsapano watembelelewa mudziko lino, lidamwa gazi lam'bale wako wawudapha namanja yako.
Pawun'zalima mudongo limwelo un'zakolola lini. Un'zawa munthu wakuzungayila wakundofamba padziko.”
Kayini adati kwa Chawuta, “Chilango chamwandipasa n'chikulu, nin'chikwanisa lini kuchitakula.
Lelo mwandithamangisa padziko, ndachoka patsogolo panu, ndaakuzungayila ndikundofamba-famba nadziko. Munthu wentse an'gumana nayine an'zandipha.”
Chawuta adati kwayiye, “Ntenepo lini! Munthu wentse anipha Kayini, an'zalangiwa kadapetewa kanomwe.” Chawuta adayikha chilatizo pa Kayini, kuchitila kuti munthu aninga wamuwona aleke kumupha.
Kayini adachoka patsogolo pa Chawuta, nkuyenda kakhala kudziko la Nodhi
Kayini adadziwa nkazi wake, iye adaphata pathupi nkubala Enoki. Adamanga guta, guta limwelo adalipasa dzina lamwana wake wachimuna, Enoki.
Enoki akhali apayi wa Iradhi, Iradhi akhali apayi wa Mehuyaeli, Mehuyaeli akhali apayi wa Metusayeli, Metusayeli akhali apayi wa Lameki.
Lameki akhana akazi awili, wakuyamba akhachitiwa Adha, wachiwili akhachitiwa Zila.
Adha adabala Jabhali, uyo akhali payi wawanthu akhakhala m'matenti, akhafuwa bzifuwo.
Dzina lam'bale wake likhachitiwa Jubhali, uyo akhali payi wawanthu aniliza banjo namitolilo.
Zila adabala Tubhali Kayini, uyo akhakonza bzinthu bzentse bzankuwa nabzasimbi. Nana wa Tubhali Kayini akhachitiwa Naama.
Imwe azikazi wa Lameki tetekeleni bzandikulewa ine!
Peno munthu anipha Kayini anilangiwa kadapetewa kanomwe,
munthu anipha lameki an'zalangiwambo kadapetewa makumi manomwe nanomwe.”
Adhamu adadziwa pomwe nkazi wake, nkubala mwana wachimuna waadapasa dzina lakuti Seti, iye adati, “Mulungu wandipasa pomwe mwana pambuto ya Abhelo ule adaphewa na Kayini.”
Seti adabala mwana wachimuna waadapasa dzina lakuti Enoshi. Nthawe imweyo wanthu adayamba kuchemela dzina la Chawuta.
Aya ndiyo madzina yam'badwe wa Adhamu. Mulungu paadalenga munthu, adamulenga adalingana nayiye pachake.
Adalenga mwamuna nankazi, adaadalisa, achiwachemela kuti, “Wanthu”
Adhamu akhana magole dzana namakumi matatu (130), adakhala apayi wamwana akhadalingana nayiye, waadapasa dzina lakuti Seti.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Seti, Adhamu adakhala pomwe magole mazana masele (800) adachita pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Magole yentse yadalalama Adhamu yakhali mazana pfemba namakumi matatu (930), nkuzafa.
Seti paakhana magole dzana namashanu (105), adakhala apayi wa Enoshi.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Enoshi, Seti adalalama kwamagole mazana masele nanomwe (807), adabala anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Magole yentse yadalalama Seti yakhali mazana pfemba nakhumi namawili (912), nkuzafa.
Enoshi paakhana magole makumi pfemba (90), adakhala apayi wa Kenani.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Kenani, Enoshi adalalama kwamagole mazana masele nakhumi nashanu (815), adabala anango wana wachimuna nawachiakazi.
Magole yentse yadalalama Enoshi yakhali mazana pfemba namashanu, (905), nkuzafa.
Kenani paakhana magole makumi manomwe (70) adakhala apayi wa Mahalaleli.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Mahalaleli, Kenani adalalama kwamagole mazana masele namakumi manayi (840), adabala anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Magole yentse yadalalama Kenani yakhali mazana pfemba nakhumi (910), nkuzafa.
Mahalaleli paakhana magole makumi matanthatu namashanu adakhala apayi wa Jaredhi.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Jaredhi, Mahalaleli adalalama kwamagole mazana masele namagole makumi matatu (830), adabala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Magole yentse yadalalama Mahalaleli yakhali mazana masele namakumi pfemba namashanu (895), nkuzafa.
Jaredhi paakhana magole dzana namakumi matanthatu namawili (162), adakhala apayi wa Enoki.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Enoki, Jaredhi adalalama kwamagole mazana makumi masele (800), adabala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Magole yentse yadalalama Jaredhi yakhali mazana pfemba namakumi matanthatu namawili (962), nkuzafa.
Inoki adalalama magole makumi matanthatu namashanu (65), nkukhala apayi wa Metusela.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Metusela, Inoki adafamba na Mulungu kwamagole mazana matatu (300), adabala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Magole yentse yadalalama Enoki yakhali mazana matatu namakumi matanthatu namashanu (365).
Inoki adafamba na Mulungu, adanyangalika, pakuti Mulungu adamutola.
Metusela paakhana magole dzana namakumi masele nanomwe (187), adakhala apayi wa Lameki.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Lameki, Metusela adalalama kwamagole mazana manomwe namakumi masele namawili (782), adabala anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi, nkuzafa.
Magole yentse yadalalama Metusela yakhali mazana pfemba namakumi matanthatu napfemba (938), nkuzafa.
Lameki paakhana magole dzana namakumi masele namawili (182), adakhala apayi wamwana wachimuna,
waadapasa dzina lakuti Nowa, adati, “Kuchoka padongo lidatembelelewa na Chawuta, mwana uyu ndiye an'zatinyamaliza pabasa lentse lakuwuma latim'phata namanja yathu.”
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Nowa, Lameki adakhala kwamagole mazana mashanu namakumi pfemba nashanu (595), adabala anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Magole yentse yadalalama Lameki yakhali mazana manomwe namakumi manomwe nanomwe (777), nkuzafa.
Nowa paakhana magole mazana mashanu (500), adakhala apayi wa Shemu na Hamu na Jafeti.
Wanthu paadayamba kuwanda padziko, adabala wana wachitsikana.
Wana wa Mulungu adazawona kuti wana wawanthu wachitsikana akhabaliwa akhadakoma nkhope, adatakula waakhafuna nkuloola.
Pamwepo Chawuta adati, “N'zimu wangu un'zakhala lini pamunthu kufika lini nalini, pakuti nimunthu wanyama. Nakutenepo munthu an'zakhala lini padziko kwamagole yampita dzana namakumi mawili.” (120)

A Nefilimu akhali padziko lapantsi muntsiku zimwezo napambuyo pache, wana wa Mulungu paadabwela kuzaloola wana wawanthu achibala nawo wana. Amwewa akhali wanthu wam'phamvu wakale akhadziwika kwene-kwene.
Chawuta adawona kuti kuyipa kwamunthu padziko kukhadakula, bzentse bzaan'khala achikumbuka mumitima yawo m'bzakuyipa bzokha-bzokha.
Chawuta adakumbuka kuti “Ninga ndilibe kukonza wanthu padziko.”
Pamwepo Chawuta adati, “Nin'chosapo wanthu wentse wandidalenga padziko, wanthu nabzilombo nabzinkwawa namimba, nambalami. Ninkungula kuti ndidabzilengelanyi.”
Iyi ndiyo nkhani ya Nowa. Nowa akhali munthu wakulungama, akhali munthu akhalibe mulandu pam'badwe wake wentse. Nowa adafamba na Mulungu.
Nowa akhana wana atatu, Shemu na Hamu na Jafeti.
Mulungu adawona kuti dziko ladzala nankhondo.
Tsapano Mulungu adawona kuti padziko padzala nakudzonga, wanthu wentse akhadzonga padziko lapantsi.
Mulungu adati kwa Nowa, “Ndakumbuka bzakupha wanthu wentse, pakuti dziko ladzala nankhondo. Wonani, niwachenekela kubodzi nadziko.
Tsono iwe bzikonzele bote labwino lamatabwa, uyikhe bzipinda nkati mwalene, ulitsutsute nabelewu nkati nakunja kwalene.

Botelo ulikonze tenepa, muwutali mwalene lichite mamita dzana namakumi matatu namatatu (133), muwufupi mwalene muchite mamita makumi mawili namawili (22), kuyenda n'dzulu kuchite mamita khumi namatatu (13).

Pabote limwelo uyikhepo ntsodzi, pakati pantsodzi nachengo usiyepo mbuto infika masendimita makumi manayi namanayi (44). Nkati mwalene mukhale nambuto zitatu, yapantsi, yapakati nayapadzulu. Pambali pambotelo uyikhepo nsuwo.
Wonani, ine nin'zabvumbisa mvula yachigumula padziko, in'zacheneka bzinthu bzentse bzamoyo bzili padziko. Bzentse bzili padziko bzin'zafa.
Koma ine nin'zachita chibvano nayiwe. Iwe nankazi wako nawana wako naaloola wako mupite mubote.
Pabzinyama bzentse bzamoyo bzamishowo yentse utakule bziwili-bziwili upite nabzo mubote, kuti bzikhale bzamoyo pabodzi nayimwe, ngabziwe bzimuna nabzikazi.
Utole bziwili-bziwili, mbalami kuteyeza mishowo yazene nabzentse bzin'kwawa padziko kuchitila kuti bzikhale bzamoyo.
Nowa adachita bzentse bzaadawuziwa na Mulungu kuti achite.
Chawuta adati kwa Nowa, “Pita mubote nabanja lako, pakuti ndawona kuti ndiwe wekha wakulungama pam'badwe wentse uli padziko.
Panyama zakuchena utakule mikono minomwe nazikazi zinomwe. Koma panyama zakupsipa utakule ziwili, ikono nayikazi.
Utakule mbalami zamishowo yentse, zikazi zinomwe nazimuna zinomwe, kuchitila kuti zikhale zamoyo padziko lentse lapantsi.
Kupita kwantsiku zinomwe kuchoka lelo, nin'zabvumbisa mvula padziko kwantsiku makumi manayi (40) usiku namasikati. Bzentse bzamoyo bzandidalenga, nin'zabzicheneka padziko.”
Nakutenepo Nowa adachita bzentse bzaadawuziwa na Chawuta kuti achite.
Nowa akhana magole mazana matanthatu (600), padachitika chigumula padziko.
Nowa nankazi wake nawana wake naaloola wake adapita mubote kuti aleke kufa namadzi yachigumula.
Bzinyama bzakuchena nabzakupsipa nambalami nabzentse bzinkwawa namimba,
bzili bziwili-bziwili, chimuna nachikazi, ninga kuwuziwa kukhadachitiwa Nowa na Mulungu.
Kudapita ntsiku zinomwe madzi yachigumula nkubwela padziko.
Nowa paakhana magole mazana matanthatu (600), mumwezi wachiwili, ntsiku yakhumi nanomwe, ndiyo ntsiku idafunguka ntsantsa zentse zamaboo, namazhenela yentse yakudzulu yadafunguka.
Mvula idabvumba padziko kwantsiku makumi manayi usiku namasikati.
Ntsiku imweyo Nowa nankazi wake nawana wake wachimuna atatu, Shemu na Hamu na Jafeti naaziloola wake adapita m'bote,
pabodzi nanyama kuteyeza mishowo yazene, bzifuwo kuteyeza mishowo yabzene, nabzentze bzinkwawa namimba kuteyeza mishowo yabzene, nambalami zentse kuteyeza mishowo yazene, mbalami zanshowo nanshowo.
Bzakulengewa bzamoyo bzakusiyana-siyana bzidapita mubote na Nowa bzili bziwili-bziwili,
kuteyeza kuwuziwa kwaakhadachitiwa Nowa na Mulungu. Pamwepo Chawuta adafunga nsuwo.
Madzi yachigumula yadapitiliza kubvumba padziko kwantsiku makumi manayi. Madzi yadawanda, bzidazachitisa kuti botelo liyangamale padzulu pamadzi.
Madzi yadapitiliza kuwanda padziko, bote nkuyangamala padzulu.
Madzi yadadzala nkunyuza maphili yentse matali yapadziko,
Bzinyama bzentse bzamoyo bzikhali padziko, mbalami nabzifuwo nabzinkwawa namimba pabodzi nawanthu nkufa.
Bzinthu bzentse bzamoyo bzikhali pabziko bzidafa.
Chawuta adapha bzentse bzamoyo padziko, wanthu nabzinyama nambalami. Kudasala Nowa nabzentse bzaakhanabzo m'bote.
Madzi yadadzala padziko lapantsi kwantsiku dzana namakumi mashanu.
Koma Mulungu adakumbuka Nowa nabzinyama bzentse nabzifuwo bzaakhanabzo m'bote. Mulungu adachita kuti padziko pachite chonzi, pamwepo madzi nkuyamba kuphwilila.
Ntsantsa zamaboo namazhanela yakudzulu bzidafunga, mvula yakudzulu idaleka kubvumba.
Nakutenepo madzi yadaphwilila padziko. Kudapita ntsiku dzana namakumi mashanu (150) madzi yachindophwilila.
M'mwezi wachinomwe, ntsiku yakhumi nanomwe yamwezi umwewo, bote lidatsama paphili la Ararati.
Madzi yadapitiliza kuphwilila kufikila mumwezi wakhumi. Pantsiku yakuyamba yamwezi wakhumi, ntsonga zamapili zidawoneka.
Pakudapita ntsiku makumi manayi, Nowa adafungula zhanela labote laadakonza,
nkutuma khunkubwe. Ilo likhandozungunika kufikila madzi yawuma pantsi.
Pamwepo Nowa adazatuma pomwe njiwa kuti ikawone kuti panango madzi yaphwilila padziko,
koma njiwa idasaya pakukhala, idazabwelela kubote pakuti padziko pakhachana madzi. Nakutenepo iye adachosa janja lake nkuphata njiwayo, achiyibweza m'bote.
Adayimila kwantsiku zinomwe, nkubulisa pomwe njiwa ile m'botemo.
Chakumawulo njiwa idabwelela kwa Nowa idaluma kamuti kawisi kamuolivi. Pamwepo Nowa adadziwa kuti madzi padziko yaphwilila.
Adayimila pomwe kwantsiku zinomwe, nkubulisa pomwe njiwa ile, koma njiwayo ilibe kuzabwelela.
Mugole lamazana matanthatu nagole libodzi (601) ya Nowa, pantsiku yakuyamba yamwezi wakuyamba, madzi yadawuma padziko. Nowa adachosa ntsodzi yabotelo, paadanyangana adawona kuti pantsi pakhadatowuma.
Mumwezi wachiwili, pantsiku yamakumi mawili nanomwe, pantsi pakhadatowumilatu.
“Bula mubote nankazi wako nawana wako naaloola wako.
Ubulise bzentse bzamoyo bzawunabzo bziniti, mbalami nabzifuwo nabzinkwawa namimba, kuchitila kuti bzibalane bzidzadze pomwe dziko.”
Nakutenepo Nowa adabula mubote pabodzi nankazi wake nawana wake naaloola wake.
Nyama zentse nambalami nabzinkwawa namimba, bzidabula m'botemo kuteyeza mishowo yabzene.
Nowa adamangila Chawuta mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe, adatola nyama zentse zakuchena nambalami zentse zakuchena, nkupeleka ntsembe yakutentha pambuto yakupelekela ntsembe.

Chawuta adabva n'nunkho wabwino wantsembeyo, iye adati chamuntima mwake, “Nin'zatembelela lini pomwe dziko nathangwe lamunthu, pakuti nkhumbukila zantima wamunthu n'zakuyipa kuyambila pawung'ono wake. Nin'zacheneka lini pomwe bzamoyo ninga bzandachita ibzi.
Padziko pan'zakhala nanthawe yakubzala nayakukolola nayakujejela nayakuphsa nayachilimo nayamphepo nayamasikati nayawusiku.”
Mulungu adadalisa Nowa nawana wake, adati kwayiwo, “Balanani muwande, mudzadze dziko.
Bzinyama bzentse bzapadziko nambalami zentse zan'dzulu nabzentse bzinkwawa namimba nantsomba zentse zamunyanja zin'zakugopani bzichizabva mantha nayimwe. Bzentse ndabziyikha m'manja mwanu.
Bzamoyo bzentse bzinfamba bzin'zakhala chakudya chanu, ninga kukupasani kwandidachita mbewu zentse ziwisi.
Koma lekani kudya nyama ina gazi, pakuti umoyo wanyama uli mugazi.
Pagazi lawumoyo wanu nin'zafuna longosolo, kubzinyama bzentse nakumunthu wentse nin'zafuna longosolo nakum'bale wamunthu wentse nin'zafuna longosolo lawumoyo wamunthu.
Wentse antaya gazi lamunthu, gazi lake linfunika kutayiwambo namunthu, pakuti Mulungu adalenga munthu kulingana nayiye pachake.”
Mulungu adati kwa Nowa nakwawana wake wachimuna,
“Wonani, ndikuchita chibvano nayiwe, nakum'badwe wako un'zabwela,
nabzinyama bzentse bzawunabzo bziniti, mbalami nabzifuwo nabzinyama bzentse bzapadziko bzawunabzo, nabzentse bzawabula nabzo m'bote.
Ndikuchita chibvano nayimwe chakuti, ‘Nin'zapha lini pomwe bzamoyo nachigumula. Kun'zachita lini pomwe madzi yachigumula yakucheneka wanthu padziko.’ ”
Mulungu adati, “Ichi ndicho chilatizo chachibvano chandidachita nayimwe nabzamoyo bzawunabzo nakum'badwe wentse un'zabwela.
Ndayikha utati wangu m'mitambo kuti uwe chilatizo chachibvano changu nayiwe nadziko lentse.
pamwepo nin'zakumbuka chibvano changu chandachita nayiwe nabzamoyo bzentse, kun'zabvumba lini pomwe mvula yachigumula yakuzacheneka bzamoyo.
Utati ukawoneka m'mitambo, nin'zawunyangana ndichizakumbuka chibvano chin'khala kufika lini nalini chandachita nayiwe nabzamoyo bzentse bzapadziko.”
Mulungu adati kwa Nowa, “Ichi ndicho chilatizo chachibvano chandachita pakati payine nabzamoyo bzentse bzapadziko.”
Wana wa Nowa adabula mubote ni Shemu na Hamu na Jafeti. Hamu ndiye payi wa Kenani.
Awa ndiwo akhali wana wa Nowa atatu wachimuna, kwaamwewa ndiko kudachoka wanthu wentse ali padziko.
Nowa akhali mulimi, ndiye munthu adayamba kubzala munda wamavayini.
Ntsiku inango iye adamwa vinyu nkuledzela, adagona mutenti yake alibe kubvala.
Hamu apayi wa Kenani, adawonela apayi wake, adabula panja nkukawuza akulu wake awili.
Shemu na Jafeti adatakula nguwo, nkuyisumusa kufika m'mapewa yawo, achifamba chifutambuyo kafinika apayi wawo, adanyangana kumbali kuti aleke kuwawona ali pezi.
Nowa paadalamuka pakuledzela kwake, adadziwa bzikhadachita mwana wake wachimuna mung'ono.
Pambuyo pamadzi yachigumula, Nowa adazakhala kwamagole mazana matatu namakumi mashanu (350).
Nowa adakhala padziko kwamagole mazana pfemba namakumi mashanu (950), pamwepo iye adazafa.
Uwu ndiwo m'mbadwe wawana wa Nowa, Shemu na Hamu na Jafeti, wana waadabala pambuyo pachigumula.
Wana wa Jafeti akhali, Gomeri na Magogi na Madhayi na Javani na Tubhali na Misheki na Tirasi.
Wana wa Gomeri akhali Ashikenazi na Rifati na Togarima.
Wana wa Javeni akhali Elisha na Tarishishi na Kitimu na Dhodhanimu;

kum'badwe wa Javani, ndiko kudachoka wanthu adazakhala mumphepete mwanyanja, kuchoka kwaawa, wanthu wamumphepete mwanyanja adamwazikila kuteyeza mbuto zawo, namishowo yawo, namabanja yawo namadziko yawo.
Wana wa Hamu akhali Kushi na Ijipiti na Phuti na Kenani.
Wana wa Kushi akhali Sebha na Havila na Sabhuta na Raama na Sabhuteka. Wana wa Rama akhali Shebha na Dhedhani.
Kushi akhali apayi wa Nimilodhi, ndiye adakhala munthu wakuyamba kukhala wamphamvu padziko.
Akhali nkhumbalume nkulu patsogolo pa Chawuta, ndibzo bzidazachitisa kuti wanthu ambalewa ntsumo yakuti, “Ninga Nimilodhi nkhumbalume nkulu patsogolo pa Chawuta!”
Umambo wake udayambila mu Bhabheli namu Ereki na Akadhi, maguta yentse yamweyo yakhali mudziko la Shinari.
Adachoka mudziko limwelo nkuyenda ku Asiriya kwaadakamanga guta la Ninive naguta la Rehobhoti na Khala
na Resini, pakati Ninive na Khala guta likulu.
Ijipiti akhali apayi wa Ludhimu na Ananimu na Lehabhimu na Nafuhimu
na Paturusimu na Kasuluhimu kudachoka nshowo waa Filistia na Kafutorimu.
Kenani akhali apayi wa Sidhoni, mwana wake wakuyamba, na Heti,
naa Jebhusi naa Amori naa Girigashi
naa Hivi naa Ariki naa Sinai,
naa Arivadhi naa Zemari naa Hamati. Pambuyo pache mabanja yaa Kenani yadazamwazikila.
Dziko laa Kenani likhayambila ku Sidhoni lichikapita naku Gerari, lichifika ku Gaza, chakumbali yaku Sodhomu na Gomora na Adhima na Zebhoyimu mpaka ku Lasha.
Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Hamu, kuteyeza namabanja yawo namishowo yawo nambuto zawo namadziko yawo.
Kwa Shemu, apayi wawana wentse wa Ebheri, nkulu wa Jafeti kudabaliwambo wana.
Wana wa Shemu akhali, Elamu na Ashuri na Aripakishadhi na Ludhi na Aramu.
Wana wa Aramu akhali, Uzi na Huli na Geteri na Mashi.
Aripakishadhi akhali apayi wa Shela, Shela akhali apayi wa Ebheri.
Kwa Ebheri kudabaliwa wana awili, dzina lamunango wache akhali Pelegi, pakuti muntsiku zake dziko likhadagawika, dzina lam'bale wake akhali Jokitani.
Jokitani akhali apayi wa Alimodhadhi na Shelefi na Hazarimaveti na Jera
na Hadhoramu na Uzali na Dhikila
na Obhali na Abhimayeli na Shebha
na Ofiri na Havila na Jobhabhi, wentse awa akhali wana wa Jokitani.
Dziko laakhakhala likhayambila ku Mesha kumbali ya Seferi kufika kudziko lamapili lachakumabveladzuwa.
Awa ndiwo wana wa Shemu, kuteyeza mabanja yawo, nanshowo yawo, nambuto zawo namadziko yawo.
Aya ndiyo mabanja yawana wa Nowa, kuteyeza kunembewa kwayakhadachitiwa, mumadziko yawo, kuchoka m'madziko yamweya adamwazikila padziko lapantsi, pambuyo pachigumula.
Tsapano dziko lentse lapantsi likhana nshowo ubodzi, lichilewa-lewa mafala mabodzi.
Wanthu paadatama achichoka kumabveladzuwa, adakawona dambo mudziko la Shinari, achikhala m'mwemo.
Iwo adapangana nkuti, “Bwelani, ngatikonze bzidhina tibzitenthe.” Bzidhinabzo ndibzo bzaadamangisa, thala ndiyo yaadachita dongo.
Iwo adazati, “Bwelani tibzimangile guta lina dala linkafika kudzulu, kuti tidziwike, tileke kumwazikila nadziko.”
Chawuta adabuluka kuzanyangana guta nadala bzikhadamangiwa nawana wawanthu.
Chawuta adati, “Wonani, awa niwanthu abodzi, anilewa-lewa nshowo ubodzi. Uku ndiko kuyamba kwawo kuchita bzaanfuna, palibe chingaatazise kuchita bzaakupangana kuti achite.
Bwelani, ngatibuluke tikaapesanise kulewa-lewa kwawo, kuti munango-namunango wawo aleke kubva nshowo wamwanzake.”
Nakutenepo Chawuta adaamwaza kuchoka pamwepo kuyenda kudziko lentse lapantsi, iwo adaleka kumanga guta.
Guta limwelo lidazachemelewa kuti Bhabhiloni, pakuti Chawuta adapesanisa nshowo wawanthu pamwepo. Chawuta adaamwaza kuchoka pamwepo kuyenda kudziko lentse lapantsi.
Uwu ndiwo m'badwe wa Shemu. Shemu paakhana magole dzana (100), adakhala apayi wa Aripakishadhi magole mawili pambuyo pamadzi yachigumula.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Aripakishadhi, Shemu adakhala kwamagole mazana mashanu (500), adabala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachitsikana.
Aripakishadhi paakhana magole makumi matatu namashanu (35), adakhala apayi wa Shela;
pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Shela, Aripakishadhi adakhala kwamagole mazana manayi namatatu (403), adabala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachitsikana.
Shela paakhana magole makumi matatu (30), adakhala apayi wa Ebheri.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Ebheri, Shela adakhala kwamagole mazana manayi namatatu (403), achibala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Ebheri paakhana magole makumi matatu namanayi adakhala apayi wa Pelegi (34).
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Pelegi, Ebheri adakhala kwamagole mazana manayi namakumi matatu (430), achibala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Pelegi paakhana magole makumi matatu (30) adakhala apayi wa Reu.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Reu, Pelegi adakhala kwamagole mazana mawili napfemba (209) achibala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Reu paakhana magole makumi matatu namawili (32), adakhala apayi wa Serugu.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Serugi, Reu adakhala kwamakhole mazana mawili nanomwe (207), achibala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Serugu paakhana magole makumi matatu (30), adakhala apayi wa Nahori.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Nahori, Serugu adakhala kwamagole mazana mawili (200), achibala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Nahori paakhana magole makumi mawili napfemba (29) adakhala apayi wa Tera.
Pambuyo pakubaliwa kwa Tera, Nahori adakhala kwamagole dzana nakhumi napfemba (119), achibala pomwe anango wana wachimuna nawachikazi.
Tera paakhana magole makumi manomwe (70), adakhala apayi wa Abhuramu na Nahori na Harani.
Uwu ndiwo m'badwe wa Tera. Tera akhali apayi wa Abhuramu na Nahori na Harani, Harani adakhala apayi wa Loti.
Harani adafa apayi wake achali wamoyo, adafela mudziko laadabaliwa muguta la Uri mudziko laa Khalidhiya.
Abhuramu na Nahori adaloola. Nkazi wa Abhuramu akhachemelewa kuti Sarayi, nkazi wa Nahori akhachemelewa kuti Milika, Milika mwana wachikazi wa Harani, Harani apayi wa Milika na Isika.
Koma Sarayi akhali ngomwa, akhalibe mwana.

Tera adatola Abhuramu mwana wake wachimuna nan'zukulu wake Loti mwana wachimuna wa Harani, namuloola wake Sarayi, nkazi wamwana wake Abhuramu. Adachoka muguta la Uri, mudziko laa Khalidhiya nkuyenda kudziko la Kenani. Koma paadafika ku Harani adakhala kumweko.
Tera adalalama kwamagole mazana mawili namashanu (205), adazafela mu Harani.
Chawuta adati kwa Abhuramu, “Choka mudziko lako, pakati paabale wako, uchoke panyumba yaapayi wako, uyende kudziko landichakuwonesa.
Nin'zakuchita nshowo ukulu, pomwe nin'zakudalisa, nin'zachita kuti dzina lako likhale nambili, nakutenepo iwe un'zakhala daliso.
Mabanja yentse yapadziko yan'zakhala yakudalisiwa thangwe layiwe.”
Nakutenepo Abhuramu adayenda, ninga kuwuziwa kwaakhadachitiwa na Chawuta, adayenda pabodzi na Loti, Abhuramu paadachoka mu Harani akhana magole makumi manomwe nashanu (75).
Abhuramu adatola nkazi wake Sarayi na Loti mwana wam'bale wake, nachuma chake chentse chaakhanacho, naalanda waadawona mu Harani nkuyenda ku Kenani.
Abhuramu adapita namudziko m'mwemo achikakhala ku Shekemu pamuti ukulu wamuoki waku More. Nthawe imweyo a Kenani akhali mudziko limwelo.
Chawuta adabziwonesa kwa Abhuramu, adati kwayiye, “Dziko limweli ndichalipeleka kum'badwe wako.” Nakutenepo Abhuramu adamangila mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe Chawuta uyo adambabziwonesa kwayiye.

Adachoka pamwepo nkuyenda kuphili, chakumabveladzuwa kwaguta la Bheteli, kwaadakazika matenti yake. Bheteli likhali chakumadokelo, guta la Ayi likhali chakumabveladzuwa. Kumweko Adamangila Chawuta mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe, adachemela dzina la Chawuta.
Abhuramu adapitiliza ulendo wake mpaka adafika ku Negebhu.
Tsapano mudziko la Kenani mudagwa njala. Nakutenepo Abhuramu adayenda kakhala ku Ijipiti, pakuti njala ikhadakula mudziko.
Paakhali pafupi kufika mu Ijipiti, iye adati kwankazi wake Sarayi, “Pakuti iwe ndiwe nkazi wabwino kwene-kwe,
a Ijipiti akakuwona, iwo ankati, ‘Uyu ninkazi wake,’ ankandipha iwe achikusiya uli wamoyo.
Tsapano iwe ukaawuze kuti ndiwe nana wangu, ukatenepo iwo ankandipha lini, ankandichitila bwino thangwe layiwe.”
Abhuramu paadapita mu Ijipiti, wanthu wamu Ijipiti adawona kuti nkaziyo akhali wabwino.
Manduna yamambo Farawo paadamuwona, adadumbiza kwamambo Farawo kukoma nkhope kwaakhadachita. Nakutenepo Sarayi adazatolewa achiyendesewa kunyumba kwa mambo Farawo.
Tsapano Farawo adazaphata bwino Abhuramu nathangwe la Sarayi, adampasa mabila nambuzi nang'ombe namadhonki yamuna naalanda wachimuna naalanda wachikazi nangamela.
Koma Chawuta adayikha chitenda kwa Farawo nawamunyumba mwake, nathangwe la Sarayi nkazi wa Abhuramu.
Nakutenepo Farawo adazachemelesa Abhuramu, nkuti kwayiye, “Nchinyi chawachita kwayine? Thangwe lanyi ulibe kundiwuza kuti ninkazi wako?
Thangwe lanyi udati, ‘Ninana wako,’ nakutenepo ndidamutakula kuti akhale nkazi wangu? Tsapano, takula nkazi wako uyende naye!”
Farawo adawuza wanthu kuti achose Abhuramu nankazi wake mudziko limwelo, nabzinthu bzake bzentse bzaakhanabzo.
Abhuramu adachoka mu Ijipiti, iye nankazi wake nabzentse bzaakhanabzo pabodzi na Loti nkuyenda ku Negebhu.
Abhuramu akhadakhupuka kwene-kwene, pabzifuwo nasiliva nagolidhe.
Adachoka mu Negebhu nkuyenda mpaka adazafika ku Bheteli, kwaadambazika matenti yake pakuyamba, pakati pa Bheteli na Ayi,
pambuto yaakhadambamanga mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe pakuyamba, kumweko Abhuramu adachemela dzina la Chawuta.
Loti uyo adayenda na Abhuramu, akhalimbo pomwe namabila nang'ombe namatenti.
Nakutenepo mbuto imweyo ikhakwana lini kuti akhale pabodzi. Bzinthu bzawo bzikhali bzizinji kwene-kwene, bzikhakwanisika lini kuti akhale pabodzi,
pomwe anyakabusa wabzifuwo bza Abhuramu na Loti adayamba kushupana. Nthawe imweyo a Kenani naa Perezi akhakhala mudziko limwelo.
Abhuramu adati kwa Loti, “Anyakabusa wako nawangu ngaaleke kushupana, pakuti ndise wanthu wachibale.
Ko dziko sindilo lentse lawuli kuwona? Nakutenepo iwe nayine ngatipatukane. Iwe ukayenda kujanja lamanzele, ine niniyenda kujanja ladidi.”

Loti adanyangana nkuwona kuti muchigowa chamu Jorodhani, kufika ku Zoari kukhana madzi mazinji pentse-pentse ninga munda wa Chawuta, ninga bzikhadachita dziko la Ijipiti. Nthawe imweyo Chawuta akhanati waphwanya Sodhomu na Gomora.
Nakutenepo Loti adasankhula chigowa chentse chamu Jorodhani, iye adazayenda kakhala kumabveladzuwa. Ndiko kupatukana kwaadachita awa awili.
Abhuramu adakhala mudziko la Kenani, koma Loti adakhala pakati pamaguta yakhali muchigowa, adazika matenti yake pafupi na Sodhomu.
Tsapano wanthu waku Sodhomu akhali wakuyipa, wakuyipa akulu pamaso pa Chawuta.
Chawuta adati kwa Abhuramu, pambuyo pakupatukana na Loti, “Nyangana, uwone kuchoka pambuto pawuli, chakudzulu nachakunyantsi, chakumabveladzuwa nachakumadokelo,
pakuti dziko lawukuwona nin'zalipeleka kwayiwe, nakukum'badwe wako kufika lini nalini.
Nin'zachita kuti m'badwe wako uwande ninga pfumbi lapadziko, kuti peno munthu ankwanisa kuwelenga pfumbi lapadziko lapantsi, m'mbadwe wakombo un'zakwanisa kuwelengeka.
Sumuka, famba muwutali namuwufupi mwadziko, pakuti ninilipeleka kwayiwe.”
Nakutenepo Abhuramu adachosa matenti yake achiyenda kakhala pamioki yapa Mamure mu Hebhuroni, kumweko adamangila Chawuta mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe.
Muntsiku za Amurafeli mambo wa Shinari na Ariyoki wa Erasa na Kedhorilaomeri wa Elamu na Tidhali wa Goyimu,

mazimambo yamweya yadachita nkhondo namazimambo aya yaniti, Bhera mambo wa Sodhomu na Bhirisha mambo wa Gomora na Shinabhi mambo wa Adhima na Shemebheri mambo wa Zebhoyimu namambo waku Bhela iyo ikhachemelewa pomwe kuti Zoari.
Awa adaphatana muchigowa cha Sidhimu, icho chikhachemelewa kuti Nyanja ya Munyu.
Wanthu amwewo adatongewa namambo Kedhorilaomeri kwamagole khumi namawili, koma mugole lakhumi natatu adampandukila.
Mugole lakhumi nanayi Kedhorilaomeri namazimambo yaadaphatana nayo adakunda Refayimu mu Ashiteroti-karinayimu naa Zuzimu mu Hamu nawanthu wachi Emimu mu Shavekiriatayimu,
naa Hori muphili la Seira, mpaka ku Eriparani kukhamalila chipululu.
Adazabwelela nkuyenda ku Enimishapati, iyo in'chemelewa pomwe kuti Kadheshi. Adakunda dziko lentse laa Amaleki naa Amori akhakhala mudziko la Hazazonitamari.
Nakutenepo mambo wa Sodhomu, namambo wa Gomora, namambo wa Adhima, namambo wa Zebhoyimu nawa Bhela, iyo ikhachemelewa pomwe kuti Zoari, adaphatana munkhondo muchigowa cha Sidhimu,

na Kedhorilaomere mambo wa Elamu na Tidhari mambo wa Goyimu na Amurafeli mambo wa Shinari na Ariyoki mambo wa Elasari Bhabhiloni na Ariyoki wa Elasari. Mazimambo mashanuyo yadamenyana namazimambo manayi.
Tsapano muchigowa cha Sidhimu chikhana madindi mazinji yathala. Mazimambo yaku Sodhomu na Gomora paakhathawa anango wawo adagwelamo, anango wentse adathawila kumapili.
Nakutenepo azondi adapamba chuma chentse chamu Sodhomu namu Gomora, nachakudya chawo chentse achiyenda nacho.
Adatakulambo Loti mwana wam'bale wa Abhuramu uyo akhakhala mu Sodhomu nabzombo bzake, iwo nkuyenda.
Koma m'bodzi adathawa adabwela, adakawuza Abhuramu mu Hebheru, uyo akhakhala chakumaoki ya Mamure mu Amori, m'bale wa Eshikoli na Aneri, awa akhali shamwali za Abhuramu.

Abhuramu paadabva kuti m'bale wake Loti adapambiwa, adakocheza anyabezi, awo adabaliwa munyumba mwake, wentse pabodzi akhali mazana matatu nakhumi nasele (318), adateyela mazimambo manayiyo mpaka ku Dhani.
Abhuramu usiku umwewo adapatula wamphamvu wake mubzipani, iye naalanda wake, adaamenya achiwateyela mpaka pa Hobha chakudzulu kwa Dhamasiko.
Abhuramu adatakula bzinthu bzentse, adabweza m'bale wake Loti nabzinthu bzake, naakazi nawanthu wentse.
Abhuramu padabwelela kuchoka kunkhondo kwaadakunda Khedhorilaomeri namazimambo yaakhanayo, mambo waku Sodhomu adamuchungula pachigowa cha Shave, icho chikhachemelewa pomwe kuti chigowa chamambo.
Merekizedheki mambo wa Salemu, uyo adampasa zingwa navinyu, akhali nyantsembe wa Mulungu Nyakudzulu-dzulu.
uyo adayikha azondi wanu m'manja mwanu!”
Pamwepo Abhuramu adapeleka chakhumi kuchoka pabzinthu bzake bzentse.
Mambo wa Sodhomu adati kwa Abhuramu, “Tola bzentse bzawudapamba, koma ubweze wanthu wangu.”
Abhuramu adati kwamambo wa Sodhomu, “Ndidalumbila kwa Chawuta Mulungu Nyakudzulu-dzulu, nyakukonza dzulu napantsi,
kuti ndileke kutakula usalu panango shango panango chinthu chako chentse, pakuti ungazati, ‘Ndine ndidakhupusa Abhuramu.’
Palibe ne chibodzi chanin'zatakula, koma bzidadyewa nawanthu wachilumbwana, nampagalo waawo wandidayenda nawo, lekani Aneri na Eshikoli na Mamure atole mpagalo wawo.”
Pambuyo payibzi, fala la Chawuta lidabwela kwa Abhuramu m'masomphenya, lichiti, “Leka kugopa, pakuti ine ndine nchinjilizo yako, mpagalo wako un'zakhala ukulu kwene-kwene.”
Koma Abhuramu adati, “Chawuta Mulungu, ko bzamunimpasa bzinin'thandizanyi, pakuti ine ndilibe mwana? Eliyazari mulanda wangu waku Dhamasiko ndiye an'zadya nthaka yangu.”
Abhuramu adati, “Wonani, ine mulibe kundipasa mwana, nakutenepo mulanda wangu adabaliwa munyumba mwangu ndiye an'zadya nthaka yangu.”
Chawuta adati pomwe kwayiye, “Munthu umweyo an'zapita lini nthaka yako, koma mwana wako ndiye an'zapita nthaka yako.”
Mulungu adamuchosa panja, nkuti kwayiye, “Nyangana kudzulu, welenga nyenyezi, peno ungakwanise kuziwelenga.” Pamwepo iye adati kwayiye, “Uku ndiko kuwanda kun'zachita wam'badwe wako.”
Abhuramu adakhulupilila Chawuta. Chawuta adawelengela ibzi kuti nikulungama kwake.
Chawuta adati kwayiye, “Ndine Chawuta ndidakuchosa ku Uri kudziko laa Khalidhiya kuti ndikupase dziko lino kuti likhale lako.”
Koma Abhuramu adati, “Mfumu Mulungu, ningadziwe tani kuti dziko lino lin'zakhala langu?”
Chawuta adati kwayiye, “Bwelesa ng'ombe ikazi yamagole matatu nambuzi ikazi yamagole matatu nankono wabila wamagole matatu nanjiwa nachizunyana chankhangayiwa.”
Nakutenepo Abhuramu adatola bzentse bzikhadalewedwa nkuyenda nabzo kwa Mulungu. Adabzigwata-gwata mubzipindi bziwili, nkubziyikha bzidagumana chinango nachinango, koma mbalami ndizo zilibe kugwatiwa.
Koma magola payakhafika yachifuna kudya nyama zile zikhadagwatiwa-gwatiwa, Abhuramu akhayathamangisa.
Dzuwa palikhanyula, Abhuramu adaphatiwa natulo twakufa nato, n'dima un'gopsa udamugwanila.
Pamwepo Chawuta adati kwa Abhuramu, “Udziwiletu kuti wam'badwe wako an'zakhala alendo mudziko lili lini lawo, an'zakhala alanda kumweko kwaankapondelelewa kwamagole mazana manayi (400).
Koma ine nin'zalanga dziko limwelo laan'zatumikila, pakumalizila an'zabwelela nachuma chizinji kwene-kwene.
Koma iwe un'zayenda kuna azipayi wako mwan'delekho; uchikayikhiwa watokalamba.
M'badwe wawo wachinayi ndiwo un'zabwelela kudziko lino, pakuti bzakuyipa bzaa Amori bzinati bzamala.”
Dzuwa palidanyula kwatochita n'dima, mbawula yamoto ikhachosa utsi, nantsakamwenje yamoto bzidapita napakati pabzipindi bzanyama zile.
Ntsiku imweyo Chawuta adachita chibvano na Abhuramu achiti, “Ndapeleka dziko ili kum'badwe wako, kuyambila pakamadzi ka Ijipiti kufika pakamadzi kakulu, kamadzi ka Ufuletesi,
dziko laa Kenayiti laa Kenayiziti laa Kedhimoni
laa Hiti laa Pelezi laa Refayimu
laa Amori laa Kenani laa Girigashi nalaa Jebhusi.”
Tsapano Sarayi nkazi wa Abhuramu alibe kum'balila mwana, koma akhana mulanda wake wachikazi wanshowo wachi Ijipiti akhachitiwa Hagari.
Sarayi adati kwa Abhuramu, “Wona, Chawuta adandichita kuti ndileke kubala wana. Yenda ukagone namulanda wangu panango angandibalile wana.” Abhuramu adabvuma bzidalewedwa na Sarayi.
Nakutenepo, Abhuramu paadakhala magole khumi mudziko la Kenani, Sarayi nkazi wa Abhuramu adatola Hagari mu Ijipiti, mulanda wake, nkumpeleka kwa Abhuramu mwamuna wake kukhala nkazi wake.
Abhuramu adagona na Hagari, iye nkuphata pathupi. Hagari paadadziwa kuti wawa napathupi adayamba kunyoza mbuya wake.

Pamwepo Sarayi adati kwa Abhuramu, “Ndiwe ukuchitisa kuti ndisawusiwe tenepa. Ndidakupasa mulanda wangu kuti awe nkazi wako, koma iye paadadziwa kuti waphata pathupi adayamba kundinyoza.” Nakutenepo Chawuta ngaatonge pakati payiwe nayine!
Abhuramu adati kwa Sarayi, “Wona, Hagari nimulanda wako ndiwe unimutonga, ungachite kwayiye bzawakumbuka.” Tsapano Sarayi adazaphata Hagari mwadima, mpaka iye adazathawa.
Ngilozi ya Chawuta idamuwona pantsantsa yamadzi muchipululu, ntsantsa ikhali pafupi nanjila ikhayenda ku Shuri.
Iyo idati, “Hagari mulanda wa Sarayi, ukuchoka kuponi pomwe ukuyenda kuponi?”
Ngilozi ya Chawuta idati kwayiye, “Bwelela kwambuya wako ukabzichepese kwayiye.”
Ngilozi ya Chawuta idazati pomwe kwa Hagari, “Nin'zawandisa m'badwe wako bzakusaya kuwelengeka.”
Pamwepo ngilozi ya Chawuta idati, “Wona, iwe una pathupi, un'zabala mwana wachimuna wawun'zapasa dzina lakuti Ishimayeli, pakuti Chawuta wabva kulila kwako.
An'zakhala dhonki lanthengo chayilo lamunthu, an'zakhala achishupana nawanthu wentse, pomwe wanthu wentse achishupana nayiye, an'zakhala pambuto idanyanganana naabale wake.”
Hagari adapasa dzina Chawuta uyo waadalewa-lewa naye lakuti, “Imwe ndimwe Mulungu aniwona.” Iye adati, “Ndawona Mulungu, koma ndilibe kufa.”
Nakutenepo n'chela umwewo adawupasa dzina lakuti Bheeri-lahayi-royi, n'chelawo uli pakati pa Kadheshi na Bheredhi.
Hagari adabalila Abhuramu mwana wachimuna. Abhuramu adapasa mwanayo waadabaliliwa na Hagari dzina lakuti Ishimayeli.
Abhuramu akhana magole makumi masele namatanthatu (86), Hagari paadam'balila Ishimayeli.
Abhuramu paakhana magole makumi pfemba napfemba (99), Chawuta adabziwonesa kwayiye nkuti, “Ndine Mulungu wamphamvu, teyela njila zangu, khala wakulungama.
Nin'zachita chibvano changu pakati payine nayiwe, nin'zakuwandisani kwene-kwene.”
Pamwepo Abhuramu adakotamisa nkhope yake, Mulungu nkuti kwayiye,
“Wona, ndikuchita chibvano ichi nayiwe lelo, iwe un'zawa apayi wamishowo mizinji.
Un'zachemelewa lini nadzina lakuti Abhuramu pomwe, koma un'zachemelewa kuti Abhurahamu, pakuti ndaakukuchita apayi wamishowo mizinji.
Nin'zakupasa wana azinji kwene-kwene, m'badwe wako un'zakhala mishowo mizinji, anango wawo an'zakhala mazimambo.

“Nin'zachita chibvano changu pakati payine nayiwe, nakum'badwe un'zabwela pambuyo pako, pakuti nichibvano chinkhala kufika lini nalini. Ine nin'zakhala Mulungu wako mpaka kum'badwe wako wentse um'bwela.

Nakutenepo nin'zakupasa dziko lentse la Kenani, lawukukhala ninga mulendo, nin'zalipeleka kwayiwe nakum'badwe wako un'zabwela. Dziko la Kenani lin'zakhala nthaka yawo kufika lini nalini, pamwepo ine nin'zakhala Mulungu wawo.”
Mulungu adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Iwe pabodzi nam'badwe un'zabwela unfunika kuchengeta chibvano changu nayiwe.
Ichi ndicho chibvano changu chawunfunika kuteyeza pakati payine nayiwe nam'badwe wako um'bwela. Mwamuna wentse pakati panu anfunika kuzagwatiwa khanda lachimuna.
Munfunika kugwatiwa panyama khanda lachimuna, chikhale chilatizo chachibvano changu pakati payine nayimwe.

Mwana wentse wachimuna aninga wafikisa ntsiku sele pakati panu ngaagwatiwe khanda lachimuna, mwamuna wentse kum'badwe wanu, aninga abaliwa munyumba yanu, panango wakuguliwa namasheleni kuchoka kwawachilendo ali lini wam'badwe wanu.
Wentse adabadwa munyumba mwako nawentse adaguliwa namasheleni anfunika kugwatiwa khanda lachimuna. Nakutenepo chibvano changu chin'khala munyama yako, chibvano chinsaya kumala.
Mwamuna wentse ansaya kugwatiwa nyama yakhanda lake lachimuna an'zachosewa pakati pawanthu wake, pakuti aninga waphwanya chibvano changu.”
Mulungu adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Sarayi nkazi wako leka kumuchemela nadzina lakuti Sarayi, kuyambila lelo waakuchemelewa kuti Sara.
Nin'zamudalisa achikubalila mwana wachimuna, nin'zamudalisa, iye an'zawa amayi wamishowo yawanthu, mwayiye mun'zachoka mazimambo.”
Abhurahamu adakotamisa nkhope yake nkuyamba kuseka, iye nkuti chamuntima, “Munthu ana magole dzana (100) angabale mwana? Sara angabale mwana iye wawa namagole makumi pfemba?” (90)
Abhurahamu adati kwa Mulungu, “Ninga mwandochita kuti Ishimayeli adye nthaka yangu!”
Koma Mulungu adati, “Nee, Sara nkazi wako an'zakubalila mwana wachimuna wawun'zapasa dzina lakuti Isaki.
Koma nkhani ya Ishimayeli ndayibva, iye nin'zamudalisa ndichichita kuti abalane awande, an'zakhala kholo laanemwanamambo khumi naawili, nin'zamuchita nshowo ukulu.
Koma nin'zachita chibvano namwana wako Isaki, mwana wawun'zabaliliwa na Sara gole lamangwana panthawe ibodzi-bodzi ino.”
Mulungu paadamala kulewa-lewa na Abhurahamu, adayenda.

Pamwepo Abhurahamu adatola mwana wake Ishimayeli naalanda wamunyumba mwake, waadagula namasheleni, amuna wentse wamunyumba mwa Abhurahamu, adaagwata nyama yakhanda lachimuna ntsiku imweyo, kuteyeza bzikhadalewedwa na Mulungu.
Abhurahamu paadagwatiwa nyama yakhanda lachimuna akhana magole makumi pfemba napfemba (99).
Mwana wake Ishimayeli akhana magole khumi namatatu (13) paadagwatiwa nyama yakhanda lake lachimuna.
Ntsiku imweyo Abhurahamu namwana wake Ishimayeli adagwatiwa nyama yakhanda lachimuna,
naamuna wentse wamunyumba mwake, awo adabadwa munyumba mwake, naawo waadagula namasheleni kwawachilendo, adagwatiwambo nyama yakhanda lachimuna.
Chawuta adabziwonesa kwa Abhurahamu paakhali pamiti yamioki yaku Mamure, paakhadakhala pansuwo watenti yake, dzuwa lichipsa.
Adanyangana nkuwona amuna atatu adayima pafupi nayiye. Paadandowawona adathamanga achikagumana nawo, achikotamisa nkhope yake pantsi.
Iye adati, “Mbuya wangu, peno mwandichitila chifundo, lekani kupitilila panyumba pamulanda wanu.
Ndikupaseni madzi, musambe nzaye zanu, mungapumule bzanu nyantsi mwamuti.
Ndikuphikileni zingwa mudye, muwone mphamvu pakufamba ulendo wanu.” Pakuti mwabwelambo kwamulanda wanu, nakutenepo iwo adati, “Chita bzawalewa.”
Abhurahamu adathamangila kutende kwake, adati kwankazi wake Sara, “Uchite bzakukulumiza, utakule mphimo zitatu zawufa wakunyodoka, ukanye uphike zingwa.”
Abhurahamu adayenda kuthanga labzifuwo bzake, adasankhula chimwana chang'ombe chakunenepa chabwino, achichipasa mulanda wake kuti akulumize kukonza.
Adatola khilimu, nankaka nanyama achibzipasa amunawo, iye nkuyima pana iwo munyantsi mwamuti iwo paakhadya.
Amunawo adazati kwa Abhurahamu, “Ko nkazi wako Sara ali kuponi?”
Chawuta adati, “Nin'zabwelela kwayiwe muchilimo, Sara nkazi wako an'zakhala namwana.”
Tsapano Abhurahamu na Sara akhadakalamba, Sara akhadayima kuyenda kumwezi.
Nakutenepo Sara adaseka chamuntima, iye adati, “Pakuti ine ndakalamba, nambuya wangumbo pomwe wakalamba. Ko ine ningakomedwe nanyi?”
Chawuta adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Thangwe lanyi Sara waseka, akuti, ‘Ningachite mwana ine ndakalamba tenepa?’
Ko pana chintazika na Chawuta? Nthawe ikakwana panin'zabwelela muchilimo, Sara an'zakhala namwana wachimuna.”
Koma Sara adalamba, adati, “Ndilibe kuseka,” Pakuti akhagopa. Iye adati, “Nee, iwe waseka.”
Amunawo adachoka pamwepo, nkulungama ku Sodhomu, Abhurahamu nkuwapelekeza.
Pamwepo Chawuta adati, “Ningabisile Abhurahamu bzandikuyenda kachita ku Sodhomu,
ndichidziwa kuti Abhurahamu an'zakhala nshowo ukulu waphamvu, mishowo yentse yadziko lapantsi in'zabzidalisa nayiye.

Ningachite lini tenepo, pakuti ndidamusankhula kuti azawuze wana wake nam'badwe wake kuteyeza njila za Chawuta, pakuchita chilungamo nakulinganiza; kuchitila kuti Chawuta azachite kwa Abhurahamu bzaadamutsimisa.”
Nakutenepo Chawuta adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Kulila kudanyanganana na Sodhomu na Gomora kwakula, pomwe chitazo chawo chakula kwene-kwene,
nakutenepo nim'buluka ndikawone panango akuchita bziniyendelana nakulila kwandidabva, peno nee ninkadziwa.”
Amuna awiliwo adachoka pamwepo nkulungama ku Sodhomu, koma Abhurahamu adasala adayima patsogolo pa Chawuta.
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adafendela pafupi na Chawuta, nkuti, “Ko n'chadidi kuti mukuyenda kapha wanthu wakulungama pabodzi nawakuyipa?
Ko peno muna wanthu wakulungama makumi mashanu (50) muguta, munkacheneka guta lentse, muchileka kalisiya nathangwe lawanthu makumi mashanu (50) wakulungama ali m'mwemo?

Mungachite lini tenepo, kuphela kubodzi wakulungama nawakuyipa! Kuchita kuti wakulungama awoneke ninga wakuyipa pomwe! Mungachite lini tenepo! Ko ntongi wadziko lapantsi lentse anfunika lini kutonga bzabwino?”
Chawuta adati, “Ndikawona mu Sodhomu muna wanthu makumi mashanu (50) wakulungama ninkaphwanya lini gutalo nathangwe lawanthu amwewo.”
Abhurahamu adati, “Ndabzichitisa ndekha kulewa-lewa nayimwe Chawuta, ne ndingakhale munthu wakukonzewa nadongo nadotha.
Ko peno pankasayika ashanu wakulungama pamakumi mashanu (50), munkaphwanya gutalo thangwe lakuti pasayika ashanu?” Iye adati, “Ninkaliphwanya lini ndikakawona muna makumi manayi naashanu” (45.)
Abhurahamu adabvunza pomwe, nkuti, “Ko peno munkawona muna makumi manayi” (40.)
Iye adati, “Ninkaliphwanya lini ndikakawona muna wanthu makumi manayi (40) wakulungama.”
Abhurahamu adati, “Ndaphatha minyendo lekani kukalipa, ninfuna kubvunza pomwe Mfumu, ko pakachita wanthu wabwino makumi matatu” (30?)
Iye adati, “Ninkaliphwanya lini ndikakawona muna wanthu makumi matatu” (30.)
Abhurahamu adati, “Wonani, Mfumu ndabzichitisa ndekha kulewa-lewa nayimwe. Ko munkawona muna wanthu wabwino makumi mawili” (20?)
Iye adati, “Ndikakawona muna wanthu makumi mawili (20) wakukhulupilika ninkaphwanya lini gutalo.”
Abhurahamu adati, “Mfumu lekani kukalipa pakuti ninfuna kukubvunzani pomwe, ko mukakawona muna wanthu khumi?”
Iye adati, “Nathangwe lawanthu khumi niniliphwanya lini.”
Chawuta paadamala kulewa-lewa na Abhurahamu adayenda, Abhurahamu nkubwelela kumbuto kwake.
Ngilozi ziwili zidabwela ku Sodhomu chakumawulo, pamwepo Loti akhadakhala pansuwo wa Sodhomu. Loti paadawona, adayenda kagumana nawo, adakotamisa nkope yake pantsi,

iye adati, “Azimbuya wangu, ndaphata minyendo, bwelani kunyumba kwamulanda wanu, mukagone kumweko usiku walelo, mukasambe nzayo zanu, muchizalamuka machibese-bese muchiyenda ulendo wanu.” Koma iwo adati, “Nee, tinkagona pansika.”
Koma iye adaatsungiliza bzakulimba, mpaka iwo adazabwelela nkuyenda kapita munyumba mwake. Adaakonzela feshita, adakonza zingwa ilibe chakufutisa, iwo nkudya.
Koma iwo anati agona, amuna wamuguta, amuna wamu Sodhomu, akulu naang'ono nawanthu wentse, adazungunuka nyumbayo;
adachemelela kwa Loti achiti, “Ali kuponi amuna abwela kwayiwe usiku? Abulise pano panja kuti tigone nawo!” Pamwepo amuna wamu Sodhomu akhafuna kugona nawo.
Nakutenepo Loti adabula panja pakhana amunawo, nkufunga nsuwo.
Adati kwayiwo, “Ndaphata minyendo, abale wangu, lekani kuchita chinthu chakuyipa tenepa.
Wonani, ndina wana wangu awili wachikazi anati adziwa amuna; lekani ndiwabwelese kwayimwe, muchite nawo bzamunfuna. Lekani kuchita chinango chinthu kwaamuna awa, pakuti mbaalendo wangu.”
Koma iwo adati, “Choka apa!” Adati, “Uyu nimulendo muno, koma waakufuna kutonga! Tsapano taakukuphata mwadima kuposa iwo.” Pamwepo iwo adagwinya Loti achiyesa kuphwanya nsuwo kuti apite nkati.
Koma amuna awili wale adakwekwetela Loti nkati nkufunga nsuwo.
Iwo adaachita kuti wanthu wentse akhali pansuwo wanyumba achite azimola, wentse akulu naang'ono, bzakuti adashupika, akhachita bzakupsapsadzila nsuwo.
Tsapano amuna awiliwo adati kwa Loti, “Ko iwe una anango wakwako muguta lino? Akuwasa, wana wachimuna, wana wachikazi panango munango wawunaye muguta, uwachose mumbuto ino;
pakuti ise taakuphwanya mbuto ino, pakuti kulila kwawanthu kwakula patsogolo pa Chawuta, iye watituma kuti tizaliphwanye.”

Loti adayenda kwaakuwasa wake awo akhali kuzaloola wana wake wachikazi, iye adati kwayiwo, “Chokani mumbuto ino, pakuti Chawuta waakuphwanya guta lino.” Koma akuwasa wake adawona ninga akundoseka nawo.
Nachakumadandakucha machibese-bese, ngilozizo zidati kwa Loti, “Sumuka utole nkazi wako nawana wako uyende, kuti uleke kufa pan'zalangiwa guta.”

Koma Loti, pakuti akhachedwa, adatochita bzakum'phata janja achim'bulisa muguta pabodzi nankazi wake, nawana wake wachikazi awili. Chawuta adamubvela chifundo, amunawo adamuchosa achim'bulisa kunja kwaguta.
Paadaabulisa kunja kwaguta inango gilozi idati, “Thawani muyende, lekani kuchewuka panango kuyima, muthawile kuphili kuti muleke kuchenekeka!”
Koma Loti adati kwayiwo, “Nee, azimbuya wangu.
Wonani, pakuti mwakomela ntima mulanda wanu, mwawonesa chifundo chikulu pakuchiza umoyo wangu; koma ningathawile lini kumapili, pakuti ngozi imweyi intiphata tinati tafika kumweko, tichifa.
Wonani, pana guta lili pafupi kuti tingathawileko, nikaguta kang'ono, lekani ndithawile kumweko, ko sikaguta kang'ono kale? Umoyo wangu un'chiziwa.”
Ngilozi idati, “Ninkuthandiza pomwe nayibzi, nimphwanya lini guta lawalewa.
Kamangu thawila kumweko; pakuti ninkwanisa lini kuchita chinango chinthu unati wafika kumweko.” Nakutenepo Guta limwelo adalipasa dzina lakuti Zoari.
Loti paadafika ku Zoari dzuwa likhatobula.
Pamwepo Chawuta adabvumbisa moto wasalufa muguta la Sodhomu na Gomora kuchoka kwa Chawuta kudzulu.
Adaphwanya maguta yentse, nachigowa chentse nawanthu wentse wamugutalo, nambewu zentse zaakhadabzala padziko.
Koma nkazi wa Loti akhateyela mbuyo, adachewuka nkusanduka chulu chamunyu.
Abhurahamu adalamuka machibese-bese nkuyenda pambuto paakhadayima na Chawuta.
Adanyangana ku Sodhomu na Gomora namuchigowa chamudziko lentse, adawona utsi uchichoka m'maguta yentse, ninga moto ukuchoka mubhayela.
Koma Mulungu paadaphwanya maguta yamuchigowa mukhakhala Loti, iye adazakumbuka Abhurahamu, nakutenepo adazabulisa Loti kuti aleke kufa.
Loti adazachoka mu Zoari, achikakhala m'mapili, pabodzi nawana wake awili wachikazi, pakuti akhagopa kukhala mu Zoari, nakutenepo adakakhala m'phako nawana wake awili.
Mwana wake wakuyamba adati kwamung'ono wake, “Apayi wathu akalamba, palibe amuna angatiloole padziko lino.
Ngatiwaledzelese navinyu kuti tikwanise kugona nawo, tikatenepo tin'zabala wana naapayi wathu.”
Nakutenepo usiku umwewo adaledzelesa apayi wawo, mwana wakuyamba adapita munyumba nkukagona naapayi wake; Loti alibe kudziwa chidachitika mwana wake paadabwela kuzagona naye napaadayenda.
Mangwana yache mwana wakuyamba wa Loti adati kwamung'ono wake, “Ine usiku wapitawu ndidagona naapayi, bwela tiwaledzelese pomwe kuti iwe ugonembo nawo usiku walelo, kuchitila kuti tichite wana.”
Nakutenepo usiku umwewo adaaledzelesa pomwe apayi wawo, mung'ono wache nkugona nawo. Loti alibe kudziwa chidachitika mwana wake paadabwela kuzagona naye napaadayenda.
Wana wa Loti wentse ali awili adaphata pathupi paapayi wawo.
Mwana wa Loti nkulu adabala mwana wachimuna achimpasa dzina lakuti Moabhi. Ndiko kudachoka m'badwe waa Moabhi.
Mwana wake mung'ono adabala mwana wachimuna achimpasa dzina lakuti Bheniami. Ndiko kudachoka m'badwe waa Amoni kufika nalelo.
Abhurahamu adachoka ku Mamure nkuyenda kudziko la Negebhu, kwaadakakhala pakati pa Kadheshi na Shuri, adakhalambo mu Gerari.
Kumweko Abhurahamu adalewa kuti Sara nkazi wake, “Ninana wangu.” Abhimeleki mambo waku Gerari adatuma wanthu katakula Sara.
Koma Mulungu usiku umwewo adafikila Abhimeleki kutulo nkuti kwayiye, “Uchafa nathangwe lankazi wamwen'chilo wawatakula.”
Koma Abhimeleki akhanati wagona naye, tsapano iye adati, “Mfumu, mungaphe wanthu alibe mulandu?
Ko sindiye yekha adalewa kwayine kuti, ‘Ninana wangu’? Nayiyembo nkazi wake adalewa yekha kuti, ‘Nimano wangu.’ Ine ndabzichita mwakusaya kudziwa, palibe chakuyipa chandikhakumbuka muntima mwangu.”

Pamwepo Mulungu adalewa-lewa naye kutulo, iye nkuti, “Yinde, nindziwa kuti iwe udabzichita mwakusaya kudziwa, palibe chakuyipa chawukhakumbuka muntima mwako. Ndine ndidabzichita kuti iwe uleke kunditazila, nakutenepo ine ndidachita kuti iwe uleke kugona naye.
Tsapano iwe bweza nkazi umweyo kwamwamuna wake, pakuti iye nimprofita, akupemphelele kuti uleke kufa. Koma ukaleka kum'bweza iwe nawanthu wako chadidi mwentse munifa.”
Nakutenepo mangwana yache machibese-bese Abhimeleki adachemela manduna yake achiwawuza bzentse bzikhadachitika, manduna yake yadabva mantha.

Pamwepo Abhimeleki adachemela Abhurahamu nkuti kwayiye, “N'chinyi ichi chawachita kwayise? Ko ndidakutazilanyi kubwelesa chakuyipa chikulu kwayine nawumambo wangu? Wachita kwayine bzinthu bzinfunika lini kuchitiwa.”
Abhimeleki adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Ko ukhakumbukanyi pawukhachita chinthu chakutenepachi?”
Abhurahamu adati, “Ine ndidakumbuka kuti wanthu wamudziko lino an'gopa lini Mulungu, nakutenepo ndidagopa kuti angandiphe thangwe lankazi wangu.
Chadidi, n'chakuti uyu ninana wangu. Mwana waapayi wangu, koma alibe kubadwa naamayi wangu, nakutenepo ndidazamuloola.

Mulungu paadandichosa mubanja laapayi wangu, ndichiyenda kumadziko yachilendo, ndidamuwuza kuti, ‘Iwe uwonese kukhulupilila kwako kwayine, kwentse kwatiniyenda iwe uniwuza wanthu kuti uyu nimano wangu.’ ”
Pamwepo Abhimeleki adatola mabila nang'ombe naalanda wachikazi nawachimuna achibzipeleka kwa Abhurahamu, adabweza nkazi wake Sara kwayiye.
Abhimeleki adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Wona, dziko lentse lawukuwonali nilangu, nakutenepo yenda ukakhale pawunfuna.”
Adati kwa Sara, “Ndapasa mano wako bzigodo bzasiliva sawuzande, (1,000) kuwonesa kuti ulibe mulandu, ndakuchenesa wanthu wentse wawunawo achiwona.”
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adapemphela kwa Mulungu, Mulungu nkupolesa Abhimeleki nankazi wake, naalandakazi wake kuti akwanise pomwe kubala wana.
Nathangwe labzikhadachitika kwa Sara nkazi wa Abhurahamu, Chawuta akhadachita kuti akazi wentse wamunyumba ya Abhimeleki aleke kubala.
Chawuta adadalisa Sara ninga kulewa kwaadachita, pomwe Chawuta adachita kwa Sara bzaakhadatsimikiza.
Sara adaphata pathupi nkubalila Abhurahamu mwana wachimuna, panthawe yaakhadakalamba, panthawe ikhadalewedwa na Mulungu kuti an'zabadwa.
Abhurahamu adapasa dzina mwana waadabaliliwa na Sara lakuti Isaki.
Abhurahamu adagwata nyama yakhanda yachimuna mwanayo paakhana ntsiku zisele, kuteyeza bzaadawuziwa na Mulungu.
Abhurahamu akhana magole dzana Isaki paadabadwa.
Pamwepo Sara adati, “Mulungu wachita kuti ndikondwe ndiseke, koma wentse an'zabva nabzakubala kwangu an'zandiseka.”
Nakutenepo iye adazati, “Ko mbani akhadalewa kwa Abhurahamu kuti Sara angayamwise mwana? Koma ine ndam'balila mwana wachimuna kuwunkhalamba wake.”
Mwana adazakula nkumulekesa nkaka. Ntsiku yaadamulekesa nkaka, Abhurahamu adamuchitila feshita ikulu.
Ntsiku inango Sara adawona Ishimayeli mwana wachimuna wa Hagari mu Ijipiti, waadabalila Abhurahamu, achinyomba mwana wake Isaki.
Pamwepo Sara adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Thamangisa mulandakazi uyu namwana wake, pakuti mwana wamulanda uyu anfunika lini kuzadya nthaka pabodzi namwana wangu Isaki.”
Ibzi bzidawawa Abhurahamu pakuti Ishimayeli akhali mwana wake pomwe.

Koma Mulungu adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Leka kuwawidwa nabzamwana uyu namulandakazi wako Hagari. Iwe chita bzawawuziwa na Sara, pakuti ndidatsimikiza kale kuti m'badwe wako un'zachemelewa nadzina la Isaki.
Nin'zachitambo pomwe mwana wamulandakazi wako nshowo ukulu, pakuti iye nim'badwe wako pomwe.”

Mangwana yache Abhurahamu adalamuka machibese-bese nkutola zingwa nachola chakhanda chamadzi, nkubzipeleka kwa Hagari, adam'belekesa mwana wake, achimuwuza kuti ayende bzake. Hagari adasumuka nkuyenda achindozungayila muchipululu chamu Bheeri-shebha.
Madzi yakhali muchola payadamala Hagari adayikha mwana munyantsi mwachidzambwa.
Pamwepo iye adayenda, adakakhala patali pang'ono mamita dzana, adakumbuka chamuntima nkuti, “Ninfuna lini kuwona kufa kwamwana wangu.” Adakhala pamwepo achiwongota.
Mulungu adabva kulila kwamwana ule, ngilozi ya Mulungu idachemela Hagari ili kudzulu, idati kwayiye, “N'chinyi chakushupa, Hagari? Leka kugopa pakuti Mulungu wabva kulila kwamwana wako.
Sumuka takula mwana wako, umuphate m'manja, pakuti ine nin'zachita kuti nshowo wake uwe ukulu.”
Pamwepo Mulungu adamufungula maso, iye nkuwona n'chela wamadzi. Hagari adayenda katunga madzi nkudzadza chola chake nkumwesa mwana wakeyo.
Mulungu adatsogolela Ishimayeli, iye adakula achikhala muchipululu, adazawa nyabezi wakupha nyama nawutati.
Akhakhala muchipululu chamu Parani, amayi wake adazamuloolela nkazi wachi Ijipiti.
Nthawe imweyo Abhimeleki na Fikoli nkulu wankhondo yake adayenda kwa Abhurahamu, achikati, “Ndawona kuti Mulungu anayiwe pabzinthu bzako bzentse bzawun'chita.

Tsapano iwepo lumbila kwayine mudzina la Mulungu kuti un'zandinamiza lini, ne nakum'badwe wangu wentse. Koma Ine ndawonesa kukhulupilika kwangu kwayiwe, nayiwembo pomwe uwonese kukhulupilika kwako kwayine nakudziko lawukukhala.”
Abhurahamu paadadandawulila Abhimeleki nabzan'chela ukhadapambiwa naalanda wake,
Abhimeleki adati, “Nin'dziwa lini kuti mbani adachita bzimwebzo, ine ndilibe kubzibva mpaka lelo.”
Nakutenepo Abhurahamu adatola mabila nang'ombe achibzipasa Abhimeleki, amuna awiliwo adachita chibvano.
Abhurahamu adapatula wana wamabila akazi anomwe, achiwayikha pambali.
Abhimeleki adati kwa Abhurahamu, “Ko wana wamabila akazi anomwe wawapatulawa anilewanyi.”
Abhurahamu adati, “Tambila wana wamabila awa anomwe, kuti ukhale mboni yangu kuti ndine ndidachela n'chelawu.”
Nakutenepo mbuto imweyo ikhachemelewa kuti Bheeri-shebha, pakuti iwo ali awili adalumbila.
Paadamala kuchita chibvano pa Bheeri-shebha, Abhimeleki na Fikoli nkulu wankhondo, adabwelela kudziko lawo laa Filistia.
Abhurahamu adabzala muti wamutamarisiki pa Bheeri-shebha, nkupemphela Chawuta Mulungu wachikhalilo.
Abhurahamu adakhala mudziko laa Filistia kwanthawe itali.
Pambuyo payibzi, Mulungu adayesa Abhurahamu, adati kwayiye, “Abhurahamu,” iye adati, “Ndili pano.”
Mulungu adati, “Tola mwana wako Isaki, umweyo m'bodzi yekha wawunfuna uyende naye kudziko la Moriya, ukamuchite ntsembe yakutentha kuphili landiti ndikuwuze.”

Mangwana yache machibese-bese Abhurahamu adayikha chakukhalila padhonki lake, nkutola alanda wake awili namwana wake wachimuna Isaki. Adatema nkhuni zakukatenthesa ntsembe, adasumuka nkuyenda kumbuto yaakhadawuziwa na Mulungu.
Ntsiku yachitatu Abhurahamu adanyangana nkuwona mbuto patali.
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adati kwaalanda wake, “Imwe salani pano nadhonki ili, ine namwana tikuyenda kapemphela kumbuto iyo yamukuwona, tichizabwelela bzathu.”
Abhurahamu adatakulisa mwana wake Isaki nkhuni zakukatenthesa ntsembe, iye adatakula moto nachisu, wentse ali awili nkuyenda.
Isaki adati kwaapayi wake Abhurahamu, “Apayi!” Iye adati, “N'chinyi mwanangu.” Iye adati, “Moto nankhuni tinabzo, ko bila lakukapeleka ntsembe lili kuponi?”
Abhurahamu adadayila, “Mulungu ndiye ankawona bila lakukapeleka ntsembe, mwanangu.” Nakutenepo wentse ali awili adayenda bzawo.

Paadafika pambuto yaakhadawuziwa na Mulungu, Abhurahamu adamanga mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe pamwepo, nkulongapo nkhuni. Adamanga mwana wake nkumugonesa padzulu pambuto yakupelekela ntsembe padzulu pankhuni.
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adapfuthula janja lake kutola chisu kuti aphe mwana wake.
Koma ngilozi ya Chawuta idamuchemela kuchoka kudzulu, idati kwayiye, “Abhurahamu, Abhurahamu.”

Ngilozi idati, “Leka kupfuthula janja lako pamwana, panango kuchita chinthu chili chentse payiye, tsapano ine ndawona kuti iwe un'gopa Mulungu, pakuti iwe ulibe kulamba kundipasa mwana wako m'bodzi yekha.”
Abhurahamu adanyangana-nyangana nkuwona nkono wabila udaphatiwa nyanga muchidzambwa. Nakutenepo Abhurahamu adakatakula bilayo, achimpeleka ntsembe yakutentha pambuto pamwana wake.
Abhurahamu adapasa mbutoyo dzina lakuti, “Chawuta an'zawona.” Nalelo mbutoyo in'chemelewa kuti, “Paphili la Chawuta an'zawona.”
Pamwepo ngilozi ya Chawuta idachemela Abhurahamu kachiwili kuchoka kudzulu, idati,
“Chawuta wati, ‘Ninilumbila nadzina langu,’ pakuti iwe wanditetekela, ulibe kulamba kupeleka mwana wako m'bodzi yekha.
Nin'zakudalisa, nin'zawandisa m'badwe wako ninga nyenyezi zakudzulu, pomwe ninga n'chenga wamunyanja. M'badwe wako un'zakunda azondi wawo.
Kupitila mum'badwe wako, mishowo yentse yapadziko in'zadalisiwa, pakuti wanditetekela.”
Nakutenepo Abhurahamu adabwelela kwaakhadasiya alanda wake, adasumuka nkubwelela ku Bheeri-shebha kwaakhakhala, Abhurahamu adakhala mu Bheeri-shebha.
Pambuyo payibzi, Abhurahamu adazawuziwa kuti, “Milika adabalila m'bale wake Nahori wana.”
Wakuyamba akhali Uzi, kuchizabwela Bhuzi m'bale wake, na Kemueli payi wa Aramu,
kuchizabwela Kesedhi na Hazo na Piridhashi na Jidhirafu na Bhetuyeli.
Bhetuyeli adakhala apayi wa Rabheka. Awa wana asele adabaliwa na Milika nkazi wa Nahori, m'bale wa Abhurahamu.
Nkazi mung'ono wa Nahori akhachemelewa Rehuma uyo adabala Tebha na Gahamu na Tahashi na Maaka.
Sara adakhala wamoyo kwamagole dzana namakumi mawili nanomwe (127). Yamweya ndiyo magole yadalalama Sara.
Sara adazafela mu Kiriyati-aribha iyo ikhachemelewa pomwe kuti Hebhuroni, mudziko la Kenani. Kumweko Abhurahamu adakalila nkazi wake.
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adasiya chitanda chili munyumba nkuyenda kwaa Hiti kwaadakati,
“Ine ndine mulendo mudziko lino landikukhala pakati panu, ndipaseniko mbuto kuti ikhale manda, kuti ndikayikhe nkazi wangu kumweko.”
Wanthu wachi Hiti adati kwa Abhurahamu,

“Mbuya wathu, tetekelani kwayise, imwe ndimwe wakulemekezeka pakati pathu. Sankhulani mbuto yabwino yamungawone nkati mwamanda yathu, palibe munango wathu angakulambizeni manda yake, panango kukulambizani kuyikha chitanda chanu.”
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adasumuka nkukotamisa nkhope yake pantsi, achiwonesa ulemu kwaa Hiti, wanthu wambuto imweyo.
Iye adati kwayiwo, “Peno imwe mwabvuma kuti ndikayikhe nkazi wangu, tsapano ndiwuzilenimbo Efuroni mwana wa Zofari,
kuti andipase mphako yapa Makipera chakumbali kwamunda wake. Ninimpagali masheleni yaaninga walewa mwentse muchiwona, kuti ndikhalembo nambuto yangu yakuyikha wanthu wangu akafa.”
Tsapano Efuroni akhadakhala pakati paa Hiti, pamwepo Efuroni mu Hiti adadayila Abhurahamu a Hiti wentse achibva, awo wentse akhadapita napansuwo waguta.
Iye adati, “Nee, mbuya wangu, nditetekeleni, ninkupasani munda namphako ili m'mwemo kuti bzikhale manda yanu. Ine ndaakukupasani wanthu wentse achibva, tsapano kayikheni chitanda chanu.”
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adakotamisa nkhope yake patsogolo pawanthu wamudziko limwelo.

Iye adadayila Efuroni wanthu wentse wamudziko limwelo achibva, iye adati, “Ndaphata minyendo, ine ninkupasani masheleni yakugula mandayo, tambilani kuchitila kuti ndikwanise kuyikha wanthu wangu kumweko akafa.”
“Mbuya wangu, ibvani, mbuto imweyi in'guliwa namasheleni yasiliva mazana manayi (400) basi, n'chinyi kwamunthu ninga iwe nayine? Imwe yendani mukayikhe chitanda chanu.”
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adabvana na Efuroni achimpasa masheleni yaadalewa, adampasa masheleniyo wanthu wentse achibva. Adapagali masheleni yamasiliva mazana manayi (400) kuteyeza mphimo yaanyamalonda.
Nakutenepo munda wa Efuroni waku Makipela chakumabveladzuwa kwa Mamure, munda namphako ikhali m'mundamo namiti yentse ikhali pamwepo,
bzidapasiwa Abhurahamu kuti bzikhale bzake, ibzi bzidachitika a Hiti awo wentse akhadapita napansuwo waguta achibva.
Pambuyo payibzi, Abhurahamu adayikha nkazi wake Sara m'mphako yaku Makipera, chakumabveladzuwa kwa Mamure, iyo ikhachemelewa pomwe kuti Hebhuroni, mudziko la Kenani.
Munda namphako ikhali m'mwemo bzidapelekewa kwa Abhurahamu naa Hiti kuti ikhale mbuto yakuyikha wanthu.
Tsapano Abhurahamu akhadakalamba, Chawuta akhadamudalisa pabzinthu bzake bzentse.
Abhurahamu adati kwamulanda wake nkulu wamunyumba mwake, uyo akhanyangana bzentse bzapanyumba pake. Adati kwayiye, “Ndaphata minyendo, yikha janja lako pantsi panchafu yangu,
ndikulumbilise nadzina la Chawuta, Mulungu wakudzulu napantsi, kuti un'zaloolela lini mwana wangu nkazi pakati paatsikana wamuno mu Kenani wandikukhala nawo,
Koma iwe un'zayenda kudziko langu, kwaabale wangu, ukaloolele mwana wangu Isaki nkazi kumweko.”
Mulandayo adati, “Ko peno nkaziyo ankalamba kubwela kuno nayine, ninkachita tani? Ndizayende pabodzi na Isaki kudziko lamudachoka?”
Abhurahamu adati kwayiye, “Nee, leka kuyendesa mwana wangu kumweko.

Chawuta, Mulungu wakudzulu adandichosa mudziko laapayi wangu, mudziko mwandidabadwiliwa, adalewa-lewa achilumbila kwayine achiti, ‘Nin'zapeleka dziko limweli kum'badwe wako,’ an'zatuma ngilozi yake patsogolo pako, kuti ukaloolele nkazi mwana wangu kumweko.
Peno nkazi umweyo ankalamba kubwela nayiwe, iwe watsudzuliwa pakukulumbilisa kwandachita, koma iwe leka kuyenda namwana wangu kumweko.”
Nakutenepo mulandayo adayikha janja lake pantsi panchafu yambuya wake Abhurahamu, iye nkulumbila pankhani iyi.
Pamwepo mulandayo adatola ngamela zambuya wake khumi, nampfupo zakusiyana-siyana zaadapasiwa nambuya wake, nkuyenda kudziko la Mesopotamiya kuguta la Nahori.
Adachita kuti ngamela zake zigone kunja kwaguta pan'chela wamadzi, nthawe yakumawulo, nthawe iniyenda katunga madzi akazi.
Iye adati, “Chawuta, Mulungu wambuya wangu Abhurahamu, ndaphata minyendo, chitani kuti bzandafambila lelo bzichitike, onesani ntsisi nachifundo chanu kwambuya wangu Abhurahamu.
Wonani, ndidayima pano pan'chela wamadzi, wana wachikazi wawanthu wamuguta akubwela kuzatunga madzi.

Ntsikana wandichati nditungileko madzi ndimwe, iye akati, ‘Imwani, nimpasambo pomwe ngamela zanu madzi,’ umweyo awe ntsikana wamwasankhulila mulanda wanu Isaki. Mukatenepo nin'zadziwa kuti mwachitila ntsisi mbuya wangu.”
Akanati wamala kupemphela, padafika Rabheka, mwana wachitsikana wa Bhetuyeli, mwana wa Milika nkazi wa Nahori m'bale wa Abhurahamu. Rabheka adafika adatakula n'golo wake.
Rabheka akhali ntsikana akhadakoma nkhope kwene-kwene, akhanati wadziwa mwamuna. Adapita mun'chela nkutungilila n'golo wake nkubula.
Pamwepo mulanda ule adathamanga kwayiye nkuti, “Ndaphata minyendo ndipaseko madzi mang'ono-ng'ono kuchoka mun'golo wako ndimwe.”
Iye adati, “Imwani bzanu mbuya wangu,” pamwepo iye adapeleka n'golo wamadzi, mulandayo nkumwa.
Mulandayo paadamwa madzi, Rabheka adati kwayiye, “Nintungulambo pomwe madzi ngamela zanu mpaka zakwana.”
Nakutenepo adathulula madzi mukhamwela bzifuwo, adathamanga pomwe mun'chela nkutunga madzi kufikila ngamela zentse zakwana.
Mwamuna ule adandoti dwii, adanyamala bzake, achifuna kudziwa kuti n'chadidi Chawuta wamutsogolela bzaakhadafambila panango nee.
Ngamela pazidamwa madzi, mulanda ule adatola mphete yagolidhe ikhalema kati-nakati yashekele, namakhoza mawili yakhalema mashekele khumi yagolidhe,
iye adati, “Ndiwuze kuti ndiwe mwana wayani, ko tingawone pakugona kunyumba kwaapayi wako?”
Iye adati, “Ndine mwana wa Bhetuyeli, mwana wa Milika nkazi wa Nahori.”
Iye adazati pomwe kwayiye, “Bzentse bziliko, chakudya chinkwana bzifuwo bzanu chiliko napakugona palipo.”
Munthu ule adakotamisa nkhope yake nkupemphela Chawuta.

Iye adati, “Ngaadalisiwe Chawuta, Mulungu wambuya wangu Abhurahamu, uyo alibe kusiya ntsisi zake nachikhulupililo chake kwambuya wangu. Chawuta wanditsogolela, nkundifikisa kunyumba yaabale wambuya wangu.”
Pamwepo ntsikana ule adathamanga kawuza wanyumba yaamayi wake bzentse bzikhadachitika.
Rabheka akhana mano wake akhachitiwa Labhani. Labhani adathamanga kun'chela kukhana mwamunayo.
Paadawona mphete namakoza m'manja mwanana wake, nakubva bzidalongosolewa na Rabheka nana wake, Labhani adayenda kwamwamuna ule, adakamuwona adayima pan'chela nangamela zake.
Labhani adati, “Tiyendeni kunyumba imwe munthu wakudalisiwa na Chawuta, thangwe lanyi mukuyima kunja kuno? Ine ndakonza kale nyumba nambuto yangamela zanu.”
Nakutenepo mwamuna ule adayenda kunyumba kwa Labhani. Labhani adatsudzula ngamela zile, nkumpasa chakudya changamela, nkumpasa namadzi yakusamba nzayo zake iye nawanthu waakhanawo.
Paadampasa chakudya, mwamuna ule adati, “Ningadye lini ndinati ndalewa bzandabwelela.”
Nakutenepo iye adati, “Ndine mulanda wa Abhurahamu.
Chawuta adadalisa mbuya wangu, adachita kuti akhale nachuma chizinji kwene-kwene. Adampasa mabila nambuzi nang'ombe nasiliva nagolidhe naalanda wachimuna nawachikazi nangamela namadhonki.
Sara nkazi wambuya wanguyo, adabalila mbuya wangu mwana watokalamba. Mbuya wangu adapasa mwana umweyo bzentse bzaanabzo.
Mbuya wangu adandilumbilisa ine, adati, ‘Leka kuloolela mwana wangu nkazi pakati paatsikana wamuno mu Kenani mudziko landikukhala.
Koma iwe yenda kunyumba yaapayi wangu, kwaabale wangu, ukamuloolele nkazi kumweko.’
Pamwepo ine ndidati kwambuya wangu, ‘Ko peno nkaziyo ankalamba kubwela nayine.’
Koma iye adati, ‘Chawuta wanimpemphela achatuma ngilozi yake kuti ikutsogoleleni kuchitila kuti bzawukufambila bzikakwanisike, ukaloolele mwana wangu nkazi kwaabale wangu, kunyumba yaapayi wangu,
ukatenepo iwe un'zakhala wakutsudzuka pakukulumbilisa kwandidachita. Iwe ukafika kwaabale wangu, iwo akakaleka kukupasa nkazi, iwe watsudzuliwa pakukulumbilisa kwandachita.’
“Nakutenepo lelo pandafika pan'chela, ndapemphela ndichiti, ‘Chawuta, Mulungu wambuya wangu Abhurahamu, ndaphata minyendo, chitani kuti bzandafambila bzichitike.’
Wonani, ndidayima pan'chela wamadzi, pakabwela ntsikana kuzatunga madzi ndikati kwayiye, ‘Ndaphata minyendo ndipaseko madzi mang'ono-ng'ono kuchoka mun'golo wako ndimwe.’ ”
Akati, “Imwani bzanu, nintungilambo pomwe madzi ngamela zanu,” umweyo ngaawe nkazi wasankhuliliwa mwana wambuya wangu na Chawuta.

“Ndinati ndamaliza kupemphela chamuntima, ndidazawona Rabheka achibwela adatakula n'golo wake paphewa, adapita mun'chela nkutunga madzi, pamwepo ine ndidati kwayiye, ‘Ndaphata minyendo ndipaseko madzi ndimwe.’
Pamwepo iye kankulumiza, adatula n'golo wake nkuti, ‘Imwani, nimpasambo pomwe madzi ngamela zanu.’ Nakutenepo ine ndidamwa madzi, iye nkupasambo pomwe ngamela.

Pamwepo ine ndidamubvunza kuti, ‘Ndiwe mwana wayani?’ Iye nkuti, ‘Ndine mwana wa Bhetuyeli, mwana wachimuna wa Nahori waadabaliliwa na Milika.’ Nakutenepo ine ndidam'bvadzika mphete pamphuno, namakoza m'manja mwake.

Pamwepo ndidakotamisa nsolo wangu, ndichipemphela Chawuta, ndichidalisa Chawuta Mulungu wambuya wangu Abhurahamu, uyo adanditsogolela kuti ndilungame kwaabale wambuya wangu, kuti ndikaloolele nkazi mwana wambuya wangu.
Tsapano peno imwe munfuna kuwonesa chifundo nakukhulupilika kwambuya wangu, ndiwuzeni, peno nee, ndiwuzeni ndiwone kwakuyenda.”
Pamwepo Labhani naapayi wake Bhetuyeli adati, “Pakuti ibzi bzachitiwa na Chawuta, ise tingalewe-lewe lini kwayiwe chabwino panango chakuyipa.
Rabheka ndiye uyu ali pano patsogolo panu mungayende naye akakhale nkazi wamwana wambuya wanu, kuteyeza kulewa kwa Chawuta.”
Mulanda wa Abhurahamu paadabva mafala yadalewedwa, adakotamisa nsolo pantsi nkupemphela Chawuta.
Mulanda ule adachosa bzakukomedzesa bzasiliva nagolidhe nabzakubvala achibzipasa Rabheka. Adazapasambo mano wake Labhani naamayi wake mpfupo zabwino.
Mulanda ule nawanthu waakhanawo adadya nakumwa, achigona pamwepo. Mangwana yache machibese paadalamuka iye adati, “Lekani ndibwelele kwaambuya wangu.”
Mano wake naamayi wake adati, “Mwatani kuti ntsikana umweyu ambakakhalako pano nayise kwakanthawe kang'ono-ng'ono, kwan'tsiku khumi achizayenda bzake.”
Koma iye adati, “Lekani kundichedwesa, pakuti Chawuta wanditsogolela kale bzandafambila. Ndibvumileni ndibwelele kwambuya wangu.”
Iwo adati, “Chemelani Rabheka tibve kuti iye anti tani.”
Iwo adachemela Rabheka, nkuti kwayiye, “Ko unfuna kuyenda namwamuna uyu?” Iye adati, “Yinde, niniyenda.”
Nakutenepo iwo adabvuma kuti iye ayende nanyakayaya wake namulanda wa Abhurahamu nawanthu wake.
Pamwepo iwo adadalisa Rabheka, adati kwayiye, “Iwe ukakhale amayi wamasawuzande yamasawuzande khumi, m'badwe wako un'zakulila maguta yaazondi wawo.”
Nakutenepo Rabheka naalanda wake wachitsikana adasumuka nkukwila ngamela zawo, achiteyela mwamuna ule. Mulandayo adatola Rabheka nkuyenda ulendo wawo.
Tsapano Isaki akhadachoka ku Bheeri-lahayi-royi, achikakhala ku Negebhu.
Chakumawulo Isaki adayenda kumunda achikumbuka bzake, paadanyangana adawona ngamela zichibwela.
Rabheka adanyangana, paadawona Isaki adabuluka kuchoka pangamela yake,
adati kwamulanda, “Ko mwamuna akufamba m'munda kuzatichungula mbani?” Mulanda ule adati, “Ni mbuya wangu.” Rabheka adatola nguwo yake nkubzifinika kumaso.
Mulanda ule adazalongosolela Isaki bzentse bzikhadachitika pawulendo wake.

Pamwepo Isaki adatola Rabheka nkuyenda naye mutenti yake mukhakhala amayi wake Sara, ntsikanayo adakhala nkazi wake, pakuti adafuna Rabheka, nakutenepo iye adanyamaliziwa kulila kwaakhachita amayi wake.
Abhurahamu adaloola munango nkazi, dzina lake akhachitiwa Ketura.
Ketura adam'balila, Zimurani na Jokishani na Medhani na Midhiyani na Ishibhagi na Shuwa.
Jokishani akhali apayi wa Shebha na Dhedhani. Wana wa Dhedhani akhali Ashurimu na Letushimu na Lewumimu.
Wana wa Midhiyani akhali Efa na Eferi na Hanoki na Abhidha na Elidha. Awa wentse akhali wana wa Ketura.
Abhurahamu adapasa mwana wake Isaki bzentse bzaakhanabzo.
Koma kwawana wankazi mung'ono, Abhurahamu adaapasa mpfupo. Iye paakhachana moyo adaachosa pakhana mwana wake Isaki achiwayendesa kudziko lakumabveladzuwa.
Abhurahamu adalalama padziko kwamagole dzana namakumi manomwe namashanu (175).
Pamwepo Abhurahamu adazamalizika watokalambilatu, nkhalamba yamagole mazinji, adayikhiwa kudayikhiwa wam'badwe wake.
Isaki na Ishimayeli, wana wake adamuyikha mumphako yapa Makipela, m'munda wa Efuroni mwana wa Zohari mu Hiti, chakumabveladzuwa kwa Mamure,
m'munda waadagula Abhurahamu kwa Efuroni mwana wa Zohari mu Hiti. Abhurahamu nankazi wake Sara adayikhiwa pamwepo.
Pambuyo pakufa kwa Abhurahamu. Mulungu adadalisa mwana wake Isaki, Isaki adakhala pa Bheeri-lahayi-royi.
Uwu ndiwo m'badwe wa Ishimayeli, mwana wa Abhurahamu waadabaliliwa na Hagari mu Ijipiti, ule akhali mulanda wa Sara.
Aya ndiyo madzina yawana wa Ishimayeli. M'badwe umwewu udapasiwa madzina kuteyeza kubadwa kwawo; mwana wakuyamba wa Ishimayeli akhali Nebhayoti, kuchizabwela Kedhari na Adhibheyeli na Mibhusamu,
na Mishima na Dhuma na Masa,
na Hadhadhi na Tema na Jeturi na Nafishi na Kedhima.
