Awa ndiwo wana wa Ishimayeli, aya ndiyo madzina yawo, kuteyeza miyi yawo, namatenti yawo, anemwanamambo khumi namawili kuteyeza madzinza yawo.
Ishimayeli adakhala kwamagole dzana namakumi matatu nanomwe (137), adamalizika achikayikhiwa kudayikhiwa wakwake.
Iwo adakhala kuchoka Havila kufika ku Shuri, ikhadanyanganana na Ijipiti, kumbali ya Asiriya; adakhala adanyanganana naabale wake wentse.
Uwu ndiwo m'badwe wa Isaki mwana wa Abhurahamu: Abhurahamu akhali apayi wa Isaki.
Isaki akhana magole makumi manayi (40), paadaloola nkazi wake Rabheka mwana wa Bhetuyeli mu Aramu waku Padhaniaramu, nana wa Labhani mu Aramu.
Isaki adapemphela kwa Chawuta achikumbilila nkazi wake Rabheka, pakuti akhalibe mbeleko. Chawuta adabva pemphelo la Isaki, Rabheka nkuphata pathupi.
Wana adashupana m'mimba mwake, iye adati, “Tsono peno ntenepa chanin'khalila wamoyo n'chinyi?” Nakutenepo adazayenda kabvunza Chawuta.
Nthawe yakubala kwake payidafika, adabala mapasa.
Wakuyamba adabula ali wakuphsukuluka, thupi lake lentse likhadachita ninga n'khanjo wawukuse, achimpasa dzina lakuti Esau.
Pambuyo pache padabula m'bale wake adaphata chithatha cha Esau, achimpasa dzina lakuti Jakobho.
Wana amwewo adakula, Esau adakhala nkhumbalume nyabezi, munthu wan'thengo, Jakobho akhali munthu wakunyamala, akhafuna bzakukhala pamatenti.
Isaki adafuna Esau, pakuti akhafuna kudya nyama yan'thengo yakham'bwelesela, koma Rabheka adafuna Jakobho.
Ntsiku inango Jakobho paakhaphika phala, Esau adafika achichoka n'thengo wafa nanjala.
Esau adati kwa Jakobho, “Leka ndidyeko phala lifuyila, pakuti ndikubva njala.” Ndibzo bzidazachitisa kuti achemelewe nadzina lakuti Edhomu.
Esawu adati, “Pakuti ine ndaakufa nanjala, ukulu un'thandizanyi?”
Jakobho adati, “Tsapano yamba walumbila kwayine.” Nakutenepo iye adalumbila kwayiye, adagulisila ukulu wake kwa Jakobho.
Pamwepo Jakobho adapasa Esau zingwa naphala lanyemba, adadya nakumwa, adayenda ulendo wake. Ndiko kudzonga kudachita Esau ukulu wake.
Tsapano mudziko mudagwa njala kuposa njala idambachitikako munthawe ya Abhurahamu. Isaki adayenda ku Gerari, kwa Abhimeleki mambo waa Filistia.
Chawuta adabziwonesa kwayiye, iye adati, “Leka kuyenda ku Ijipiti, khala mudziko landichakuwuza.
Khala mudziko ili, ine nin'zakutsogolela, nin'zakudalisa, pakuti kwayiwe nakum'badwe wako nin'zapeleka madziko yentse aya. Nin'zadzadzikiza kulumbila kwandidachita kwaapayi wako Abhurahamu.
Nin'zawandisa m'badwe wako kulingana nanyenyezi zakudzulu, nin'zapeleka kum'badwe wako madziko yentse. M'badwe wako un'zachitisa kuti madzinza yentse yapadziko yadalisiwe,
pakuti Abhurahamu akhatetekela fala langu, achiteyeza bzandikhamuwuza kuti achite, nakuchengeta mitemo yangu.”

Wanthu wamudziko limwelo paadam'bvunza nabzankazi wake iye adati, “Ninana wangu.” Iye alibe kufuna kuti bzidziwike, kuti akhali nkazi wake, pakuti akhagopa kuti angamuphe achitola Rabheka, pakuti akhadakoma nkhope kwene-kwene.
Isaki paakhali kumweko kwanthawe itali, Abhimeleki mambo waa Filistia adanyangana napazhanela, nkuwona Isaki achiphata-phata nkazi wake Rabheka.
Pamwepo Abhimeleki adachemelesa Isaki nkuti kwayiye, “Mangwesa uyu ninkazi wako! Thangwe lanyi ukhalewa kuti ninana wako?”
Isaki adati, “Ndikhagopa kuphewa ndipo pandidazati ninana wangu.”
Abhimeleki adati, “Thangwe lanyi kuchita bzatenepo kwayise? Ko ninga mwamuna munango akhadagona nankazi wako, ukhachitisa kuti ise tikhale namulandu ukulu.”
Nakutenepo Abhimeleki adachenjeza wanthu wentse, iye adati, “Munthu amphata-phata mwamuna uyu panango nkazi wake am'phewa.”
Isaki adabzala mbewu zake mudziko limwelo, mugole limwelo adakolola kadapetewa kadzana pakuti Chawuta adamudalisa.
Mwamunayo adakhupuka kwene-kwene, adapitiliza kusumukila mpaka adazakhala wachuma.
Akhana bzifuwo bzake bzizinji, akhana ng'ombe namabila naalanda azinji bzidazachitisa kuti a Filistia ayambe kumuchitila nchanje.
Tsapano a Filistia adafuchila nadongo michela yentse idafukuliwa naalanda waapayi wake, muntsiku za Abhurahamu apayi wake.
Abhimeleki adati kwa Isaki, “Chokani muno, pakuti mwawa namphamvu kuposa ise.”
Nakutenepo Isaki adachoka kumweko, achikamanga matenti yake muchigowa cha Gerari, kwaadakakhala.

Isaki adafukula pomwe michela ikhadafukuliwa muntsiku zaapayi wake Abhurahamu, pakuti Abhurahamu paadafa, a Filistia adafuchila michela imweyo. Michelayo adazayipasa madzina yakhadambapelekewa naapayi wake.
Koma alanda wa Isaki paadachela n'chela muchigowa, n'chela umwewo ukhamala lini madzi.
Anyakabusa wamu Gerari adayamba kushupana naanyakabusa wa Isaki, iwo akhati, “Madzi aya niyathu.” Isaki adazapasa n'chelawo dzina lakuti, “Kushupana.”
Tsapano alanda wa Isaki adazachela pomwe unango n'chela, koma adayamba pomwe kushupana naanyakabusa wamu Gerari pan'chela umwewo. N'chelawo Isaki adazawupasa dzina lakuti, “Chizondo.”

Isaki adazachoka pamwepo achikachela unango n'chela, pan'chela umwewo alibe kuzashupana. Adazawupasa dzina lakuti, Rehobhoti, bzichilewa kuti, “Ntetete,” adati, “Chawuta watipasa mbuto ikulu kuti tiwande.”
Tsapano Isaki adazachoka pamwepo nkuyenda ku Bheeri-shebha.

Chawuta adabziwonesa kwayiye usiku umwewo, iye adati, “Ndine Mulungu waapayi wako Abhurahamu, leka kugopa pakuti ine ndikukutsogolela. Nin'zakudalisa, ndichizachita kuti m'badwe wako uwande nathangwe lamulanda wangu Abhurahamu.”
Nakutenepo iye adamanga mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe pamwepo, nkupemphela Chawuta. Adazika tenti yake pamwepo, alanda wake nkuchela n'chela.
Pamwepo Abhimeleki namanduna yake Ahuzati na Pikoli nkulu wankhondo yake, adachoka ku Gerari, nkuyenda kwa Isaki.
Isaki adati kwayiwo, “Mwabwelelanyi kwayine? Imwe muchidziwa kuti munin'zonda, pomwe mudandithamangisa kwanu?”
Iwo adati, “Ise tawonelatu kuti Chawuta ana iwe, tsapano ngapakhale lumbilo pakati payiwe nayise, ngatichiteni chibvano nayimwe,
kuti iwe un'zachita lini chakuyipa kwayise, ninga bzatidachita kuleka kukuphata-phata, kunja kwabzabwino bzokha-bzoka, tidakuyendesa mwabwino. Tsapano ndiwe wakudalisiwa na Chawuta.”
Nakutenepo Isaki adaachitila feshita, adadya nakumwa.
Machibese-bese adachita chibvano chawo ali awili, Isaki adaapelekeza iwo nkuyenda mwabwino.
Ntsiku ibodzi-bodziyo alanda wa Isaki adafika kwayiye achimuwuza nabzan'chela waadachela achiti, “Taphata madzi.”
Isaki adapasa dzina n'chela umwewo lakuti, “Shibha.” Nakutenepo dzina laguta limwelo lin'chemelewa kuti Bheeri-shebha nalelo.
Esawu paakhana magole makumi manayi (40), adaloola, Judhisi mwana wa Bheeri mu Hiti na Bhasemati mwana wa Eloni mu Hiti,
Isaki paadakalamba maso yake yadachita khungu, nakutenepo akhawona lini, adachemela Esau mwana wake wakuyamba, adati kwayiye, “Mwanangu.” Iye adati, “Ndili pano.”
Isaki adati, “Ine ndakalamba, nindziwa lini ntsiku yakufa kwangu.
Tsapano iwe utakule bzombo bzako bzakusodzesa, chola chamisewe nawutati, yenda n'thengo ukandiphele nyama.
Undiphikile chakudya chabwino chaninfunisisa, undibwelesele ndidye ndichizakudalisa ndinati ndafa.”
Tsapano Rabheka akhatetekela Isaki paakhalewa-lewa namwana wake Esau. Nakutenepo Esau paadayenda n'thengo kasodza nyama yan'thengo kuti abwele nayo,
Rabheka adati kwamwana wake Jakobho, “Ndabva apayi wako achilewa-lewa nankulu wako Esau, achimuwuza kuti,
‘Ndibweleseleko nyama yan'thengo undiphikile chakudya chabwino, ndikadya ndichizakudalisa patsogolo pa Chawuta ndinati ndafa.’
Tsapano mwanangu, unditetekele bzandikukuwuza kuti uchite.
Yenda kuthanga undibwelesele tuwana twambuzi tuwili twakunenepa, ndizaphikile apayi wako chakudya chabwino chaanfunisisa.
Iwe uchizayenda nacho kwaapayi wako, akadya achizakudalisa anati afa.”
Koma Jakobho adati kwaamayi wake Rabheka, “Nkulu wangu Esau ana ukuse thupi lake lentse, koma ine ndilibe ukuse.
Ko peno apayi an'zandiphata, achizadziwa kuti ndikuwanamiza, an'zanditembelela lini pana kuti andidalise.”
Koma amayi wake adati, “Mwanangu, tembelelo limwelo ngalibwele kwayine, iwe yenda ukachite bzandakuwuza.”
Nakutenepo Jakobho adayenda katakula tumbuzi, achitupeleka kwaamayi wake. Amayi wake adaphika chakudya chabwino chaakhafunisisa apayi wake.
Pamwepo Rabheka adatola bzakubvala bzabwino bza Esau mwana wake nkulu, bzaakhanabzo munyumba mwake, nkubzibvadzika Jakobho, mwana wake mung'ono.
Adam'bvadzika makanda yatumbuzito m'manja nan'khose mwake.
Rabheka adatola chakudya chaakhadaphika nazingwa achibzipasa Jakobho.
Jakobho adayenda nacho kwaapayi wake, iye adati, “Apayi.” Iwo adati, “Ndiwe yani?”
Jakobho adati kwaapayi wake, “Ndine Esau mwana wanu wakuyamba. Ndachita bzamwalewa, khalani mudye nyama yan'thengo yamunfunisisa, mukadya mundidalise.”
Koma Isaki adati kwamwana wake, “Wakulumiza tani kuyiwona nyama imweyo mwanangu?” Iye adati, “Pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wanu ndiye wanditsogolela.”
Tsapano Isaki adati kwa Jakobho, “Fika pafupi ndiphate thupi lako ndibve kuti chadidi ndiwe mwana wangu Esau panango nee.”
Nakutenepo Jakobho adafendela pafupi naapayi wake. Iwo adam'phata thupi lake nkuti, “Fala likubveka kuti ndiwe Jakobho, koma m'manja mukubveka kuti ndiwe Esau.”
Isaki alibe kuzadziwa kuti ni Jakobho pakuti m'manja mwake mukhana ukuse ninga mwankulu wake Esau. Nakutenepo Isaki adadalisa Jakobho.
Isaki adati, “Ndiwe chadidi mwana wangu Esau?” Jakobho adati, “Ndine.”
Isaki adati, “Bwela nayo kwayine kuti ndidye nyama yan'thengo yamwana wangu, ndikudalise.” Jakobho adapeleka nyama imweyo iye nkudya, achiwapasa vinyu iwo nkumwa.
Pamwepo apayi wake adati kwayiye, “Fika pafupi mwanangu undipsopsode.”
Jakobho adafendela pafupi achiwapsoda. Isaki paadabva kununkhila kwabzakubvala bzake, adamudalisa. Koma iye adati,
akulise mbewu zako, akupase chakudya chizinji navinyu.
Isaki paadandoti malizeni kudalisa Jakobho, Jakobho paadandoti chokeni patsogolo paapayi wake, nkulu wake Esau adafika achichoka kasodza.
Esau adaphikambo chakudya chabwino kwene-kwene achikayipeleka kwaapayi wake. Iye adati kwaapayi wake, “Lamukani mudye nyama yan'thengo yamwana wanu, kuti mundidalise.”
Iye adati, “Ndine Esau mwana wanu wakuyamba.”
Isaki adayamba kutetemela kwene-kwene nkuti, “Ko mbani wasodza nyama yan'thengo yandadya iwe unati wabwela, ndichimudalisa? Ndiye an'zawa wakudalisiwa.”
Esau paadabva mafala yaapayi wake adalila, kwakushupika kwene-kwene, adati kwaapayi wake, “Apayi ndidalisemboni!”
Koma Isaki adati, “M'bale wako wabwela achindinamiza ndiye watola madaliso yako.”
Esau adati, “Ko sindibzo bzidachitisa kuti apasiwe dzina lakuti Jakobho? Tsapano aka kawa kachiwili kundinamiza. Pakuyamba adanditolela ukulu wangu, lelo uno wanditolela madaliso yangu.”
Isaki adati kwa Esau, “Ndatomuchita mbuya wako, abale wake wentse achawa alanda wake, ndamukhupusa nachakudya navinyu. Pachalibe chaningachite kwayiwe mwanangu.”
Esau adati kwaapayi wake, “Ko madaliso yamweyo ndiyo yokha yamukhanayo? Ndidalisenimbo apayi!” Esawu adalila bzikhabvesa ntsisi.
maweto yakudzulu yan'zagwa lini m'minda mwako.
un'zachosa joko lake kuchoka nkhosi mwako.”
Esau adazonda Jakobho nathangwe lamadaliso yaadapasiwa naapayi wake. Koma Esau chamuntima mwake adati, “Ntsiku zakulila apayi wangu zawa pafupi. Nakutenepo m'bale wangu Jakobho nin'zamupha.”
Koma Rabheka paadabva bzikhakumbukiwa na Esau mwana wake nkulu, adachemela Jakobho mwana wake mung'ono, nkuti kwayiye, “Nkulu wako Esau anfuna kubzinyamaliza nakukupha.
Tsapano mwanangu, tetekela bzandikukuwuza. Iwe uthawile ku Harani kwamano wangu Labhani,
ukakhale kumweko kwakanthawe mpaka ukali wankulu wako wamala.
Ukali wake ukamala akayebwa bzawudamuchita, nin'zatuma munthu kuzakuchemela kuti ubwelele. Pakuti ine ningatayikiliwe lini nawana awili pantsiku ibodzi?”
Rabheka adati kwa Isaki, “Ndakolewa naazikazi wachi Hiti. Jakobho akaloolambo akazi wachi Hiti ninga awa, nkazi wamuno mudziko, umoyo wangu un'zakhala lini chinthu kwayine.”
Pamwepo Isaki adachemela Jakobho nkumudalisa, adati kwayiye, “Leka kuloola nkazi wachi Kenani.
Yenda, ku Padhanamu kunyumba kwa Bhetuyeli apayi waamayi wako, ukaloole kumweko m'bodzi wawana wa Labhani mano waamayi wako.
Mulungu wam'phamvu ngaakudalise akupase wana azinji, kuti m'badwe wako uwande ukhale nawanthu azinji.
Ngaapeleke madaliso ya Abhurahamu kwayiwe, nakum'badwe wako, kuti azatole dziko lawukukhala ninga mulendo, lidapasiwa Abhurahamu na Mulungu.”
Nakutenepo Isaki adayendesa Jakobho ku Padhanaramu, kwa Labhani mwana wa Bhetuyeli mu Aramu, mano wa Rabheka, amayi wa Jakobho na Esau.
Tsapano Esau adadziwa kuti Jakobho adadalisiwa, achimuyendesa ku Padhaniramu kuti akaloole kumweko, paadamudalisa adamuwuza kuti, “Leka kuloola nkazi wachi Kenani.”
Esau adadziwa kuti Jakobho adatetekela apayi wake naamayi wake nkuyenda ku Padhaniramu.
Pamwepo Esau adadziwa kuti apayi wake akhafuna lini akazi wachi Kenani.
Pamwepo Esau adazayenda kukhana Ishimayeli mwana wa Abhurahamu, kwaadakaloola mwana wake wachitsikana akhachitiwa Mahalati nana wa Nebhayoti.
Jakobho adachoka pa Bheeri-shebha nkuyenda ku Harani.
Paadafika pambuto inango, adagona pamwepo usiku umwewo. Jakobho adatola mwala pambuto imweyo, adatsamila nkugona.
Paakhadagona tenepo, adalota pachita mathambiko, yakhadayimisiwa padziko, yachifika kudzulu. Adawona ngilozi za Mulungu zichikwila nakubuluka pamathambikoyo.
Chawuta akhadayima padzulu pamathambiko yamweyo, iye adati, “Ndine Chawuta, Mulungu waapayi wako Abhurahamu na Mulungu wa Isaki, mbuto yawudagona ndayipasa kwayiwe nawana wako.

M'badwe wako un'zawanda kulingana napfumbi lapadziko. An'zamwazikila kumadziko yentse yakumabveladzuwa nayakumadokelo kufika nachakudzulu mpaka kunyantsi. Wanthu wentse an'zadalisiwa nathangwe lako iwe nam'badwe wako.
Wona, ndina iwe, nin'zakuchinjiliza kwentse kwawun'zayenda. Nin'zakubwezela pomwe mudziko lino. Nin'zakusiya lini mpaka ndachita bzandidalewa kwayiwe.”
Jakobho adapalamuka kutulo nkuti, “Chawuta ali pambuto ino, koma ine ndikhalibe kudziwa.”
Pamwepo iye adaphatiwa namantha nkuti, “Mbuto ino in'gopsa! Infunika kukhala nyumba ya Mulungu. Uwu ninsuwo wakudzulu!”
Nakutenepo Jakobho adalamuka machibese-bese, nkutola mwala waakhadatsamila nkuwuyimisa nkuthulula mafuta padzulu pawene.
Mbuto imweyo adayipasa dzina lakuti Bheteli,
Tsapano Jakobho adalumbila achiti, “Mulungu akanditsogolela, akandichinjiliza pawulendo wangu wandikuyenda, akandipasa chakudya nabzakubvala,
ndichibwelela pomwe kumuyi kwaapayi wangu mwabwino, Chawuta an'zakhala Mulungu wangu.
Mwala uwu, wandayimisa, pan'zakhala nyumba ya Mulungu, nin'zapeleka chakhumi pabzentse bzamun'zandipasa.”
Pamwepo Jakobho adayenda ulendo wake, nkufika mudziko lawanthu wakumabveladzuwa.
Paadanyangana adawona n'chela m'munda, adawona mititi mitatu yamabila yakhadagona pambali, pakuti pan'chela umwewo ndipo pakamwela mabila. Koma mwala ukhadafunga pamulomo wan'chelawo ukhali ukulu.
Anyakabusa paakhakocheza mabila yawo pan'chelawo, ndipo paakhachosa mwalawo achimwesa mabila yawo, achibwezela mwalawo pomwe pan'chela.
Jakobho adati kwayiwo, “Abale wangu mukuchoka kuponi?” Iwo adati, “Tikuchoka ku Harani.”
Jakobho adazati kwayiwo, “Ko mungadziweko Labhani mwana wa Nahori?” Anyakabusawo adati, “Tinimudziwa.”
Jakobho adazati, “Ko iye ali bwino.” Iwo adati, “Yinde iye ali bwino, wonani mwana wake Rakelo ndiye uyo ali kubwela namabila!”
Jakobho adati, “Wonani, pakuti yachali masikati, nthawe yakukocheza bzifuwo inati yakwana, mwesani mabila yanu muyende mukayadyese.”
Koma iwo adati, “Tingakwanise lini kufikila mabila yentse yakochela pabodzi, mwala wakungulusiwa pamulomo wan'chela; pamwepo tingamwese mabila.”
Jakobho paakhali kulewa-lewa naanyakabusawo, Rakelo adafika namabila yaapayi wake, pakuti ndiye akhali nyakabusa wayene.
Tsapano Jakobho paadawona Rakelo mwana wachikazi wa Labhani, mano waamayi wake namabila ya Labhani, Jakobho adayenda kakungulusa mwala ukhali pan'chela nkumwesa mabila ya Labhani mano waamayi wake.
Pamwepo Jakobho adam'psoda Rakelo nkuyamba kulila kwakukondwa.
Jakobho adati kwa Rakelo, “Ndine mwana wa Rabheka nana waapayi wako.”
Rakelo adathamanga kunyumba achikawuza apayi wake, Labhani.

Labhani paadandobva mpfeso za Jakobho, mwana wanana wake, adathamanga kachungulana naye. Labhani paadafika pakhana nz'ukulu wake Jakobho adamukumbatila achimuphsoda. Adatola Jakobho achiyenda naye kunyumba kwake. Pamwepo Jakobho adalongosolela Labhani bzikhadachitika,
Labhani adati kwayiye, “N'chadidi, iwe ndiwe wabondo langu nawanyama yangu!” Jakobho adakhala na Labhani kwamwezi.
Labhani adati kwa Jakobho, “Pakuti ndiwe m'bale wangu, ko ungandiphatile basa palibe mpagalo? Ndiwuze mpagalo wawungafune?”
Tsapano Labhani akhana wana awili wachikazi; dzina lankulu likhali Liya, dzina lamung'ono likhali Rakelo.
Maso ya Liya yakhali yakuthima, koma Rakelo akhadakoma wathupi labwino.
Jakobho adafuna Rakelo; iye adati, “Ninkuphatilani basa kwamagole manomwe muchizandipasa Rakelo mwana wanu mung'ono.”
Pamwepo Labhani adati, “Bzili bwino kuti ndimpeleke kwayiwe pana kuti ndimpeleke kwamunangombo munthu bzake, tsapano iwe khala nayine pano.”
Nakutenepo Jakobho adaphata basa kwamagole manomwe kuti apasiwe Rakelo, kwayiye magole manomweyo yakhadandolingana nantsiku zing'ono-ng'ono pakuti akhafuna Rakelo kwene-kwene.
Pamwepo Jakobho adati kwa Labhani, “Ndipaseni nkazi wangu ndipite naye panyumba pakuti ntsiku zatidabvana zakwana.”
Labhani adazakocheza wanthu wentse akhali pafupi naye, achichita feshita.
Usiku umwewo Labhani adapeleka Liya kwa Jakobho, Jakobho nkudziwana naye.
Labhani adapeleka mulanda wake Zilipa kwa Liya kuti akhale nyabasa wake.
Machibese Jakobho adazadziwa kuti wagona na Liya, iye achiti kwa Labhani, “N'chinyi chamwachita kwayine? Ko ine sindidaphatila basa Rakelo? Ko thangwe lanyi mwandinamiza tenepa?”
Labhani adati kwayiye, “Ntemo wathu ise tiniyamba lini kulooza mung'ono nkulu anati waloodwa.
Maliza sondo yawuyu, nin'zakupasa pomwe munango wache, wawun'azaphatila basa kwamagole yanango manomwe.”
Jakobho adachita tenepo, adamaliza sondo ya Liya; pamwepo Labhani adampasa mwana wake Rakelo kuti akhale nkazi wake.
Labhani adapeleka mulanda wake Bhiliha kwa Rakelo kuti ambam'phatila basa.
Nakutenepo Jakobho adazadziwana na Rakelo, adamufuna kuposa Liya. Adazaphatila pomwe basa Labhani kwamagole yanango manomwe.
Chawuta paadawona kuti Liya akhafuniwa lini, adafungula mimba yake; koma Rakelo akhalibe mbeleko.
Liya adaphata pathupi achibala mwana wachimuna achimpasa dzina lakuti Rubheni, pakuti iye adati, “Pakuti Chawuta wawona kushupika kwangu; chadidi mwamuna wangu ati andifunembo.”

Liya adaphata pathupi nkubala pomwe munango mwana wachimuna, iye adati, “Chawuta wandipasa pomwe munango mwana, pakuti adabva kuti nin'zondewa, wandipasa pomwe mwana uyu, achimpasa dzina lakuti Simiyoni.”
Adazaphata pathupi pomwe, iye adati, “Ulendo uno mwamuna wangu ati andifunembo, pakuti ndam'balila wana atatu, mwanayo adampasa dzina lakuti Levi.”
Liya adaphata pathupi pomwe nkubala mwana wachimuna, iye nkuti, “Ulendo uno nin'zadumbiza Chawuta.” Nakutenepo mwanayo adampasa dzina lakuti Judha, pamwepo adayima kubala.
Koma Rakelo paadawona kuti akubalila lini Jakobho wana, adachitila nchanje nkulu wake Liya. Rakelo adati kwa Jakobho, “Ndipase wana, ukaleka ninifa.”
Koma Jakobho adakalipila Rakelo nkuti, “Ko ine ndatola mbuto ya Mulungu?” Pakuti ndiye adachitisa kuti uleke kubala.
Pamwepo Rakelo adati kwa Jakobho, “Tola mulandakazi wangu Bhiliha ugone naye, kuti andibalile mwana.”
Rakelo adapeleka Bhiliha kwa Jakobho kuti akhale nkazi wake. Nakutenepo Jakobho adadziwana naye.
Bhiliha adaphata pathupi nkubalila Jakobho mwana wachimuna.
Rakelo adapasa mwana umweyo dzina lakuti Dhani nkuti, “Mulungu wandiyenzanisa pomwe wabva fala langu, wandipasa mwana wachimuna.”
Bhiliha mulanda wa Rakelo adaphata pathupi pomwe nkubala mwana wachimuna wachiwili.
Pamwepo Rakelo adati, “Ndapolowana nanana wangu, ndichimukunda.” Nakutenepo mwanayo adampasa dzina lakuti Nafitali.
Liya paadawona kuti wayima kubala, adapeleka mulanda wake Zilipa kwa Jakobho kuti akhale nkazi wake.
Mulanda wa Liya Zilipa adabalila Jakobho mwana wachimuna.
Liya adati, “Ndachita mwayi!” Mwanayo adampasa dzina lakuti Gadhi.
Mulanda wa Liya Zilipa adabalila Jakobho mwana wachimuna wachiwili.
Pamwepo Liya adati, “Ndikukondwa, akazi wentse an'zandichemela kuti kukondwa, adampasa dzina lakuti Asheri.”
Munthawe yakukolola tiligu, Rubheni adayenda kumunda kwaadakawona yamichelo yamandirekisi,

Liya adati, “Ko kunditolela kwawudachita mwamuna kwachepa? Lelo uno waakufuna kunditolela pomwe mamandirekisi yandabweleselewa namwana wangu.” Rakelo adati kwa Liya, “Ukandipasa mamandirekisi yawabweleselewa namwana wako, Jakobho an'gona nayiwe usiku walelo.”

Chakumawulo Jakobho paadachoka kumunda, Liya adati kwayiye, “Usiku walelo unkagona kunyumba kwangu, ndapagali kale kwa Rakelo mamandirekisi yandabweleselewa namwana wangu.” Jakobho usiku umwewo adayenda kagona naye.
Mulungu adabva pemphelo la Liya, iye adaphata pathupi, nkubala mwana wachimuna wachishanu.
Liya adati, “Mulungu wandipasa mpagalo wangu, pakuti ndapeleka mulanda kwa mwamuna wangu.” Mwanayo adampasa dzina lakuti Isakari.
Pamwepo Liya adaphata pomwe pathupi, achibala mwana wachitanthatu.
Liya adati, “Pakuti Mulungu wandipasa mfupo yabwino; tsapano mwamuna wangu achandilemekeza, pakuti ndam'balila wana wachimuna atanthatu.” Mwanayo adampasa dzina lakuti Zebhuluni.
Liya adazabala mwana wachikazi achimpasa dzina lakuti Dhina.
Mulungu adazakumbukila Rakelo, nkubva pemphelo lake, achifungula mimba yake.
Rakelo adaphata pathupi achibala mwana wachimuna, iye adati, “Mulungu wachosa kunyazisiwa kwangu.”
Mwanayo adampasa dzina lakuti Jozefi kulewa kuti, “Chawuta ngaandipase pomwe munango mwana wachimuna.”
Rakelo paadabala Jozefi, Jakobho adati kwaatebzala wake Labhani, “Lekani ndiyende, ndibwelele kwathu kudziko langu.
Ndipaseni akazi wangu nawana wangu wandidaphatila basa kwayimwe ndiyende, pakuti imwe mun'dziwa kuti ndidakuphatilani basa.”
Koma Labhani adati, “Leka ndikuwuze, ndidabzidziwa nakulotela kuti Chawuta adandidalisa nathangwe layiwe.
Jakobho adati kwayiye, “Imwe mun'dziwa kukuphatilani basa kwandidachita, nabzifuwo bzanu kukhala kwabzidachita nayine.
Pandidafika pano, mukhana bzifuwo bzing'ono-ng'ono, koma bzidazawanda. Chawuta adakudalisani nathangwe layine. Tsono ine nin'zaseyenzelambo lini nyumba yangu?”
Jakobho adati, “Palibe chamungandipase, koma mukandichitila ibzi, nimpitiliza kukubusilani mabila yanu;
Koma ine lelo lekani ndipitemo mumabila yanu, ndichosemo mabila yentse yamawala-mawala nayamadodo-madodo namapsipa nambuzi zamadodo-madodo nazamawala-mawala, bzimwebzi ndibzo bzikhale mpagalo wangu.

Kukhulupilika kwangu kun'zawoneka patsogolo, pamun'zabwela kuzanyangana mpagalo wangu. Mbuzi zentse zin'zawoneka zilibe mawala, namabila mapsipa, bzikazawoneka nayine, mun'zadziwa kuti ndidakubelani.”
Labhani adati, “Bzili bwino! Ngabzichitike ninga bzawalewa.”

Koma ntsiku imweyo Labhani adachosa mbuzi zikono zikhana mitsetse-mitsetse nazamadodo-madodo, nambuzi zikazi zikhana mawala-mawala nazamadodo-madodo, nazentse zikhana mawala machena, namabila yentse mapsipa, achibzipasa wana wake,
achiwayendesa kuwulendo wa ntsiku zitatu. Pamwepo Jakobho adasala achibusa mabila ya Labhani yakhadasala.
Jakobho adatola tumiti tuwisi twamupopula natwamualimondi natwamupuleni, akhati apa wakwatula apa wasiya apa wakwatula apa wasiya, kuwonesa magamba machena patumitito.
Adayikha tumitito twaadakwatula mukhamwela mabila, pakuti kumweko ndiko kukhakwililana mabila, payakhabwela kuzamwa madzi,
mabilayo payakhakwililana patsogolo patumitito, mabilayo yadayamba kubala wana wamitsetse-mitsetse nawamawala-mawala nawamadodo-madodo.

Jakobho adapatula mabila makazi nambuzi zikazi pazikhakwililiwa, akhabzinyanganisa kumabila ya Labhani yamitsetse-mitsetse, nayentse mapsipa, kuchitila kuti yazabale wana wamitsetse nawamadodo-madodo. Nakutenepa Jakobho adachitambo mabila yake, achiyayikha payokha.
Mabila yakulimba payakhafika pafupi nakubala, Jakobho akayikha tumiti patsogolo pamabilayo kuti yakwililane nkati mwatumitito, kuti yabale,
koma yale zakuvuwa akhayapitisa lini mule mukhana tumitito, nakutenepo yentse mabila yakuvuwa yakhali ya Labhani, yakulimba yakhali ya Jakobho.
Nakutenepo Jakobho adakhupuka kwene-kwene, adawa namabila mazinji naalanda wachimuna nawachikazi nangamela namadhonki.
Tsapano Jakobho adabva wana wa Labhani achiti, “Jakobho adatola bzentse bzikhali bzaapayi wathu; kukhupuka kwake kwachoka kwaapayi wathu.”
Jakobho adawona kuti Labhani akhawonesa lini kumufuna ninga pakuyamba.
Pamwepo Chawuta adati kwa Jakobho, “Bwelela kudziko laapayi wako kwaabale wako, ine ndininga ndina iwe.”
Jakobho adatuma munthu kachemela Rakelo na Liya n'thengo kukhana mabila yake.
Iye adati kwayiwo, “Ndawona kuti apayi wanu akuwonesa lini kundifuna ninga pakuyamba. Koma Mulungu waapayi akhana yine.
Imwe mun'dziwa kuti ndidaphatila basa apayi wanu namphamvu zangu zentse;
koma apayi wanu adandinamiza, nkusandula mpagalo wangu kankwana khumi, koma Mulungu alibe kuwalekelela achindipweteka.

Iwo paakhati, ‘Mabila yentse yana madodo-madodo yan'zakhala mpagalo wako,’ pamwepo mabila yentse yakhabala wana wamadodo-madodo; paakhati ‘Mabila yana mitsetse-mitsetse yan'zakhala mpagalo wako,’ mabila yentse yakhabala wana wamitsetse-mitsetse.
Nakutenepo Mulungu adatola mabila yaapayi wanu, achiyapeleka kwayine.
Munyengo in'chita mimba mabila, kutulo ndidawona atonde wambuzi akhakwilila bzifuwo akhana mitsetse-mitsetse namadodo-madodo.
Pamwepo ngilozi ya Mulungu idalewa-lewa nayine kutulo, iyo idati, ‘Jakobho!’ Ine ndidati, ‘Ndili pano.’
Iyo idati, ‘Nyangana uwone, atonde wentse akukwilila bzifuwo ana mitsetse-mitsetse namadodo-madodo; pakuti ndidawona bzentse bzaakuchita Labhani kwayiwe.
Ndine Mulungu waku Bheteli, kwawudadzodza mwala namafuta uchilumbila kwayine. Tsapano sumuka, choka mudziko lino, bwelela kudziko lawudabadwa.’ ”
Pamwepo Rakelo na Liya adati kwayiye, “Ko pachana chathu ise panthaka idasala munyumba yaapayi wathu?
Ise sitakhala ninga alendo kwayiwo? Pakuti adatigulisa, achiphatisa basa masheleni yathu.
Chuma chentse chidatakuliwa na Mulungu kwaapayi wathu nichathu nawana wathu; tsapano imwe chitani bzentse bzamwawuziwa na Mulungu.”
Nakutenepo Jakobho adasumuka, nkukwiza wana wake naazikazi wake pangamela;
adabusa ng'ombe zake zentse nabzifuwo bzake bzentse bzaadawona, ng'ombe zake zaadawona mu Padhani-aramu, nkuyenda kudziko la Kenani kwaapayi wake Isaki.
Labhani akhadayenda kagela mabila yake, Rakelo adaba amilungu wamunyumba yapayi wake.
Jakobho adanamiza Labhani mu Aramu, pakuti alibe kumuwuza kuti akufuna kuthawa.
Adathawa nabzentse bzaakhanabzo, adayambuka kamadzi ka Ufuletesi, kudziko lamapili la Giliyadhi.
Pantsiku yachitatu Labhani adawuziwa kuti Jakobho wathawa.
Labhani adatola abale wake nkumuteyela kwantsiku zinomwe, paakhali pafupi kum'phatila mudziko lamapili la Giliyadhi,
Mulungu adabwela kwa Labhani mu Aramu kutulo usiku umwewo, adati kwayiwe, “Chenjelela, kuti uleke kulewa fala kwa Jakobho lingawe labwino panango lakuyipa.”
Labhani adafika pakhana Jakobho. Tsapano Jakobho akhadazika matenti yake mudziko lamapili, Labhani naabale wake adazikambo matenti yawo mudziko lamapili la Giliyadhi.
Labhani adati kwa Jakobho, “N'chiyi chawachita ichi, kuchita bzakundithawa, kundinamiza ine, kutakula wana wangu ninga anyakupambiwa pankhondo?
Thangwe lanyi kuchita bzakundithawa, kundinamiza ine, kuleka kundiwuza? Ukhadandiwuza ninga ndidakudayendesa uchikondwa uchiyimba nyimbo, uchiliza bzikhwechele nachipendani?
Thangwe lanyi ulibe kuchita kuti ndipsopsode azukulu wangu nawana wangu ndichigonekana nawo? Tsapano bzawachita m'bzawulombe.
Ine ndina mphamvu yakukupweteka; koma Mulungu waapayi wako adalewa-lewa nayine kutulo usiku walelo achiti, ‘Chenjelela kulewa kwa Jakobho bzabwino panango bzakuyipa.’
Iwe udathawa pakuti ukufuna kubwelela kunyumba kwaapayi wako, ko thangwe lanyi udaba amilungu wangu.”
Jakobho adati kwa Labhani, “Pakuti ndikhagopa, ndidakumbuka kuti munganditakulile wana wanu.
Munthu wamuniwona ana amilungu wanu ngaaphewe. Patsogolo paabale wanu mungalate pabzinthu bzandinabzo bzamunti m'bzanu, mubzitakule.” Koma Jakobho alibe kudziwa kuti Rakelo ndiye akhadaba amilunguwo.
Labhani adapita mutenti ya Jakobho, namutenti ya Liya namutenti yaalandakazi awili, koma alibe kubziwona. Adabula mutenti ya Liya nkuyenda mutenti ya Rakelo.
Tsapano Rakelo ndiye akhadatakula amilungu wamunyumba mwake nkuwayikha pachakukhalila chapangamela yake, nkuwakhalila. Labhani adapsaga mutenti mwentse, koma palibe chaadawona.
Rakelo adati kwaapayi wake, “Mbuya wangu lekani kukalipa, kuti ndilibe kukusumukilani, pakuti ndili kumwezi. Nakutenepo iye adapsaga, koma amilungu wamunyumba mwake alibe kuwawona.”
Pamwepo Jakobho adakalipa, nkupopotela Labhani; Jakobho adati kwa Labhani, “Ko mulandu wangu uli paponi? Chitazo changu chili paponi chachitisa kuti munditeyele?
Mwapsaga pabzinthu bzangu bzentse, koma palibe chamwawona? Ko amilungu wamunyumba mwanu mwaawona? Bziyikheni patsogolo paabale wangu, naabale wanu kuti atonge pakati payise awili.
Ndidakhala nayimwe kwamagole makumi mawili (20); mabila yanu nambuzi zanu bzilibe kupsodza, ndilibe kudya mabila makono yamuthanga mwanu.
Bzifuwo bzikhang'ambiwa nabzilombo, ndilibe kubwela nabzo kwayimwe; ndikhabzipagali pachangu, mukhabzibvunza, ne bzikhabewa masikati panango usiku mukhandipagalisa.
Nakutenepo masikati ndikhaphsa nadzuwa, usiku ndikhajejelewa namphepo, ndikhaphuphudza ndidapenya ndichikuphatilani basa.

Ndidakhala nayimwe kwamagole makumi mawili (20), ndidakuphatilani basa kwamagole khumi namanayi (14), kuti mundipase wana wanu awili. Ndidazaphata basa pomwe kwamagole matanthatu (6) ndichiphatila basa mabila. Koma mudasandula mpagalo wangu kankwana khumi (10).

Ninga Mulungu waapayi wangu, Mulungu wa Abhurahamu an'gopewa na Isaki akhali lini kumbali kwangu, ninga mudandiyendesa manja-manja, koma Mulungu adawona kushupika kwangu nakukuphatilani basa kwandidachita, ndibzo bzachitisa kuti Mulungu akuchenjezeni usiku walelo.”
Pamwepo Labhani adadayila adati kwa Jakobho, “Wana wachikazi awa niwana wangu, mabila aya nimabila yangu, nabzentse bzawunabzo nibzangu. Ko ningachitenyi kwawana wangu, panango kuwana wawo waadabala?
Tsapano bwela, ngatichite chibvano iwe nayine; chizakhale mboni pakati payine nayiwe.”
Jakobho adazati kwaabale wake, “Gwezekani minyala.” Adagwezeka minyala kuchita mudwi, adadya adakhala padzulu paminyalayo.
Labhani adapasa mbuto imweyo dzina lakuti Jegarisahudhuta.
Labhani adati kwa Jakobho, “Mudwi waminyala iyi nimboni pakati payiwe nayine lelo.” Nakutenepo mbuto imweyo idapasiwa dzina lakuti Galeedhi.
Mwalawo achizawuti Mizipa, pakuti iye adati, “Chawuta ngaawone payine nayiwe, patininga tili uyu kwake uyu kwake.
Ukashupa wana wangu, panango kuloola anango akazi kunja kwawana wangu, ne pakakhala palibe munthu an'dziwa chibvano chathu, Mulungu ndiye mboni pakati payiwe nayine.”
Pamwepo Labhani adati kwa Jakobho, “Wona mudwi uwu namwala uwu wandayikha pakati payiwe nayine.
Mudwi umwewu nimboni, namwala umweyi nimboni, ine nin'zamoga lini mudwi uwu kuzamenyana nayiwe, nayiwembo pomwe un'zamoga lini mwala umwewu kuzamenyana nayine.
Mulungu wa Abhurahamu na Mulungu wa Nahori na Mulungu waazipayi wawo, ngaawe atongi pakati payine nayiwe.” Nakutenepo Jakobho adalumbila nadzina la Mulungu waapayi wake Isaki.
Jakobho adapeleka ntsembe paphili, adachemela abale wake kuzadya chakudya. Paadamala kudya adagona paphili pamwepo;
Labhani adalamuka machibese-bese, nkupsoda azukulu wake nawana wake, adaadalisa iye nkubwelela kunyumba kwake.
Jakobho adayenda ulendo wake, ngilozi za Mulungu zidagumana naye;
Jakobho paadaziwona adati, “Iyi ninkhondo ya Mulungu.” Nakutenepo mbuto imweyo adayipasa dzina lakuti Mahanayimu.
Jakobho adatuma atumiki patsogolo pake kwankulu wake Esau uyo akhakhala mumbuto ya Seyiri mudziko la Edhomu,
achiwawuza kuti, “Yendani kwa Esau mbuya wangu mukamuwuze kuti, ‘Mulanda wanu Jakobho wati, ndidakhala kwa Labhani kwandikhakhala kufika lelo,
ndina ng'ombe namadhonki namabila nambuzi naalanda wachimuna nawachikazi. Tsapano ndatuma atumiki kwayimwe mbuya wangu kuti mundikomele ntima.’ ”
Atumiki adabwelela kwa Jakobho, achikati, “Tidafika kwankulu wanu Esau. Tsapano iye akubwela kuzagumana nayimwe, ana wanthu mazana manayi.”
Jakobho paadabva mafalayo adabva mantha kwene-kwene achishupika. Iye adapatula wanthu waakhanawo namabila mubzipani bziwili,
achikumbuka kuti, “Peno Esau anfika achimenya chipani chibodzi, chinango chipani chinthawa.”

Jakobho adati, “Mulungu waayavu wangu Abhurahamu, Mulungu waapayi wangu Isaki, imwe Chawuta ndimwe mudati kwayine, ‘Bwelela kudziko lako, kudziko laabale wako. Mudati bzinthu bzentse bzininfambila bwino.’
Pakuti ine ndikhafunika lini kuwona ntsisi nachikhulupililo chentse chamudawonesa mulanda wanu. Pandidayambuka Jorodhani ndikhana mpsimbo basi, tsapano ndakhala bzipani bziwili.
Ndaphata minyendo yanu, ndipulumuseni m'manja mwankulu wangu Esau. Ndikugopa, pakuti angafike achitipha tentse, azikazi nawana.
Koma imwe mudati, ‘Nin'zakuchitila bzabwino, ndichizachita kuti m'badwe wako uzawande ninga n'chenga wamunyanja, an'zawanda bzakusaya kuwelengeka.’ ”
Nakutenepo Jakobho adagona pamwepo usiku umwewo. Mangwana yache adasankhula pabzaakhanabzo achibzipeleka mpfupo kwankulu wake Esau,
mbuzi zikazi adachosa mazana mawili, mbuzi zikono makumi mawili, mabila makazi mazana mawili namikono yamabila makumi mawili,
nangamela zikazi makumi matatu nabziwana bzayene nang'ombe zikazi makumi manayi namikono yang'ombe khumi, namadhonki makazi makumi mawili namikono yamadhonki khumi.

Jakobho adayikha bzifuwobzo m'manja mwaalanda wake, ntiti nantiti ukhali pawene wokha. Iye adati kwaalanda wake, “Imwepo muyende patsogolo pangu nabzifuwo, koma pakhale nambuto pakati pantiti unango nawunango.”
Adawuza akhana chipani chapatsogolo kuti, “Mukagumana nankulu wangu Esau, akakubvunzani kuti, ‘Ndimwe alanda wayani? Ko mukuyenda kuponi? Ko bzifuwo bzamunabzo m'bzayani?’
Imwe munkati, ‘M'bzamulanda wanu Jakobho, nimpfupo zatumiziwa kwa mbuya wangu Esau, iye ali kuteyela m'mbuyo mwathu.’ ”
Adawuza bzibodzi-bodzi kuchipani chachiwili nachachitatu nawentse akhateyela mbuyo kuti, “Mukagumana na Esau munkamuwuze bzibodzi-bodzibzo,
imwe munkati, ‘Mulanda wanu Jakobho akuteyela mbuyo.’ ” Iye adakumbuka kuti, “Panango ningampembze nampfupo zaninintumiza ndichikawonana naye panango achikanditambila.”
Nakutenepo, adatumila mpfupo patsogolo pake, iye achisala usiku umwewo ali pansasa.
Usiku umwewo Jakobho adasumuka, nkutola azikazi wake awili, naalandakazi wake awili nawana wake khumi naam'bodzi nkuyambuka kamadzi ka Jabhoko.
Adaayambusa kamadzi achiyambusambo pomwe bzinthu bzake bzentse bzaakhanabzo,
koma Jakobho adasala pamwepo ali yekha.
Pamwepo adachita mabimbili namunango mwamuna mpaka kumadandakucha.
Mwamunayo paadawona kuti wataza kukunda Jakobho, adam'menya nampsimbo yake panchafu, iye nkubzuguduka bondo.
Koma Jakobho adati, “Ninkuleka lini uchiyenda ulibe kundidalisa.”
Mwamuna umweyo adati, “Ko dzina lako ndiwe yani.”
Mwamuna ule adati, “Kuyambila lelo uchachemelewa lini kuti Jakobho, waakuchemelewa kuti Izraeli, pakuti wachita mabimbili na Mulungu nawanthu uchikunda.”
Jakobho adati, “Ndaphata minyendo, ndiwuzembo dzina lako.” Mwamunayo adati, “Thangwe lanyi unfuna kudziwa dzina langu?” Pamwepo adamudalisa.
Mbuto imweyo Jakobho adayipasa dzina lakuti Penuyeli achiti, “Ndawonana na Mulungu maso namaso, koma ndilibe kufa.”
Jakobho paakhachoka mu Penuyeli dzuwa likhatochoka, koma iye akhagwinthama pakuti akhadabzuguduka mwendo wake.
Ndibzo bzidazachitisa kuti a Izraeli aleke kudya midzipe yamunchafu mpaka lelo. Pakuti mwamunayo adamenya Jakobho pabondo yapanchafu.
Jakobho adanyangana, nkuwona Esau achibwela pabodzi naamuna mazana manayi (400). Adagawa wana wake pakati pa Liya na Rakelo naalandakazi wake awili.
Jakobho adayikha alandakazi wake nawana wawo patsogolo, achiteyelewa na Liya nawana wake, Rakelo na Jozefi ndiwo akhali kwakumalizila pana wentse.
Jakobho adayenda patsogolo pawo, adamukotamila kanomwe mpaka adazafika pafupi nankulu wake.
Esau adathamanga achikagumana naye, adamukumbatila, achimuphsoda, iwo adalila.
Esau adanyangana nkuwona akazi nawana, iye adati, “Ko awa wawunawo mbani?” Jakobho adati, “Awa ndiwo wana waadapasiwa mulanda wanu na Mulungu mwachifundo chawo.”
Pamwepo alanda adafika pafupi, iwo nawana wake achimukotamila;
Liya adachita bzibodzi-bodzi, iye nawana wake adafikambo pafupi achimukotamila; pakumalizila Jozefi na Rakelo adafika pafupi achimukotamila.
Esau adati, “Ko mititi yandagumana nayo inilewanyi?” Jakobho adati, “Kuti ndibvelewe chifundo nambuya wangu.”
Koma Esau adati, “Nkulu wangu, ine ndina bzizinji kwene-kwene! Chengeta bzawunabzo.”

Jakobho adati, “Nee, ndaphata minyendo, peno mwandibvela chifundo, tambilani mpfupo zandikukupasani; pakuti chadidi kuwona nkhope yanu kuli ninga kuwona nkhope ya Mulungu, nachifundo chakutenepa mwanditambila.
Tambilani, ndaphata minyendo, mpfupo yangu yabwelesewa kwayimwe, pakuti Mulungu wandichitila chifundo, pakuti ndinabzo bzizinji.” Nakutenepo Jakobho adamuwumiliza mpaka iye adabzitambila.
Esau adati, “Ngatiyende ulendo wathu, ine ndichatsogola.”

Koma Jakobho adati kwayiye, “Mbuya wangu mun'dziwa kuti wana alibe mphamvu, pomwe ndina mabila nang'ombe bziniyamwisa, bzintofuna ine kuti nimbabzinyangana, ndikabzifambisa mwakuthamanga kuti tifike nantsiku ibodzi, mabila yentse yanifa.

Ndaphata minyendo lekani mbuya wangu ayende patsogolo pamulanda wake, ine ninkuteyelani pang'ono-pang'ono kuteyezela kufamba kwabzifuwo bzandinabzo, ndichiteyeza pomwe kufamba kwawana, mpaka ndafika kwambuya wangu ku Seiri.”
Esau adati, “Ndaakukusiyila anango wanthu wandinawo.” Jakobho adati, “Mungachite lini tenepo mbuya wangu, lekani ndiwone chifundo pamaso pambuya wangu.”
Nakutenepo Esau adabwelela ulendo wake ntsiku imweyo, kuyenda ku Seiri.
Koma Jakobho adayenda ku Sukoti, kwaadakabzimangila nyumba, achimanga mathanga yabzifuwo bzake; nakutenepo mbuto imweyo ikuchemelewa nadzina lakuti Sukoti.
Jakobho adafika bwino muguta la Shekemu, mudziko la Kenani, paadachoka ku Padhani-aramu; adazika matenti yake yadanyanganana naguta.
Jakobho adagula mbuto kuchoka kwawana wa Hamori apayi wa Shekemu adagula nantengo wamasheleni dzana, nkuzikapo tenti yake.
Adamanga mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe kumweko, yaadapasa dzina lakuti Mulungu-Mulungu wa Izraeli.
Tsapano Dhina mwana wachikazi wa Leya, waadabalila Jakobho, adayenda kazungila akazi wamudziko la Kenani.
Shekemu mwana wa Hamori mu Hivi, nduna yamudziko adamuwona, adamuphata achigona naye, achimunyazisa.
Iye datolewa ntima na Dhina mwana wachikazi wa Jakobho; adamufuna achilewa-lewa naye, mafala yabwino yakumufuna.
Nakutenepo Shekemu adalewa-lewa naapayi wake Hamori achiti, “Ndilooleleni ntsikana uyu akhale nkazi wangu.”
Tsapano Jakobho adabva kuti Dhina mwana wake wachikazi akhadapsipisiwa; koma wana wake wachimuna akhali nthengo nabzifuwo. Jakobho adanyamala mpaka iwo abwela.
Hamori apayi wa Shekemu adayenda kwa Jakobho achikalewa-lewa naye.
Wana wa Jakobho adabwela kuchoka nthengo, paadabva bzikhadachitika, adashupika achikalipa kwene-kwene, pakuti bzidachita Shekemu, kwaa Izraeli bzikhanyazisa.
Koma Hamori adalewa-lewa nawo, achiti, “Mwana wangu Shekemu akufuna mwana wanu wachikazi; ndaphata minyendo yanu, mpaseni kuti amuloole.
Ngatiloolelaneni, ise tiloole wana wanu, imwe muloolembo wathu.
Imwe mukhale pabodzi nayise, mungakhale pentse pamunfuna; khalani muchichita malonda m'mwemo, kuti mukhalembo nambuto.”
Shekemu adati pomwe kwaapayi wa Dhina nakwaazimano wake, “Ndichitilemboni bwino, bzentse bzamuti mulewe ninkupasani.
Lewani mpagalo nampfupo yanyakuloodwa, ninkupasani bzamuninga mwalewa; chaninfuna ine nkundipasa mwana wanu kuti akhale nkazi wangu.”
Wana wa Jakobho adadayila Shekemu naapayi wake Hamori, bzakuwaphata kumaso, pakuti Shekemu akhadapsipisa kale nana wawo Dhina.
Iwo adati kwayiwo, “Tingachite lini tenepo, kupeleka nana wathu kwamunthu alibe kugwatiwa khanda lanyama lachimuna, pakuti kwayise nichinthu chinyazisa.
Ise tintobvuma kuchita tenepo, imwe mukachita ninga ise, amuna wentse wakwanu akagwatiwa khanda lanyama lachimuna.
Mukatenepo pan'zakhala nakuloolelana pakati payimwe nayise. Ise tin'zalooza kwayimwe, wana wanu achizaloolambo kwayise, tin'zakhala nayimwe tichizakhala wanthu abodzi.
Koma mukaleka kutetekela bzatalewa, bzakugwatiwa khanda lanyama lachimuna, tintakula mwana wathu tichiyenda naye.”
Mafala yawo yadakondwesa Hamori namwana wake Shekemu.
Mulumbwana umweyo alibe kuchedwa kubzichita, pakuti akhafuna mwana wa Jakobho. Shekemu akhakuziwa kwene-kwene mubanja lake lentse.
Hamori namwana wake Shekemu adayenda kunsuwo waguta kwaadakalewa-lewa nawanthu waguta lawo, achiti,

“Wanthu awa akukhala bwino nayise; ninga akhala bzawo mudziko lino achichita malonda yawo, pakuti mukanyangana dziko lino ndikulu; ngatiloolelaneni nawo, wana wathu ambaloola wana wawo, wana wawombo ambaloola wana wathu.
Koma wanthu awa antobvuma kukhala nayise, tichikhala wanthu abodzi, mwamuna wentse ali pakati pathu akagwatiwa khanda lanyama lachimuna ninga bzaali iwo.
Ko chuma chawo nabzifuwo bzawo sibzin'zakhala bzathumbo? Nakutenepo ngatibvaneni nawo, kuti akhale nayise.”
Wanthu wentse adayenda kunsuwo waguta adabvuma bzidalewedwa na Hamori namwana wake Shekemu; mwamuna wentse adayenda kunsuwo waguta adagwatiwa khanda lanyama lachimuna.
Pantsiku yatatu, achali kuwawiwa, wana awili wa Jakobho Simiyoni na Levi, azimano wa Dhina, adatakula mabhemba yawo nkupita muguta mwakusaya kugopa, nkupha amuna wentse.
Adapha Hamori namwana wake Shekemu nabhemba, adatakula Dhina munyumba mwa Shekemu nkuyenda naye.
Wana wa Jakobho adayenda kukhana bzitanda, nkupamba guta, nathangwe lakuti nana wawo akhadapsipisiwa;
adatola mabila yawo, namadhonki yawo, nabzentse bzikhali muguta nan'thengo,
nachuma chawo chentse, nawana wawo wentse naakazi wawo, nabzentse bzikhali muzinyumba zawo, adabzipamba achibzichita bzawo.

Pamwepo Jakobho adati kwa Simiyoni na Levi, “Mwandibwelesela nyathwa, mwachita kuti ndinunkhe, kwawanthu wamudziko lino, a Kenani naa Perezi; ise ndise ang'ono-ng'ono, akakochezana adanyanganana nayine an'zandicheneka, ine nawanyumba yangu.”
Koma iwo adati, “Angaphate nana wathu ninga hule?”
Mulungu adati kwa Jakobho, “Sumuka, yenda ku Bheteli, ukakhale kumweko, kumweko ukamangile Mulungu mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe, uyo adabziwonesa kwayiwe pawudathawa nkulu wako Esau.”
Nakutenepo Jakobho adawuza wanyumba yake nawentse waakhanawo kuti, “Chosani amilungu wachilendo ali pakati panu, mubzichenese, mubvale bzakubvala bzinango;
ngatiyendeni ku Bheteli, ndikamangile Mulungu mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe, uyo adandidayila muntsiku zakushupika kwangu, pomwe akhana yine kwentse kwandikhayenda.”
Nakutenepo iwo adapasa Jakobho amilungu wawo wachilendo wentse waakhanawo, namphete zikhali m'makutu yawo, Jakobho adabzifuchila pantsi pamuti wamuoki ukhali pafupi na Shekemu.
Adafamba ulendo wawo, kugopsa kwa Mulungu, kukhafikila maguta yakhadaazungunuka kuchitila kuti aleke kuteyela wana wa Jakobho.
Jakobho adafika ku Luzi, ilo likhachemelewa pomwe kuti Bheteli, mudziko la Kenani, iye pabodzi nawanthu waakhanawo.
Adamanga mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe kumweko, achiyipasa dzina lakuti Eli-bheteli, pakuti Mulungu kumweko adabziwonesa pachake kwayiye paadathawa nkulu wake.
Dhebhora, nyakayaya wa Rabheka adafa, adamuyikha munyantsi mwamuti wamuoki chakunyantsi kwa Bheteli; Muti umwewo adawupasa dzina lakuti, “Muoki wakulila.”
Mulungu adabziwonesa pomwe kwa Jakobho, paadabwelela kuchoka ku Padhani-aramu, achimudalisa.
Mulungu adati kwayiye, “Dzina lako ndiwe Jakobho, koma un'zachemelewa lini nadzina lakuti Jakobho, waakuchemelewa kuti Izraeli.”
Mulungu adati kwayiye, “Ndine Mulungu wamphamvu. Balanani muwande; mishowo mizinji yawanthu in'zachoka kwayiwe, namazimambo yan'zachoka kwayiwe.
Dziko landidapasa Abhurahamu na Isaki, nin'zalipeleka kwayiwe nakum'badwe wako un'zabwela.”
Pamwepo Mulungu adachoka pambuto paakhalewa-lewa naye.
Jakobho adayimisa mwala utali pambuto yaadalewa-lewa na Mulungu, mwala utali; nkuthululapo ntsembe yavinyu, adathululapo mafuta yamuolivi pamwalawo.
Jakobho adapasa dzina mbuto yaadalewa-lewa na Mulungu lakuti, Beteli.

Jakobho nabanja lake adachoka pa Bheteli nkuyenda. Koma ali patali pang'ono kufika mudziko la Efurata, pathupi pa Rakelo padayamba kuwawa, pakuti nthawe yake yakubala ikhadafika. Rakelo adashupika kwene-kwene pakubala kwake.
Nthawe yaakhali kuwawidwa namimba an'yanchikuta adati kwayiwe, “Leka kugopa pakuti wapasiwa pomwe mwana wachimuna.”
Rakelo paakhali pafupi kufa adapasa mwanayo dzina lakuti Bhenuni, koma apayi wake adazampasa dzina lakuti Bhenjemani.
Nakutenepo Rakelo adafa achiyikhiwa m'mbali mwanjila ikhayenda ku Efurata, mbuto imweyo in'chemelewa pomwe kuti Bhetelehemu.
Jakobho adayimisa mwala kunsolo kwamanda ya Rakelo, mwalawo ulipo nalelo.
Izraeli adachokapo achikamanga tenti yake nachakum'mbali inango yaguta la Edheri.
Izraeli paakhakhala mudziko limwelo, Rubheni adagona na Bhiliha nkazi mung'ono waapayi wake; Izraeli adabzibva.
Tsapano wana wa Jakobho akhali khumi naawili.
Wana wa Liya akhali tenepa, wakuyamba akhali Rubheni, kuchizabwela Simiyoni na Levi na Judha na Isakali na Zebhuloni.
Wana wa Rakelo akhali, Jozefi na Bhenjemani.
Wana wa Bhiliha mulanda wachikazi wa Rakelo akhali Dhani na Nafitali.
Wana wa Zilipa mulanda wachikazi wa Liya akhali, Gadhi na Asheri. Awa ndiwo wana wa Jakobho waadabaliliwa paakhali mu Padhani-aramu.
Jakobho adabwela kwaapayi wake Isaki ku Mamure, panango kuti Kiriyati-aribha, iyo ikhachemelewa kuti Hebhuroni, kudambakhala Abhurahamu na Isaki.
Tsapano Isaki adalalama kwamagole dzana namakumi masele.
Isaki adafa, wakalamba kwene-kwene, adayikhiwa kudayikhiwa wam'badwe wake; wana wake Esau na Jakobho ndiwo adamuyikha.
Uwu ndiwo m'badwe wa Esau uyo akhachemelewa kuti Edhomu.
Esau adaloola akazi wachi Kenani, Adha mwana wachikazi wa Eloni mu Hiti, na Oholibhama mwana wachikazi wa Ana, mwana wachikazi wa Zibhiyoni mu Hivi,
na Bhasemati mwana wachikazi wa Ishimayeli, nana wa Nebhayoti.
Adha adabalila Esau, Elifazi; Bhasemati adabala Rueli;
Oholibhama adabala Jewushi na Jalamu na Khora. Awa ndiwo wana wa Esau waadabaliliwa paakhali mudziko la Kenani.

Pamwepo Esau adatakula azikazi wake, wana wake wachimuna nawachikazi, nawanthu wentse wamunyumba mwake, nabzifuwo bzake, nachuma chake chentse chaadawona mudziko la Kenani, nkuyenda kutali nankulu wake Jakobho.
Pakuti iwo akhana chuma nabzifuwo bzizinji, bzikhakwanisika lini kuti akhale pabodzi.
Esau adakhala mudziko lamapili mu Seiri; Esau an'chemelewa pomwe kuti Edhomu.
Uwu ndiwo m'badwe wa Esau, apayi waa Edhomu awo akhakhala mudziko lamapili la Seiri.
Aya ndiyo madzina yawana wa Esau: Elifazi mwana wa Adha nkazi wa Esau, Rueli mwana wachimuna wa Bhasemati nkazi wa Esau.
Wana wa Elifazi akhali, Themani na Omari na Zefo na Gatamu na Kenazi.
Thimina akhali nkazi mung'ono wa Elifazi, mwana wachimuna wa Esau. Iye adabalila Elifazi mwana wachimuna waadapasa dzina lakuti Amaleki. Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Adha nkazi wa Esau.
Awa ndiwo wana wa Rueli: Nahati na Zera na Shama na Miza. Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Bhasemati nkazi wa Esau.
Awa ndiwo wana wa Oholibhama mwana wachikazi wa Ana, mwana wachimuna wa Zibheyoni, nkazi wa Esau. Adabalila Esau Jehushi na Jalamu na Khora.
Aya ndiyo mazimambo yawana wa Esau. Wana wachimuna wa Elifazi, mwana wakuyamba wa Esau: mambo Temani na Omari kuchizabwela Zefo na Kenazi
na Khora na Gatamu na Amaleki. Aya ndiyo mazimambo yadabadwa na Elifazi mudziko la Edhomu; akhali wana wachimuna wa Adha.
Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Rueli, mwana wa Esau: mambo Nahati na Zera na Shama na Miza; aya ndiyo mazimambo ya Rueli mudziko la Edhomu; akhali wana wa Bhasemati nkazi wa Esau.
Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Oholibhama nkazi wa Esau: mambo Jewushi na Jalamu na Khora; aya ndiyo mazimambo yadabadwa na Oholibhamu mwana wachikazi wa Ana, nkazi wa Esau.
Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Esau (uyo akhachemelewa pomwe kuti Edhomu), awa akhali mazimambo yawo.
Awa akhali wana wachimuna wa Seiri mu Hori, akhakhala mudziko limwelo; pakhana Lotani na Shobhali na Zibheyoni na Ana
na Dhishoni na Ezeri na Dhishani; aya yakhali mazimambo yaa Hori, wana wachimuna wa Seiri wamudziko la Edhomu.
Wana wa Lotani akhali, Hori na Hemani; nana wa Lotani akhali Thimina.
Awa ndiwo akhali wana wachimuna wa Shobhali: Alivani na Manahati na Ebhali na Shefo na Onami.
Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Zibheyoni: Ayiya na Ana; ndiye Ana ule adawona ntsantsa zamadzi yakupsa muchipululu, paakhabusa madhonki yaapayi wake Zibheyoni.
Ana adabala wana awili Dhishoni na Oholibhama.
Awa ndiwo wana wa Dhishoni: Hemudhani na Eshibhani na Itirani na Kerani.
Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Ezeri: Bhilihani na Zaavani na Akani.
Awa ndiwo wana wachimuna wa Dhishani: Uzi na Arani.
Aya ndiyo mazimambo yaa Hori: mambo Lotani na Shobhali na Zibheyoni na Ana,
na Dhishoni na Ezeri na Dhishani; aya ndiyo mazimambo yaa Hori, kuteyeza madzinza yawo wamudziko la Seiri.
Aya ndiyo mazimambo yadatonga mudziko la Edhomu, a Izraeli anati awa namambo.
Bhela mwana wachimuna wa Bheyori adatonga mu Edhomu. Dzina laguta laakhatonga likhachemelela kuti Dhinihabha.
Bhela adafa, Jobhabhu mwana wachimuna wa Zera waku Bhozira ndiye adazatonga pambuto yake.
Jobhabhu adafa, Hushani wakudziko la Temani ndiye adazatonga pambuto yake.
Hushani adafa, Hadhadhi mwana wachimuna wa Bhedhadhi uyo adakunda a Midhiyani mudziko la Moabhi adatonga pambuto yake, dzina laguta laakhatonga likhachemelewa kuti Aviti.
Hadhadhi adafa, Samila waku Masireka adatonga pambuto yake.
Samila adafa, Shaulo waku Rehobhoti ku Ufuretesi ndiye adatonga pambuto yake.
Shauli adafa, Bhaali-hanani mwana wachimuna wa Akibhori adatonga pambuto yake.

Bhaali-hanani mwana wachimuna wa Akibhori adafa, Hadhari adatonga pambuto yake. Dzina laguta laakhatonga likhachemelewa kuti Pawu; nkazi wake akhachemelewa nadzina lakuti Mahetabheli, mwana wachikazi wa Matiredhi, mwana wachikazi wa Mezahabhi.
Aya ndiyo madzina yamazimambo ya Esau, kuteyeza mabanja yawo nambuto zaakhakhala, namadzina yawo: mambo Timuna na Aliva na Jeteti
na Oholibhama na Elahi na Pinoni
na Kenazi na Temani na Mibhizari na
Magidhiyeli na Iramu; aya ndiyo mazimambo ya Edhomu, (uyo akhachemelewa pomwe kuti Esau, apayi wa Edhomu), kuteyeza mbuto zaakhakhala mudziko lawo.
Jakobho akhakhala mudziko la Kenani, mukhakhala apayi wake ninga mulendo.
Iyi ndiyo nkhani ya Jakobho nabanja lake.
Jozefi paakhana magole khumi nanomwe, akhabusa mabila pabodzi naakulu wake wana wa Bhiliha na Zilipa akazi waapayi wake. Koma Jozefi akhawuza apayi wake bzakuyipa bzikhachitiwa naakulu wake.
Tsapano Izraeli akhafuna Jozefi kuposa wana wake anango wentse, pakuti nimwana waadabala wakalamba. Adamusonela chakubvala chitali chamanja matali.
Koma akulu wake paadawona kuti apayi wawo akhafunisisa Jozefi kuposa anango wentse, adamuzonda, adaleka kulewa-lewa naye bwino.
Ntsiku inango Jozefi adalota maloto, paadawuza akulu wake malotoyo, iwo adamuzondelatu kwakupitiliza.
ise tikhali m'munda tichimanga mitolo yatiligu, pamwepo ndidawona ntolo wangu udayima kuti dzololo, pamwepo mitolo yanu idabwela kuzayima kuzungunuka idakotamila ntolo wangu.”
Akulu wake adati kwayiye, “Iwe unachadidi kuti un'zatitonga tentse? Panango kuti uzatitonga tentse.” Nakutenepo iwo adamuzondelatu nathangwe yamaloto yake namafala yake.
Jozefi adalota pomwe yanango maloto, nkuwuza akulu wake, iye adati, “Ndalota pomwe maloto yanango, ndawona dzuwa namwezi nanyenyezi khumi nayibodzi bzichindikotamila.”
Koma paadawuza apayi wake naakulu wake, apayi wake adamutsimula, iwo adati, “Ko nimaloto yanshowo wanyi yamweyo? Ko ukulewa kuti chadidi ine naamayi wako naakulu wako tin'zakukotamila?”
Pamwepo akulu wake adaphatiwa nanchanje, koma apayi wake adayikha bzaadalewa muntima mwawo.
Ntsiku inango akulu wa Jozefi adayenda ku Shekemu kabusa mabila yaapayi wawo.
Tsapano Izraeli adati, kwa Jozefi, “Ko akulu wako saali kubusila bzifuwo ku Shekemu? Bwela, ninfuna kukutuma ku kwayiwo.” Iye adati, “Ndili pano.”

Apayi wake adati, “Ndaphata minyendo, yenda kwaakulu wako kwaakubusila mabila ukawone kuti ali tani, uzandiwuze kuti bzilitani.” Nakutenepo Jakobho adamutuma kuchoka mugowa la Hebhuroni kuyenda ku Shekemu.
Munthu adamuwona achifamba-famba nthengo. Munthuyo adam'bvunza kuti, “Ko ukupsaganyi?”
Jozefi adati, “Ndikupsaga akulu wangu, ndaphata minyendo, mungandiwuzeko kwaali kubusila bzifuwo bzawo?”
Mwamunayo adati, “Ayenda, koma ndaabva achiti tiyendeni ku Dhotani.” Jozefi adazaateyela achikaawona ali ku Dhotani.
Adamuwona ali patali, iye anati wafika iwo nkuyamba kupangana kuti amuphe.
Ngatimupheni timuthuse mudindi, apayi akakatibvunza tinkati, ‘Adadyewa nanyama zan'thengo, tiwone kuti maloto yake yan'zathandizanyi.’ ”
Koma Rubheni paadabzibva adapulumusa Jozefi kuchoka m'manja mwawo, iye adati kwayiwo, “Ngatileke kumupha.”
Rubheni adati kwayiwo, “Lekani kumupha? Muthuseni mudindi lili muno muchipululu. Ngapaleke kuwoneka an'chita chakuyipa payiye.” Adalewa tenepo achifuna kumuchiza, kuti azam'bweze kwaapayi wake.
Nakutenepo Jozefi paadafika pakhana akulu wake, adam'bvula chakubvala chake chamanja matali chaakhabvala.
Adam'phata achimuthusa mudindi, dindi limwelo likhadawuma likhalibe madzi.

Tsapano akulu wa Jozefi adazakhala pantsi achidya, ali pakudya tenepo adawona wanthu wachi Ishimayeli akhachoka ku Giliyadhi achiyenda ku Ijipiti, nangamela zawo zikhadatakula bzakudzola bzakununkhila nagamu nabhali namura.
Judha adati kwaabale wake, “Ko bzintithandizanyi kupha mung'ono wathu tichibisa gazi lake?
Ngatimuguliseni kwaa Ishimayeli, ngatileke kumpweteka pakuti ning'ono wathu, ndise wagazi libodzi.” Akulu wake naang'ono wake adamutetekela.
Nakutenepo a anyamalonda wachi Midhiyani adapita napamwepo, adabulisa Jozefi mudindi, achimugulisa kwaa Ishimayeli namasheleni yasiliva makumi mawili, adatola Jozefi nkuyenda naye ku Ijipita.
Rubheni paadabwelela kudindi, nkuwona kuti Jozefi mulibe, adang'amba bzakubvala bzake.
Adabwelela kwaabale wake, adati kwayiwo, “Ndawona mudindi Jozefi mulibe! Ko niniyenda kuponi ine!”
Pamwepo iwo adapha mbuzi nkunyika chakubvala cha Jozefi mugazi lambuziyo.
Adatola chakubvala chake nkuyenda nacho kwaapayi wawo kwadakati, “Ibzi ndibzo bzatawona; wonani, ko nchakubvala lini chamwana wanu ichi?”
Jakobho adachidziwa, iye adati, “Nchakubvala chamwana wangu, adatodyewa nabzinyama bzan'thengo. Jozefi adatong'ambiwa-ng'ambiwa!”
Pamwepo Jakobho adang'amba bzakubvala bzake. Adabvala masakha achilila mwana wake kwantsiku zizinji.

Wana wake wentse wachimuna nawachitsikana adayesa kumunyamaliza, koma alibe kukwanisa kumunyamaliza, iye adati, “Nee niniyenda kumbuto yawanthu wakufa kuna mwana wangu ndichilila.” Nakutenepo apayi wake adamulila.
Nthawe imweyo a Midhiyani adakagulisa Jozefi ku Ijipiti kwa Potifa, nduna yamambo Farawo, nkulu waakhalilizi.
Nthawe imweyo Judha adasiya abale wake nkuyenda kakhala namwamuna munango wachi Adhulamu akhachitiwa Hira.
Kumweko Judha adawona mwana wachikazi wamunango mu Kenani, akhachitiwa Shua, adamuloola nkugona naye.
Iye adaphata pathupi nkubala mwana wachimuna waadapasa dzina lakuti Eri.
Adaphata pomwe pathupi achibala mwana wachimuna waadapasa dzina lakuti Onani.
Adazabala pomwe munango mwana wachitatu waadapasa dzina lakuti Shela. Paadabala mwana umweyo akhakhala ku Kezibhi.
Judha adaloolela mwana wake wakuyamba Eri, nkazi akhachitiwa Tamari.
Koma Eri mwana wa Judha wakuyamba akhali wakuyipa patsogolo pa Chawuta, nakutenepo Chawuta adamupha.
Pamwepo Judha adati kwa Onani, “Yenda kagone nankazi wankulu wako, uchite basa lamulamu kwayiye, abalile wana nkulu wake.”
Koma Onani adazadziwa kuti wana waachabala an'zakhala lini wake. Nakutenepo paakhagona na Tamari, akhatayila umuna wake pantsi kuti aleke kubalila nkulu wake wana.
Koma bzidachitiwa na Onani bzilibe kukondwesa Chawuta, nakutenepo adazamuphambo pomwe Onani.

Pamwepo Judha adati kumuloola wake Tamari, “Bwelela kunyumba kwaapayi wako, ukakhale ndziche kufikila Shela mwana wangu wakula.” Judha adachita tenepo pakuti akhagopela mwana wake Shela kuti angaphewe bzidachitiwa akulu wake. Pamwepo Tamari adabwelela kakhala kwaapayi wake.
Kwatopita kanthawe nkazi wa Judha mwana wa Shua adafa. Tsapano Judha paadamala kulila nkazi wake, iye nashamwali yake Hira mu Adhulamu adayenda ku Timina kukhagelewa mabila yawo.
Tamari paadawuziwa kuti, “Atebzala wako akuyenda ku Timuna kagela mabila yawo,”

iye adabvula bzakubvala bzawudziche bzaakhabvala. Adabzifinika kumaso nadhuku achiyenda kakhala pansuwo waguta likhachemelewa kuti Enaimu, munjila ikhayenda ku Timina. Pamwepo adawona kuti Shela wakula, koma alibe kumpeleka kuti apite nthaka.
Judha paadawona Tamari adakumbuka kuti nihule, pakuti akhadabzifinika kumaso.
Judha adapatuka achikalewa-lewa naye kuti agone naye, iye alibe kudziwa kuti nimuloola wake.
Tamari adati, “Ndipaseni chinango chinthu chamunacho kuti ndiphate mpaka mwatumila kambuziko.”
Judha adati, “Ko ningakupasenyi kuti uphate?” Iye adati, “Ndipaseni lingi yachidhindo nathambo yache, nampsimbo yamunayo.” Nakutenepo Judha adampasa bzinthubzo nkugona naye, iye nkuphata pathupi.
Tamari adabwelela kunyumba kwake, nkuchosa nguwo ile yaakhadabzifunikisa kumaso, nkubvala bzakubvala bzawudziche wake.
Judha adazatuma shamwari yake Hira wachi Adhulamu kuti ayende nakambuzi, achikatakula bzinthu bzake bzaakhadaphatisa, koma shamwali yake paadakafika kumweko adakamusaya.
Hira adabvunza wanthu wamu Enayimu kuti, “Ko hule likhakhala panjila yapa Timina ili kuponi?” Wanthu adati, “Palibe kukhalako hule pano.”
Nakutenepo iye adabwelela kwa Judha achikati kwayiye, “Ndilibe kumuwona, pomwe wanthu wakumweko alewa kuti palibe kukhalako hule pano.”
Judha adati, “Ngaakhale nabzo bzinthubzo bzikhale bzake, pakuti tingasekewe, wona ndatumiza kambuzi koma iwe ulibe kumuwona.”
Kudapita mwezi mitatu, Judha adazawuziwa kuti, “Muloola wako Tamari adachita uhule, tsapano wawa napathupi.” Judha adati, “Mubweleseni atenthewe.”

Paakhafuna kumutakula kuti ayende naye, Tamari adatumila fala kwaatebzala wake achiti, “Ndina pathupi pamwamuna adandipasa bzinthu ibzi. Munyanganisise, ndaphata minyendo kuti lingi yachidhindo nathambo nampsimbo nibzayani.”
Judha adadziwa kuti bzinthu nibzake, iye adati, “Tamari alibe mulandu. Ndine nyakutaza, pakuti ndilibe kuzampasa mwana wangu Shela kuti amuloole.” Judha alibe kuzagona naye pomwe.
Nthawe yakubala payidafika bzidazawoneka kuti akhana mapasa.
Nthawe yakubala, mwana munango adachosa janja lake kunja, an'nyanchikuta nkumangilila kathambo kafuyila kujanja lakelo nkuti, “Uyu ndiye wakuyamba.”
Koma mwanayo adazabwezela janja lake nkati, pamwepo m'bale wake nkuchoka. Nyan'chikuta adati, “Ko ndiwo mpatuko wawabzichitila uwu?” Mwana umweyo adazampasa dzina lakuti Perezi.
Khalekhale m'bale wake adabulambo ana kathambo kafuyila kujanja, achimpasa dzina lakuti Zera.
Tsapano Jozefi adayendesewa ku Ijipiti, Potifa nduna ya Farawo, nkulu waakhalilizi, wachi Ijipiti adamugula kuchoka kwaa Ishimayeli awo adamuyendesa kumweko.
Chawuta akhatsogolela Jozefi, nakutenepo Jozefi adasumukila paakhali munyumba mwambuya wake Potifa.
Mbuya wake adawona kuti Chawuta akhamutsogolela, pomwe kuti ndiye akhachitisa kuti iye asumukile pabzinthu bzake bzentse bzaakhachita.
Nakutenepo Jozefi adakomelewa ntima na Potifa kuti akhale mulanda wake, adazampasa basa lakumbayanganila munyumba mwake nabzinthu bzake bzentse bzaakhanabzo.
Kuchoka panthawe yaadamuchita nkulu wakunyanganila munyumba mwake nabzentse bzaakhanabzo, Chawuta adadalisa Potifa wachi Ijipiti nabzentse bzaakhanabzo kuphatanizila munda wake nathangwe la Jozefi.
Nakutenepo adayikha bzinthu bzake bzentse bzaakhanabzo m'manja mwa Jozefi; kukhala naye kwaadachita akhalibe basa nabzinango bzentse kunja kwachakudya basi.
Tsapano Jozefi akhali wakukoma nkhope kwene-kwene, akhana chimilo chabwino.
Padapita kanthawe, nkazi wambuya wake adayamba kusilila Jozefi, nkuti kwayiye, “Gona nayine.”
Koma iye adalamba, adati kwankazi wambuya wake, “Nyanganani, anayine tenepa, mbuya wangu palibe chaaningopela, pakuti adayikha bzinthu bzentse m'manja mwangu;

panyumba pano palibe munango ana mphamvu kuposa ine; mambo wangu adandipasa mphamvu pabzinthu bzentse, kusiya kwayimwe basi, pakuti ndimwe nkazi wake; ningachitilenyi chinthu chakuyipa tenepo, ndichitazila Mulungu?”
Ne nkazi wa Potifa paadalewa-lewa na Jozefi ntsiku nantsiku, koma Jozefi alibe kubvuma kugona naye panango kukhala naye pafupi.
Ntsiku inango, paadapita munyumba kaphata basa lake, alanda anango wentse pakhalibe.
Nkazi wa Potifa adaphata chakubvala chake adati kwayiye, “Gona nayine.” Pamwepo Jozefi adapsukunyuka achisiya chakubvala chake m'manja mwankaziyo, iye nkubula panja.
Nkaziyo paadawona kuti Jozefi wathawa wasiya chakubvala chake,
iye adakuwilila kwaalanda akhaphata basa munyumba mwake, iye adati, “Wonani, mu Hebheru waadatibwelesela akufuna kutitazila, wapita munyumba mwangu achifuna kugona nayine, koma ine ndazakuwilila.
Pandakuwa ndipo pawathawa achibula panja, wasiya bzakubvala bzake.”
Pamwepo nkaziyo adayikha bzakubvala bza Jozefi kufikila mbuya wake wabwela.
Tsapano iye adalongosolela mwamuna wake nkhani ibodzi-bodziyo, adati, “Mulanda wachi Hebheru wamudatibwelesela pano akhafuna kundiphata.
Koma panthawe yandakuwa, wasiya bzakubvala bzake nkuthawa munyumba.”
Mbuya wake paadabva mafala yankazi wake yakuti, “Ibzi ndibzo bzandachitiliwa namulanda wanu” iye adakalipa nabzo kwene-kwene.
Nakutenepo mbuya wa Jozefi adamuyikha mujeli, mukhayikhiwa akayidi wamambo, iyembo akhali mujeli.
Koma Chawuta adatsogolela Jozefi achimudalisa, adachita kuti wakunyangana mujeri amubvele chifundo.
Nkulu wamujeli adayikha Jozefi kuti anyanganile akayidi wentse akhali njelimo, nabzentse bzikhachitika mujelimo ndiye akhanyanganila.
Nkuluyo alibe pomwe kumbazanyangana nabzamujelimo pakuti bzentse bzikhadayikhiwa m'manja mwa Jozefi, pakuti nthawe zentse Chawuta akhamutsogolela, achimusumusa pabzentse bzaakhachita.
Pakudapita nthawe, nyakupeleka vinyu wamambo wa Ijipiti nanyakuphika zingwa adatazila mbuya wawo mambo wa Ijipiti.
Farawo adakalipila manduna yake mawili. Nkulu waanyakupeleka vinyu nankulu waanyakuphika zingwa.
Adaayikha mujeli, munyumba yankulu waakhalilizi, mujeli mukhana Jozefi.
Nkulu waakhalilizi adayikha wanthuwo m'manja mwa Jozefi, adakhala kwakanthawe mujeli.
Usiku unango alanda wamambo wa Ijipiti awili wale, wakupeleka vinyu, nanyakuphika zingwa wamambo wa Ijipiti akhali mujeli adalota. Munango namunango maloto yake, loto lokha likhalewa bzakusiyana.
Jozefi paadafika kwayiwo mangwana yache machibese-bese, adawona kuti iwo niwakudodoma.
Nakutenepo iye adaabvunza manduna ya Farao waakhanawo mujeli yamunyumba mwabuya wake kuti, “Thangwe lanyi lelo nkhope zanu n'zakudodoma?”
Iwo adati kwa Jozefi, “Talota maloto, koma pasaya anilapanula.” Jozefi adati kwayiwo, “Ko kulapanula tulo sikun'choka kwa Mulungu? Ndaphata minyendo ndiwuzeni maloto yanu ndibve.”
Pamwepo nkulu waanyakupeleka vinyu adalongosolela Jozefi maloto yake, iye adati, “Ndawona muvayini patsogolo pangu,
ukhana mithayi mitatu. Masamba payadayamba kuphukila udayambambo kuchita maluwa, nkubala magilepisi yakutokota.
Pamwepo komeshi ya Farawo ikhali m'manja mwangu. Ndidapsinyila nsuzu wamagilepisi mukomeshi ya Farawo, ndichipeleka komeshiyo m'manja mwa Farao.”
Jozefi adati kwayiye, “Ibzi ndibzo bzabzinilewa, mithayi mitatu nintsiku zitatu.
Kumala kwantsiku zitatu, Farawo an'zakutsudzula achikubwezela pabasa lako lawukhachita pakuyamba lakupeleka vinyu kwamambo.
Koma undikumbukembo, bzikakufambila bwino, ndaphata minyendo, undichitilembo chifundo, ukandiyimililembo kwa Farawo kuti andibulisembo muno,
pakuti ine ndidachita bzakubewa kudziko laa Hebheru. Ine palilibe chandidachita kuti angandiyikhe mujeli.”
Tsapano nkulu waanyakuphika zingwa paadabva kulapanula kwa Jozefi kukhali kwabwino, iye adati, “Nayinembo pomwe ndalota maloto, ndidasenza mpsanda zitatu, zikhana zingwa.
Mumpsanda yapadzulu mukhana chakudya cha Farawo chakusiyana-siyana, koma chakudyacho chikhadyewa nambalami chili mumpsanda ikhali pansolo wangu.”
Jozefi adati, “Ibzi ndibzo bzinilewa maloto yako, mpsanda zitatu bzinilewa ntsiku zitatu.
Nkati mwa ntsiku zitatu, Farawo achakugwata nsolo, achikumangilila pamuti, mbalami zichizadya thupi lako.”
Ntsiku yachitatu, mambo adachitila alanda wake feshita yakupembelela ntsiku yakubaliwa kwake. Paakhali padale adachemelesa nkulu waanyakupeleka vinyu nankulu waanyakuphika zingwa.
Adabwezela nkulu waanyakupeleka vinyu pabasa lake, achipeleka khomeshi m'manja mwa Farawo,
koma nkulu waanyakuphika zingwa adamangililiwa pamuti, kuyendelana nabzidalewedwa na Jozefi.
Koma nkulu waanyakupeleka vinyu alibe kuzakumbuka Jozefi, adamuyebwelatu.
Pakudapita magole mawili, Farawo adalota adayima mphepete mwakamadzi ka Nayilo.
Pamwepo adawona ng'ombe zinomwe zikazi zabwino zakunenepa, zichibula m'madzi zichidya mumitete.
Adazawona pomwe ng'ombe zikazi zinomwe zakuyipa zakuwonda zichibula mu Nayilo zichikayima pakhana ng'ombe zile zikazi zakunenepa, mphepete mwakamadzi.
Ng'ombe zakuyipa, zakuwonda zile zidadya zabwino, zakunenepa zinomwe. Pamwepo Farawo adalamuka.
Adagona pomwe nkulota kachiwili; adalota ngala zinomwe zatiligu zakukhuma, zabwino zikhali patsinde ibodzi.
Adazawona pomwe ngala zinomwe zikhalibe kukhuma, zidawumisiwa namphepo yakumabveladzuwa.
Ngala zikhalibe kukhuma zidameza ngala zakukhuma, pamwepo Farawo nkulamuka, adazadziwa kuti kukhali kulota.

Mangwana yache, Farawo paadalamuka adashupika kwene-kwene. Nakutenepo adazatuma wanthu kachemela anyamatsenga wentse wamu Ijipiti nawakuchenjela, nkuwalongosolela maloto yake, koma palibe adakwanisa kuyalapanula.
Tsapano nkulu waanyakupeleka vinyu adati kwa Farawo, “Lelo ndazawona kutaza kwangu.
Imwe mambo pamudambatikalipila, inepo nankulu waanyakuphika zingwa muchitiyikha mujeli kunyumba yankulu waakhalilizi,
tidalota maloto usiku umwewo. Maloto yake nayangu yakhana bzayakhalewa.
Tikhana mu Hebheru waching'ono kumweko, mulanda wankulu wakunyanganila mujelimo; patidamuwuza maloto yathu iye adalapanula maloto yamuthu yekha-yekha kuteyeza kulota kwatidachita.
Kulapanula kwaadachita malotoyo kwayise ndibzo chayibzo bzidazachitika, ine ndidazabwezelewa pabasa langu, wakunyanganila wakuphika adazaphewa.”
Nthawe imweyo Farawo adatuma munthu kachemela Jozefi. Adamuchosa mujeli, achimugela ndebvu. Adampasa bzakubvala bzabwino, achimuyendesa kwa Farawo.
Farao adati kwa Jozefi, “Ndalota, koma palibe wakwanisa kulapanula malotoyo. Tsapano ndawuziwa kuti iwe unkwanisa kulapanula maloto.”
Jozefi adati kwa Farawo, “Ine ndekha ningakwanise lini, Mulungu ndiye ankwanisa kulapanula maloto yanu.”
Pamwepo Farawo adati kwa Jozefi, “Ndidalota ndidayima mphepete mwakamadzi ka Nayilo,
ndidawona m'madzi muchibula ng'ombe zikazi zinomwe zabwino zakunenepa, zichidya mumitete.
Kudazabula pomwe zinango ng'ombe zinomwe zikazi zakuyipa, zakuwonda, zikhadandosala mabondo basi, ndinati ndawona ng'ombe zakutenepo muno mu Ijipiti.
Ng'ombe zakuyipa, zakuwonda zidadya ng'ombe zinomwe zakunenepa.
Koma zakuwonda pazidadya zakunenepa, palibe akhakwanisa kudziwa kuti zadya zakunenepa, pakuti zidandowa zakuwondoloka ninga bzazikhali pakuyamba, pamwepo ndidazalamuka.
Mumaloto yangu ndidazalota, ngala zinomwe zambewu zakukhuma, zabwino zikhali patsinde ibodzi.
Padazabulambo pomwe ngala zinomwe zikhana mbewu zitete zakufota zikhalibe kukhuma, zikhadawumisiwa namphepo yakumabveladzuwa.
Ngala zinomwe zitete zakufota zidameza ngala zinomwe zakukhuma. Ndidalongosolela anyamatsenga maloto yangu, koma palibe ne m'bodzi wawo adakwanisa kulapanula malotoyo.”
Pamwepo Jozefi adati kwa Farawo, “Mambo, maloto yanu yentse yali mawili yanilewa chinthu chibodzi. Mulungu wakuwonesani imwe bzaanfuna kuchita.
Ng'ombe zinomwe zikazi zakunenepa bzinilewa magole manomwe, ngala zinomwe zakukhuma bzinilewa magole manomwe. Maloto yamweyo yanilewa chinthu chibodzi.
Ng'ombe zinomwe zikazi zakuyipa zakuwonda zidamalizila kubula nangala zinomwe zikhalibe kukhuma, zidawumisiwa namphepo yakumabveladzuwa, bzinilewa magole manomwe yanjala in'zachitika kutsogolo.”
Ibzi bzin'zachitika ninga kukuwuzani kwandachita imwe mbuya wangu pakuyamba, Mulungu wakuwonesani bzin'zachitika kutsogolo.
Kumbwela magole manomwe yampfumba mudziko lentse la Ijipiti,
pambuyo pampfumba, kun'zabwela magole manomwe yanjala, pamwepo an'zayebwa mfumba yentse mudziko la Ijipiti, pakuti njala in'zameza dziko.
Mpfumba in'zakumbukiwa lini mudziko, nathangwe lakuti njala in'zachitika in'zakhala ikulu kwene-kwene.
Maloto yanu yabwezelewa kawili, pakuti Mulungu ndibzo bzawakumbuka kuchita. Mulungu an'zachita kuti bzichitike tsapanopa.
“Tsapano imwe sankhulani munthu ankumbuka pomwe wakuchenjela, mumuyikhe anyanganile dziko la Ijipiti.
Farawo ngaapitilize kusankhula wakunyanganila mudziko, atole chachishanu, pambewu zaanilima mudziko la Ijipiti, pamagole manomwe yampfumba.
Ngaakhonkobze chakudya chentse pamagole yampfumba yakubwela, Farawo aapase mvumo yakuyikha chakudya m'maguta yaniyikhiwa chakudya, achichengete.
Chakudya chimwecho ngachiyikhiwe pambali mudziko, kuchitila magole manomwe yanjala in'zagwela Ijipiti, kuchitila kuti dziko lizaleke kuchenekeka nanjala.”
Farawo nanduna zake zentse adakondwa nanzelu zidapelekewa na Jozefi.
Pamwepo Farawo adati kwaalanda wake, “Ko tingamuwone kuponi munthu adalingana nawuyu, ana n'zimu wa Mulungu?”
Nakutenepo Farawo adati kwa Jozefi, “Pakuti Mulungu wawonesa kale bzentse ibzi kwayiwe, palibe munango ankumbuka pomwe wakuchenjela ninga iwe,
iwe un'khala ntongi nkulu wapan'zinda wangu. Wanthu wangu wentse achachita bzawun'zalewa. Koma pankhani zawumambo ndine nkulu kuposa iwe.”
Farawo adati kwa Jozefi, “Ndakuchita ntongi padziko lentse la Ijipiti.”
Nakutenepo Farawo adachosa lingi yachidhindo kujanja lake achibvadzika Jozefi, adam'bvadzika bzakubvala bzabwino bzalineni, achim'bvadzika cheni yagolidhe n'khosi.
Mambo adachita kuti Jozefi akwile mungolo yachiwili yawumambo, kutsogolo kwake kukhana wanthu akhakuwilila kuti, “Mugodamileni!” Ndiko kuyikhiwa kudachitiwa Jozefi kuwa ntongi wamu Ijipiti yentse.
Farawo adati kwa Jozefi, “Ndine Farawo, palibe munthu an'chita chinthu chawunsaya kudziwa iwe mudziko lentse la Ijipiti.”
Farawo adapasa Jozefi dzina lachi Ijipiti lakuti Zafenatipaniya,
Jozefi akhana magole makumi matatu, paadapasiwa basa namambo Farawo waku Ijipiti, Jozefi adachoka kukhana Farawo achikafambila dziko lentse la Ijipiti.
Pamagole manomwe yampfumba, dziko lapantsi mudachita chakudya chizinji kwene-kwene.
Jozefi adagwezeka chakudya mudziko la Ijipiti m'magole manomwe yampfumba. Adagwezeka chakudya mumaguta; adagwezeka chakudya mumaguta yentse, chikhachoka m'minda ikhadazungunuka maguta.
Nakutenepo Jozefi adagwezeka chakudya chizinji kwene-kwene, ninga n'chenga wamunyanja, kufikila adazaleka kuchipima, pakuti chikhapimika lini.
Magole yanjala yanati yafika, Jozefi akhadatobala wana awili wachimuna na Asenati mwana wa Potifera, nyantsembe wa Oni.
Jozefi adapasa mwana wake wakuyamba dzina lakuti, Manase achiti, “Mulungu wachita kuti ndiyebwe kushupika kwangu, nawanyumba yaapayi wangu.”
Mwana wake wachiwili adampasa dzina lakuti, Efulemu, bzichilewa kuti, “Mulungu wandipasa wana ndili mudziko lakushupika kwangu.”
Magole manomwe yampfumba yakhali mudziko la Ijipiti yadafika pakumala;
magole manomwe yanjala yadayamba, kuteyeza kulewa kwadachita Jozefi. Madziko yanango yentse yakhana njala, koma mudziko la Ijipiti ndimo mukhana chakudya.
Mudziko la Ijipiti pamukhana njala, wanthu adalila kwa Farawo achifuna chakudya. Koma Farawo adati kwaa Ijipiti wentse, “Yendani kwa Jozefi mukachite bzaankakuwuzani.”
Nakutenepo njala payidakula mu Ijipiti, Jozefi adafungula magwangwa, nkuyamba kugulisila chakudya wanthu wamu Ijipiti, pakuti njala ikhadakula mudziko la Ijipiti.
Pomwe madziko yentse yapantsi yadayenda ku Ijipiti kukhana Jozefi kuzagula chakudya, pakuti njala ikhadakula padziko lentse lapantsi.
Jakobho paadadziwa kuti ku Ijipiti kukhana chakudya, adati kwawana wake, “Ko thangwe lanyi tikundonyanganana?”
Iye adati, “Ndabva kuti ku Ijipiti kuna chakudya. Yendani mukatigulile chakudya, kuti tilalame, tileke kufa.”
Nakutenepo akulu wa Jozefi khumi adayenda ku Ijipiti kagula chakudya.
Koma Jakobho alibe kuyendesa Bhenjemani mung'ono wa Jozefi, pabodzi naakulu wake, pakuti akhagopela kuti chinango chinthu chingachitike kwayiye.
Wana wa Izraeli adabwela kuzagula pabodzi naanango, pakuti mu Kenani mukhadachita njala.
Jozefi akhali nduna ikulu mudziko la Ijipiti yentse, iye ndiye akhagulisila wanthu wamudziko limwelo chakudya. Abale wa Jozefi adafika achimukotamila, adakotamisa nkhope zawo patsogolo pake.

Jozefi paadawona akulu wake adaadziwa, koma adaaphata ninga alendo, adalewa-lewa nawo mwakunyinduka, adati kwayiwo, “Mwachoka kuponi?” Iwo adati, “Tachoka kudziko la Kenani, tabwela kuzagula chakudya.”
Jozefi adadziwa akulu wake, koma iwo alibe kumudziwa.
Pamwepo Jozefi adazakumbuka maloto yake yaadalota yakhadanyangana nayiwo, iye adati kwayiwo, “Ndimwe akadidiya, mwabwela kuzawona kuti dziko lathu nilakulimba panango nee.”
Iwo adati, “Nee mbuya wathu, ise alanda wanu tabwela kuzagula chakudya.
Ndise wana wamunthu m'bodzi, ndise wanthu wakukhulupilika, ise alanda wanu ndise lini akadidiya.”
Jozefi adati kwayiwo, “Nee, imwe mwabwela kuzawona kuti dziko lathu nilakulimba panango nee.”
Iwo adati, “Ise alanda wanu, ndise khumi naawili pawubale wathu, wana wamunthu m'bodzi wamudziko la Kenani; wakumalizila ana apayi wathu, mung'ono wathu pachalibe.”
Jozefi adati, “Ndipo pandalewa kuti ndimwe akadidiya.
Nathangwe layibzi ninkuyesani, nintolumbila namambo Farawo, muniyenda lini, kufikila mung'ono wanu wabwela pano.

Mutume m'bodzi wanu, abwele namung'ono wanu adasala, koma anango mwentse muchasala muli mujeli. Mukabwela naye ndipo panin'zadziwa kuti mukulewa chadidi panango mukulewa gunkha, mukaleka kuchita bzandalewa ninilumbila na Farawo, kuti chadidi ndimwe akadidiya.”
Ntsiku yachitatu Jozefi adati kwayiwo, “Pakuti ine nin'gopa Mulungu, peno munfuna kuchila muchite bzaninkuwuzani.
Peno ndimwe wanthu wakukhulupilika, m'bodzi wanu asale njeli, anango wentse yendeselani chakudya mabanja yanu kuti yaleke kufa nanjala,
mubwelese mung'ono wanu kwayine, pamwepo nin'zadziwa kuti mukulewa chadidi, kuchitila kuti muzaleke kuphewa.”

Adati kwamunango namunango, “Chadidi, tina mulandu thangwe labzatidachitila mung'ono wathu Jozefi, tidawona kushupika kwake paakhatikumbila kuti tichize umoyo wake, ise tilibe kutetekela. Koma lelo uno bzatidachita bzaakutibwelelambo ise.”
Pamwepo Rubheni adati, “Ko ndilibe kukuwuzani kuti lekani kuchitila chakuyipa kwamwana uyu? Koma imwe mulibe kunditetekela, nakutenepo gazi lake laakubwezelambo.”
Koma iwo alibe kudziwa kuti Jozefi akhabva bzaakhalewa, pakuti pakhana munthu akhatulukila pakati payiwo nayiye.
Jozefi adachokapo nkuyamba kulila. Adabwelela pomwe kuzalewa-lewa nawo, adazatola Simiyoni achimuyikha mujeli wentse achiwona.

Jozefi adawuza wanthu kuti adzadze chakudya m'masakha yawo, achiyikha masheleni yaadagula nayo chakudya m'masakhayo, nakuwapasa chakudya chakuyenda achidya pawulendo wawo, ibzi ndibzo bzaadachitiliwa.
Pamwepo akulu wake adayikha mitolo yawo yachakudya pamadhonki, nkuyenda ulendo wawo.
Koma paadayima kuti agone, munango wawo adatsudzula ntolo wake kuti apase dhonki lake chakudya, adawona masheleni pamulomo wasakha lake.
Iye adati kwaabale wake, “Masheleni yandagula nayo chakudya yabwezelewa, yayikhiwa pomwe musakha langu.” Pamwepo mitima yawo wentse idamenya. Iwo adati, “Nchinyi chimwechi chatachitiliwa na Mulungu?”
Paadafika kwaapayi wawo Jakobho mudziko la Kenani, adalongosola bzentse bzikhadachitika kwayiwo, iwo adati,
“Mwamunayo, mbuya wamudziko watidawona, paakhalewa-lewa nayise akhachita bzakutinyindukila, akhati ndise akadidiya, tidayenda kanyangana dziko.
Koma ise tidati kwayiye, ‘Ndise lini akadidiya, ndise wanthu wakukhulupilika;
tilipo khumi naawili pawubale bwathu; wana wamunthu m'bodzi, m'bodzi pachalibe, mung'ono wathu wakumalizila ana apayi wathu mudziko la Kenani.’
Pamwepo mwamunayo, mbuya wadziko limwelo adati, ‘Ibzi ndibzo bzichandidziwisa kuti ndimwe wakukhulupilika, siyani m'bale wanu m'bodzi kuno, takulani chakudya chamabanja yanu yananjala muyende.
Bwelani namung'ono wanu, pamwepo ine nin'zadziwa kuti ndimwe lini akadidiya, koma wanthu wakukhulupilika. Mukatenepo nin'zakubwezelani m'bale wanu, imwe muchizachita malonda yanu mudziko lino.’ ”
Paadakhuthula masakha yawo, munthu wentse adawona musakha lake muna masheleni, apayi wawo adawona nthawa zamasheleniyo, wentse adakankhamuka nabzo.
Apayi wawo Jakobho adati, “Mwandimalila wana wangu Jozefi adafa, Simiyoni pachalibe. Tsapano mwaakufuna kunditolela Bhenjemani pomwe. Bzentse bzagwela ine.”
Pamwepo Rubheni adati kwaapayi wake, “Ndikaleka kubwelela na Bhenjemani, mun'zapha wana wangu awili awa. Muyikheni m'manja mwangu, ndine nimbwelela naye kwayimwe.”
Koma Jakobho adati, “Mwana wangu aniyenda lini, nkulu wake adafa. Uyu ndiye wasala, pakachitika chinango chakuyipa pawulendo wamukufamba, mun'zayendesa nsolo wangu wayimvi kumbuto yawanthu wakufa.”
Paadadya chakudya chaadabwela nacho kuchoka ku Ijipiti, apayi wawo adati, “Yendani pomwe mukagule chakudya ching'ono-ng'ono.”
Koma Judha adati kwaapayi wake, “Mwamunayo adatichenjezelatu, adati, ‘Mun'zawona lini nkhope yangu, kunja kwakuti mwabwela namung'ono wanu.’
Koma mukatituma pabodzi namung'ono wathu, tiniyenda kakugulilani chakudya;
koma mukalamba kuti tiyende naye, nayisembo pomwe tiniyenda lini, pakuti mwamunayo adati, ‘Mun'zawona lini nkhope yangu, kunja kwakuti mwabwela namung'ono wanu.’ ”
Izraeli adati, “Mudachitilanyi bzakuyipa tenepo? Thangwe lanyi mudawuza munthuyo kuti muna mung'ono wanu munango?”

Iwo adati, “Mwamuna umweyo adatibvunzisisa, adazabvunza nabzaabale wathu, adazatibvunzambo pomwe nabzayimwe adati, ‘Ko apayi wanu achali wamoyo? Ko muna munango mung'ono wanu?’ Nakutenepo tikhandodayila bzaakhatibvunza, tilibe kudziwa kuti iye achati bwelani namung'ono wanu.”
Judha adati kwaapayi wake Izraeli, “Tipaseni Bhenjemani tiyende naye, kuti imwe nayise nawana wathu tileke kufa nanjala.
Ine chadidi-chadidi ndichawona kuti ali bwino. Ndikaleka kubwela naye, mulandu uzakhale payine. Ndikaleka kubwelela naye kwayimwe, mulandu umwewo uzakhale kwayine kufika lini nalini.
Pakuti ninga tilibe kutaya nthawe, tikhadatobwelela kawili kentse.”

Pamwepo apayi wawo Izraeli adati, “Peno ntenepo mungachite tenepo, nkuluyo mumutakulilembo michelo yabwino yamudziko m'masakha yanu, muyendesele munthuyo mpfupo, tubhalumu, natuwuchi, nagumu, namula, namanduwi yapisitachiyo namaalimondi.
Izraeli adawuza wana wake kuti atakule masheleni yakukagula nayo chakudya namasheleni yaadawona m'masakha yawo. Pakuti bzidachitikabzo panango kukhali kuphonya kwaanyakugulisa.
Takulani mung'ono wanuyo muyende pomwe kwamwamuna umweyo.
Mulungu wam'phamvu, achite kuti mwamunayo akakuchitileni chifundo, akakubvumileni kukabwelela na Bhenjemani na Simiyoni. Ndikatayikidwa nawana wangu, ndatayikidwa.”
Nakutenepo amunawo adatakula mpfupo zaakhadapasiwa namasheleni yakukagula nayo chakudya nayakukabweza. Adasumuka nkuyenda ku Ijipiti pabodzi namung'ono wawo Bhenjemani, adafika achiwonana na Jozefi.

Tsapano Jozefi paadaawona kuti akhana mung'ono wawo Bhenjemani, iye adati kwamulanda akhanyanganila munyumba mwake, “Yenda nawanthu awa kunyumba kwangu, ukaphe chifuwo uphike chakudya, pakuti lelo masikati achadya nayine kunyumba kwangu.”
Mwamunayo adachita bzaadawuziwa na Jozefi, adayenda nawo wentse kunyumba kwa Jozefi.

Amunawo paadayendesewa kunyumba kwa Jozefi adagopa kwene-kwene, iwo adati, “Kuno tabweleselewa masheleni yadayikhiwa mumasakha yathu pawulendo watidabwela pakuyamba. Watibwelesa kuno kuti atimange atichite alanda wake, achititolela madhonki yathu.”
Nakutenepo adazayenda kwawakuyanganila munyumba mwa Jozefi nkulewa-lewa naye ali pansuwo wanyumba.
Iwo adati, “Mbuya wathu, nkakuyamba lini kubwela kuzagula chakudya,
koma patidayima kuti tigone, tidatsudzula mitolo yathu nkuwona masheleni yamunthu yekha-yekha musakha lamuthu yekha-yekha, yentse yakukwana. Lelo tabwela nayo masheleni yamweyo.
Tabwela namasheleni yakugula nayo chakudya. Koma tilibe kudziwa kuti masheleni yatidawona mumasakha yathu yadayikhiwa nayani.”
