Mwamunayo adati, “Lekani kugopa, Mulungu wanu, Mulungu waapayi wanu, ndiye adakuyikhilani masheleni yamweyo mumasakha yanu. Ndine ndidayatambila masheleni yanu.” Pamwepo adabwelesa Simiyoni kwayiwo.
Mulanda umweyo adayenda nawo kunyumba kwa Jozefi. Adaapasa madzi achisamba minyendo yawo. Adapasa madhonki yawo chakudya.
Amunawo adakonzeka mpfupo zawo zakuzapasa Jozefi, pakuti adabva kuti achabwela masikati achizadya nawo pabodzi.
Jozefi paadapita munyumba, amunawo adamutambila achimpasa mpfupo zawo. Adakotamisa nkhope zawo pantsi patsogolo pake.
Jozefi adaabvunza utano, adati kwayiwo, “Ko apayi wanu wamudati akalamba ali tani? Ko achana moyo?”
Iwo adati, “Mulanda wanu, apayi wathu ali bwino, achana moyo.” Adamukotamila achimulemekeza.
Jozefi adanyangana nkuwona mung'ono wake Bhenjemani, mwana waamayi wake, iye adati, “Ko uyu ndiye mung'ono wanu wakumalizila wamudandiwuza? Mulungu ngaakubvele ntsisi mwanangu.”
Pamwepo Jozefi mwakukulumiza, adapsaga mbuto yakulilila, pakuti ntima wake ukhadasuwa mung'ono wake. Adapita muchipinda chankati achikalila m'mwemo.
Adasamba kumaso nkubula. Pamwepo iye adabzilimbisa, achiti, “Pakulani chakudya.”

Jozefi adampakulila payekha, iwombo pawokha, wanthu wachi Ijipiti waakhadya nawo, pawokhambo, thangwe lakuti wanthu wachi Ijipiti akhadya lini chakudya naa Hebheru, pakuti nichinthu chinyantsa kwaa Ijipiti.
Abale wake adakhala adanyanganana na Jozefi, kuteyeza kubadwa kwawo kuchoka kwawakuyamba kufika kwawakumalizila, paadawona kuti ndiko kukhala kwaakhadachita adakankhamuka.
Chakudya chikhapakuliwa chichichoka pathebulu ya Jozefi. Koma chakudya cha Bhenjemani chikhali chizinji kupita chawo kampetewa kashanu. Nakutenepo adamwa, nkuledzela nkukondwa pabodzi na Jozefi.
Jozefi adawuza mulanda wake akhanyanganila munyumba mwake kuti, “Dzadza masakha yaamuna awa nachakudya chaankwanisa kutakula, uyikhe masheleni yamunthu yekha-yekha musakha lake,
uyikhe khomeshi yangu yasiliva musakha lamung'ono wawo, masheleni yawagula nayo chakudya uyayikhe pomwe musakhamo.” Mwamunayo adachita bzaadawuziwa na Jozefi.
Mangwana yache machibese-bese amunawo adawuziwa kuti ayende bzawo ulendo wawo namadhonki yawo.

Koma paadandoti buleni muguta, adafamba kanthawe kang'ono-ng'ono, Jozefi adati kwamwamuna akhanyanganila munyumba mwake, “Teyela amuna wale, ukaaphata uwabvunze kuti, ‘Thangwe lanyi kubwezela chakuyipa pana chabwino? Thangwe lanyi mwaba khomeshi yasiliva yamambo?
Ko sindiyo yaamwela mbuya wangu inimudziwisa bzin'zachitika kutsogolo? Mwataza pakuchita tenepo.’ ”
Iwo adati kwayiye, “Ko thangwe lanyi mbuya wangu kulewa mafala yatenepo kwayise? Ise alanda wanu tingachite lini chinthu chatenepo.
Wonani, masheleni yatidawona mumasakha yathu pakuyamba sitidabwelela nayo, kuchoka kudziko la Kenani; ko tingabe tani siliva panango golidhe kuchoka munyumba yambuya wako?
Umweyo wamuti muwone ana komeshi imweyo ngaaphewe. Anango tichizakhala alanda wambuya wangu.”
Iye adati, “Nin'chita bzamwalewa, wandichawona ana komeshi ndiye achakhala mulanda wangu, koma anango wentse achakhala alibe mulandu.”
Nakutenepo munthu wentse adabulusa sakha lake, nkulitsudzula.
Iye adayamba kunyangana musakha yankulu mpaka kwang'ono wawo. Khomeshi idazawoneka ili musakha ya Bhenjemani.
Pamwepo iwo adang'amba bzakubvala bzawo. Munthu wentse adayikha ntolo wake padhonki lake achibwelela kuguta.
Judha naabale wake adayenda kunyumba kwa Jozefi, adakamuwona aliko, iwo adamukotamisa nkhope zawo pantsi patsogolo pake.
Jozefi adati, kwayiwo, “Ko n'chinyi chamwachita? Ko mukhadziwa lini kuti munthu ninga ine ninilotela chadidi?”

Judha adati, “Tingati tani kwayimwe mbuya wathu? Tingalewenyi, ko tingabzichenese tani? Mulungu wawona chakuyipa chaalanda wanu; wonani ndise akapolo wambuya wathu, ise tentse nayiye ana janja lawoneka nakhomeshi.”
Jozefi adati kwayiwo, “Ningachite lini tenepo. Munthu aninga wawoneka ana komeshi ndiye achakhala mulanda wangu. Imwe anango mungayende kwaapayi wanu, mufambe munkhalo.”
Judha adafika pafupi na Jozefi, adati kwayiye, “Ndaphata minyendo mbuya wangu, lekani mulanda wanu, alewe-lewe nayimwe. Lekani kundikalipila pakuti imwe mudandolingana na Farawo.
Mbuya wangu adabvunza alanda wake kuti, ‘Ko muna apayi panango m'bale?’

Ise tidati kwambuya wathu, ‘Yinde tina apayi, nikhalamba, namung'ono wathu waadabala akalamba, koma nkulu wake ndiye adafa. Koma iye ndiye adasala ali yekha munyumba mwaamayi wake. Apayi wake animufuna kwene-kwene.’
Pamwepo imwe mudati kwayise alanda wanu, ‘Mubwele naye ndizamuwone.’
Ise tidati kwambuya wathu, ‘Mwana umweyo angasiyane lini naapayi wake, pakuti akasiyana nawo, apayi wakewo angafe.’
Pamwepo imwe mudati kwaalanda wanu, ‘Mukaleka kubwela namung'ono wanuyo, mun'zawona lini nkhope yangu pomwe.’
Patidafika kwamulanda wanu payi wathu, tidaawuza mafala yambuya wathu.
Apayi wathu paadati, ‘Yendani pomwe mukatigulileko tuchakudya,’
ise tidati, ‘Tiniyendako lini pomwe. Mung'ono wathu tikayenda naye ise tiniyenda; pakuti tingakawonane nankhope yamunthu ule, kusala kwakuti mung'ono wathu tayenda naye.’
Pamwepo mulanda wanu, apayi wathu adati, ‘Imwe mun'dziwa kuti nkazi wangu adandibalila wana awili,
munango adandisiya, pamwepo ine ndidati, Chadidi wang'ambiwa-ng'ambiwa, ndilibe kuzamuwona pomwe.’
Mukanditolela uyu pomwe, chakuyipa chikakachitika payiye, muniyendesa nsolo wangu wayimvi kumbuto yawanthu wakufa.
Nakunetepo ine ndikabwelela kwamulanda wanu apayi wathu, mwanayu palibe, pakuti umoyo wawo udaphatana nawumoyo wamwanayu,
akakawona kuti mwanayu palibe, ankafa. Ise alanda wanu tinkayendesa nsolo wayimvi waapayi wanthu mulanda wanu kumbuto yawanthu wakufa nashungu.
Pakuti ndidalumbila kwaapayi wangu kuti, ‘Ndikaleka kubwelela naye kwayimwe, nin'zakhala namulandu kwaapayi wangu kwawumoyo wangu wentse.’
Ndaphata minyendo lekani mulanda wanu asale pambuto yamwanayu kuti akhale kapolo wambuya wangu, lekani iye ayende naakulu wake.
Ko ningabwelele tani kwaapayi ndilibe mwanayu? Nin'gopa kawona chakuyipa chinkachitika kwaapayi wangu.”
Pamwepo Jozefi adataza kubzilimbisa patsogolo pawanthu akhali pamwepo, iye adalila nkuti, “Chitani kuti wanthu wentse achoke pana ine.” Palibe waakhanaye paadawuza abale wake, kuti iye mbani.
Adalila mphele bzakuti a Ijipiti wentse adabva, nawanyumba ya Farawo adabvambo.
Jozefi adati kwaabale wake, “Ndine Jozefi! Ko apayi wangu achana moyo?” Koma abale wake alibe kumudayila, pakuti adanyala kuwona kuti achalipo!
Nakutenepo Jozefi adati kwaabale wake, “Fikani pafupi nayine, ndaphata minyendo.” Iwo paadafika pafupi, iye adati, “Ndine m'bale wanu Jozefi wamudagulisa ku Ijipiti.
Tsapano imwe lekani kushupika panango kubzikalipila nathangwe lakuti mudandigulisa kuno; pakuti Mulungu adandituma patsogolo panu kuchiza umoyo wawanthu.
Pakuti njala yakhala mudziko kwamagole mawili, pomwe kwasala magole mashanu yakusaya kulima panango kukolola.
Mulungu adandituma patsogolo panu kuti ndikuchizileni anango, azasaleko padziko lapantsi, kukuchengetelani wamoyo azinji.
Nakutenepo ndimwe lini mudandibwelesa kuno, ni Mulungu. Ndiye andidachita apayi wa Farawo nambuya wanyumba yake yentse nanduna yadziko lentse la Ijipiti
Kulumizani yendani kwaapayi wangu mukati kwayiwo, ‘Mwana wanu Jozefi wati, Mulungu adandichita mbuya wa Ijipiti yentse, bwelani kuno kuna ine, lekani kuchedwa.
Mun'zakhala mudziko la Gosheni, pafupi nayine, imwe nawana wanu, nawana wawana wanu, namabila yanu nang'ombe zanu nabzentse bzamunabzo.
Kumweko nin'zakuchitilani bzentse, pakuti kwasala magole mashanu yanjala, pakuti imwe nawanyumba yanu nabzentse bzamunabzo muleke kushupika.’
Tsapano maso yanu yakuwona, namaso yamung'ono wangu Bhenjemani yakuwona kuti nimulomo wangu ukulewa-lewa nayimwe.
Munfunika kawuza apayi wangu bzandemela yangu yentse mu Ijipiti, nabzentse bzamwawona. Kulumizani mubwelese apayi wangu kuno.”
Pamwepo adakumbatila mung'ono wake Bhenjemani, nkuyamba kulila, Bhenjemani nkuyambambo kulila.
Adamphsoda abale wake wentse. Paadamaliza kuchita tenepo abale wake adayamba kulewa-lewa naye.
Fala palidafika munyumba ya Farawo kuti abale wa Jozefi abwela, Farawo namanduna yake paadabzibva adakondwa kwene-kwene.
Farawo adati kwa Jozefi, “Wuza akulu wako kuti, ‘Chitani ibzi: kwizikani mitolo yanu pabzifuwo bzanu muyende kudziko la Kenani;
mukatole apayi wanu nawanyumba zanu, mubwele kuno, ine nin'zakupasani mbuto yabwino mu Ijipiti, muchizadya bzamafuta bzamudziko.’
Pomwe mukaawuze kuti, ‘Chitani ibzi, takulani ngolo kuchoka mudziko la Ijipiti, zakukatakulisa wana wanu naakazi wanu, mubwele naapayi wanu kuno.
Lekani kukumbuka bzombo bzanu, pakuti bzabwino bzili muno mu Ijipiti nibzanu.’ ”
Wana wa Izraeli adachita tenepo, Jozefi adaapasa ngolo kuteyeza fala lidachoka kwa Farawo, adaapasa mbuwa yapawulendo.
Adapasa abale wake wentse bzakubvala bzinyowani, koma Bhenjemani adampasa mazana matatu yamashekele yasiliva nabzakubvala bzishanu.
Kwaapayi wake adatumiza ibzi: madhonki khumi yakhadatakula bzinthu bzabwino bzaku Ijipiti. Madhonki makazi khumi yakhadatakula mphunga nazingwa, nambuwa yaapayi wake yapawulendo.
Jozefi adagonekana naabale wake, iwo paadayamba ulendo wawo Jozefi adati, “Lekani kashupana munjila pakuyenda.”
Nakutenepo iwo adachoka mu Ijipiti achiyenda ku Kenani kwaapayi wawo Jakobho.
Adaawuza kuti, “Jozefi achana moyo, ndiye akutonga mudziko lentse la Ijipiti” Pamwepo ntima wake udashupika, pakuti alibe kuwakhulupilila.
Koma paadawuziwa mafala yentse ya Jozefi, yaadalewa kwayiwo, napaadawona ngolo zidatumiziwa na Jozefi kuzaatakula, n'zimu waapayi wawo Jakobho udamusuluziwa.
Izraeli adati, “Bzakwana; Jozefi mwana wangu achana moyo! Niniyenda kamuwona ndinati ndafa.”
Nakutenepo Izraeli adaphata ulendo wake nabzentse bzaakhanabzo, adafika pa Bheeri-shebha adapeleka ntsembe kwa Mulungu waapayi wake Isaki.
Usiku umwewo Mulungu adalewa-lewa kwa Izraeli kutulo, adati, “Jakobho! Jakobho!”
Pamwepo Mulungu adati, “Ndine Mulungu, Mulungu waapayi wako, leka kugopa yenda ku Ijipiti, pakuti kumweko ninkakuchita nshowo ukulu.
Nin'zayenda nayiwe ku Ijipiti, ndichizakubweza pomwe kuno. Janja la Jozefi ndilo lin'zapunga maso yako.”
Pamwepo Jakobho adachoka ku Bheeri-shebha. Wana wa Izraeli adatakula apayi wawo, akazi nawana wawo mungolo zidatumiziwa na Farawo kuzaatakula.
Adatakulambo bzifuwo bzawo, nabzombo bzawo bzaadawona mudziko la Kenani achiyenda ku Ijipiti, Jakobho pabodzi nawam'badwe wake wentse,
wana wake, wana wawana wake wachimuna, wana wake wachikazi, nawana wachikazi wawana wake; m'badwe wake wentse adabwela nawo ku Ijipiti.
Aya ndiyo madzina yam'badwe wa Izraeli adayenda ku Ijipiti. Jakobho nawana wake, Rubheni, mwana wakuyamba wa Jakobho.
Wana wa Rubheni: Hanoki na Palu na Hezironi na Karumi.
Wana wa Simiyoni: Jemuyeli na Jamini na Ohadhi na Jakini na Zohari na Shaulo uyo adabaliwa nankazi wachi Kenani.
Wana wa Levi: Gerishoni na Kohati na Merari.
Wana wa Judha: Eri na Onani na Shela na Ferezi na Zera. Koma Eri na Onani adafela mudziko la Kenani. Wana wa Perezi akhali Hezironi na Hamuli.
Wana wa Isakari: Tola na Puva na Iyobhi na Shimironi.
Wana wa Zebhuluni: Seredhi na Eloni na Jahileyeli.
Awa ndiwo wana wa Liya waadabala na Jakobho paakhali mudziko la Padhani-aramu, namwana wake wachikazi Dhina. Wentse pabodzi wana wake wachimuna nawachikazi akhafika makumi matatu naatatu.
Wana wa Gadhi: Zifiyoni na Hagi na Shuni na Ezibhoni na Eri na Arodhi na Areli.
Wana wa Asheri: Imina na Ishiva na Ishivi na Bheriya na nana wawo Sera. Wana wa Bheriya: Hebheri na Malikiyeli.
Awa ndiwo wana wa Zilipa, uyo Labhani waadapasa mwana wake wachikazi Liya. Adabalila Jakobho wana khumi naatanthatu.
Wana wa Rakelo, nkazi wa Jakobho: Jozefi na Bhenjemani.
Jozefi paakhali mudziko la Ijipiti adabala wana awili Manase na Efulemu. Amayi wawo akhali Asenati, mwana wa Potifera nyantsembe wamuguta la Oni.
Wana wa Bhenjemani: Bhela na Bhekeri na Ashibheli na Gera na Namani na Ehi na Roshi na Mupimu na Hupimu na Aridhi.
Awa ndiwo wana wa Rakelo waadabalila Jakobho, wentse pabodzi khumi naanayi.
Wana wa Nafitali: Jahizeyeli na Guni na Jezeri na Shilemu.
Awa ndiwo wana wa Bhiliha, uyo Labhani waadapasa mwana wake wachikazi Rakelo, dabalila Jakobho wana anomwe.
Wanthu wentse wa Jakobho adayenda ku Ijipiti, wam'badwe wake kuleka kuphatanizila azikazi wawana wa Jakobho, wentse pabodzi akhali makumi matanthatu naatanthatu;
Wana wa Jozefi waadabalila mu Ijipiti akhali awili; wanthu wentse wanyumba ya Jakobho adabwela ku Ijipiti akhali makumi manomwe.
Adatsogoza Judha kwa Jozefi kuti akaawonese njila iniyenda ku Gosheni, pamwepo adafika mudziko la Gosheni.
Pamwepo Jozefi adakonzeka ngolo yake nkuyenda kagumana na Izraeli apayi wake mu Gosheni, adabzipeleka kwayiwo, nkuwakumbatila achilila kwakanthawe.
Izraeli adati kwa Jozefi, “Tsapano ningafe pakuti ndawona nkhope yako, ndadziwa kuti uchana moyo.”
Jozefi adati kwaabale wake nakwanyumba yentse yaapayi wake, “Ndaakuyenda kawuza Farawo ndichikati kwayiye, ‘Abale wangu nawanyumba yaapayi wangu awo akhali mudziko la Kenani abwela kwayine;
wanthu amwewo mbaanyakabusa, pakuti niwakufuwa ng'ombe, nakutenepo abwela namabila yawo, nang'ombe zawo nabzentse bzaakhanabzo.’
Farawo akakuchemelani achikubvunzani kuti, ‘Basa lanu nilanyi?’

Imwe munkati, ‘Ise alanda wanu ndise wakufuwa mabila, kuyambila pawubwana wathu mpaka lelo isepo naazipayi wathu,’ kuti mukakwanise kukhala mumbuto ya Gosheni; pakuti anyakabusa wentse an'nyantsila a Ijipiti.”
Nakutenepo Jozefi adakawuza Farawo kuti, “Apayi wangu naabale wangu namabila yawo nang'ombe zawo nabzinthu bzawo bzentse, tsapano atowa mudziko la Gosheni.”
Paabale wake, Jozefi adatola akulu wake ashanu nkuyenda nawo kwa Farawo.
Farawo adati kwaabale wa Jozefi, “Mun'dziwa basa lanyi?”
Iwo adati kwa Farawo, “Ise alanda wanu ndise anyakabusa, ninga bzaakhali azipayi wathu.”

Adati kwa Farawo, “Tabwela kuzakhala mudziko lino, ise alanda wanu tilibe mbuto zakudyesela mabila, pakuti njala yakula mudziko la Gosheni. Tsapano taphata minyendo yanu, lekani ise alanda wanu tikhale mumbuto ya Gosheni.”
Pamwepo Farawo adati kwa Jozefi, “Apayi wako naabale wako abwela kwayiwe.

Dziko la Ijipiti lili m'manja mwako, yikha apayi wako naabale wako mumbuto yawuniwona kuti niyabwino. Uwapase pakukhala mudziko la Gosheni, peno pakati pawo pana an'dziwa basa, uwapase basa lakunyanganila ng'ombe zangu.”
Nakutenepo Jozefi adayendesa Jakobho, apayi wake, kwamambo Farawo, achikaafikisa pamaso pa Farawo, Jakobho adadalisa Farawo.
Pamwepo Farawo adati kwa Jakobho, “Ko una magole mangasi?”

Jakobho adati kwa Farawo, “Magole yakukhala kwangu yanfika dzana namakumi matatu, nimang'ono-ng'ono, koma yadadzala nanthamu, ndizo ntsiku zangu, ziniyendelana lini namagole yawumoyo waazipayi wangu muntsiku zakukhala kwawo.”
Jakobho adadalisa Farawo, nkuchoka pamaso pa Farawo.
Nakutenepo Jozefi adakhazika apayi wake naabale wake, adaapasa nthaka mudziko la Ijipiti, mbuto yabwino kwene-kwene mudziko la Ramesesi, ninga kulewa kukhadachita Farawo.
Jozefi adapasa apayi wake naabale wake nawentse wanyumba yaapayi wake chakudya chizinji kwene-kwene kuteyeza kuwanda kwawanthu waakhafuwa.
Tsapano dziko lentse likhalibe chakudya, pakuti njala ikhadakula, bzakuti dziko la Ijipiti nadziko la Kenani lidalefuka nanjala.
Jozefi adagwezeka masheleni yentse yaadawona mu Ijipiti namu Kenani, kuchoka muchakudya chaakhagula. Jozefi akhayendesa kwa Farawo masheleni yaakhaphata.
Masheleni yawanthu wamu Ijipiti nawamu Kenani payadamala, wanthu wamu Ijipiti adayenda kwa Jozefi achikati, “Tipaseni chakudya! Thangwe lanyi tichifa mudanyangana? Pakuti masheleni yathu yamala.”
Jozefi adati, “Bwelesani ng'ombe zanu nin'zakupasani chakudya muchitsinthanisa nang'ombe, peno masheleni yanu yamala.”
Nakutenepo iwo adabwelesa ng'ombe kwa Jozefi, iye achiwapasa chakudya kutsinthanisa namahachi, mititi yamabila, madhonki, iye nkuwapasa chakudya kutsinthanisa nang'ombe zawo zentse mugole limwelo.

Gole limwelo palidamala, adayenda pomwe kwayiye mugole lachiwili achikati, “Mbuya wathu, tingakubisileni lini kuti masheleni yathu yamala, mititi yang'ombe niyambuya wathu; palibe chasala chamungawone mbuya wathu, koma mathupi yathu naminda yathu.

Thangwe lanyi tichifa imwe mudanyangana, ise naminda yathu? Tiguleni ise naminda yathu kuti tiwone chakudya, ise maminda yathu tin'zakhala akapolo wa Farawo, tipaseni mbewu tichile, kuti tileke kufa, pomwe kuti minda ileke kukhala mathele.”
Nakutenepo Jozefi adagula dziko lentse la Ijipiti, kukhala la Farawo. Wanthu wentse wa Ijipiti adagulisa mbuto zawo, pakuti njala ikhadakula kwene-kwene. Dziko lentse lidakhala la Farawo.
Wanthu wentse adaachita akapolo, kuchoka kumapeto kufika kumapeto ya Ijipiti.
Koma minda yaanyantsembe ndiyo yaalibe kugula, pakuti anyantsembe akhapasiwa chigawo chawo na Farawo, akhalalama nachigawo chaakhapasiwa na Farawo; nakutenepo alibe kugulisa minda yawo.
Jozefi adati kwawanthu, “Wonani, ntsiku yalelo ndakugulani imwe naminda yanu, kukhala bza Farawo. Tsapano ndaakukupasani mbewu kuti mukabzale.”
Pakukolola mun'zapeleka chibodzi pabzishanu kwa Farawo, bzinayi pabzishanu bzin'zawa bzanu kukhala mbewu zam'minda nachakudya chanu imwepo nawazinyumba zanu nachakudya chawana wnau.
Iwo adati, “Mwachiza umoyo wathu; ngabzikomele mbuya wangu, tinkhala akapolo wa Farawo.”
Pamwepo Jozefi adayikha lango mudziko la Ijipiti, nalelo likaliko lakuti, Farawo anfunika kupasiwa chibodzi pabzishanu; mbuto yaanyatsembe yokha ndiyo ilibe kukhala ya Farawo.
Nakutenepo Izraeli adakhala mudziko la Ijipiti, mumbuto ya Gosheni, ali kumweko adawona chuma chizinji, adabalana nkuwanda kwene-kwene.
Jakobho adakhala mudziko la Ijipiti kwamagole khumi nanomwe; Nakutenepo ntsiku za Jakobho, magole yawumoyo wake yakhali magole dzana namakumi manayi namanomwe.

Izraeli paakhali pafupi kufa, adachemela mwana wake Jozefi nkuti, “Peno wandikomela ntima, yikha janja lako pantsi panchafu yangu, ulumbile kuti un'zawa wachifundo nawakukhulupilika kwayine. Leka kuzandiyikha mu Ijipiti,
koma leka ndikagone naazipayi wangu; muzanditakule kuchoka mu Ijipiti mukandiyikhe kumanda yawo.” Iye adadayila, “Nin'zachita bzamwalewa.”
Jakobho adati, “Lumbila kwayine.” Jozefi adalumbila. Pamwepo Izraeli adakotamisa nsolo wake ali pakugonela wake.
Pambuyo payibzi, Jozefi adazawuziwa kuti, “Wona, apayi wako aduwala.” Pamwepo iye adatola wana wake awili Manase na Efulemu.
Jakobho adawuziwa kuti, “Mwana wako Jozefi wabwela.” Pamwepo Izraeli adabzilimbisa nkukhala pachalimba pake.
Jakobho adati kwa Jozefi, “Mulungu Nyamphamvu adabziwonesa kwayine pa Luzi mudziko la Kenani achindidalisa,
adati kwayine, ‘Wona, nin'zachita kuti mubalane, muchizawanda, nin'zakuchita chipani chawanthu, nin'zapeleka dziko lino kum'badwe wako kuti ikhale nthaka yawo kufika lini nalini.’ ”
Tsapano wana wako awili wawudabalila mudziko la Ijipiti ine ndinati ndabwela kuno ku Ijipiti niwangu, Efulemu na Manase niwangu ninga Rubheni na Simiyoni.
Koma wana wawun'zabala pambuyo paawa niwako; an'zachemelewa nadzina laabale wawo munthaka yawo.

Pakuti pandikhachoka ku Phadhani, Rakelo adafela munjila mudziko la Kenani patikhali pafupi kufika mu Efurata; ndidamuyikha kumweko kunjila yakuyenda ku Efurata iyo in'chemelewa pomwe kuti Bhetelehemu.
Izraeli paadawona wana wa Jozefi, adati, “Ko awa mbani?”
Jozefi adati kwaapayi wake, “Awa niwana wangu wandidapasiwa na Mulungu kuno.”
Izraeli adati, “Bwela nawo kwayine, ndaphata minyendo kuti ndiwadalise.”
Tsapano maso ya Izraeli yakhawonesesa lini pakuti akhadakalamba. Nakutenepo Jozefi adaafikisa pafupi naapayi wake. Adaamphsomphsoda achiwakumbatila.
Izraeli adati kwa Jozefi, “Ndikhakumbuka lini kuti ningawone nkhope yako pomwe; wona, Mulungu wachita kuti ndiwonembo wana wako.”
Pamwepo Jozefi adaachosa paminyendo yake, iye nkukotamisa nkhope yake pantsi.
Jozefi adatola wentse awili, Efulemu najanja ladidi kumbali yajanja lanzele la Izraeli, Manase najanja lanzele kumbali yajanja ladidi la Izraeli. Adaayendesa pafupi nayiye.
Koma Izraeli adapesanisa manja yake, janja lake ladidi adaliyikha pansolo wa Efuremu, uyo akhali mung'ono, janja lanzele adaliyikha pansolo wa Manase, pakuti Manase akhali wakuyamba.
“Mulungu adafamba naapayi wangu Abhurahamu na Isaki,
Mulungu adatsogolela umoyo wangu kufika lelo!
Ngilozi idandilombola pabzakuyipa bzentse, dalisani wana!
Mwayiwo dzina langu ngalikhale, nadzina laazipayi wangu, Abhurahamu na Isaki;
Jozefi paadawona kuti apayi wake ayikha janja ladidi pansolo wa Efulemu, alibe kukondwa nabzo. Adaphata janja laapayi wake kuti alichose pansolo wa Efulemu kuliyikha pansolo wa Manase.
Jozefi adati kwaapayi wake, “Ntenepa lini apayi, pakuti uyu ndiye wakuyamba, ikhani janja lanu ladidi pansolo wake.”
Koma apayi wake adalamba, iwo adati, “Nin'dziwa mwanangu, nin'dziwa; umweyu pomwe an'zakhala nkulu, koma mung'ono wake an'zawa nkulu kuposa iye. M'badwe wake un'zawa nshowo uzinji kwene-kwene.”
Nakutenepo Izraeli adaadalisa ntsiku imweyo, achiti,
Nakutenepo adayikha Efulemu patsogolo pa Manase.
Pamwepo Izraeli adati kwa Jozefi, “Wona, ine ndawa pafupi kufa, koma Mulungu an'zakhala nayiwe, an'zakubwezani pomwe kudziko laazipayi wanu.
Pomwe ndapeleka Shekemu kwayiwe pana kuti ndipase abale wako, iyo yandidatola m'manja mwa Amori nabhemba langu nawutati wangu.”
Jakobho adachemela wana wake wachimuna nkuti kwayiwo, “Kochezanani mwentse ndikuwuzeni bzin'zakuchitikilani muntsiku zim'bwela.”
Wakusaya kukhazikika ninga madzi, un'zawa lini nkulu,
Moyo wangu leka kupita mukupangana kwawo,
kulemekezewa kwangu ngakuleke kuphataniziwa nachipani chawo.
janja lako lin'zawa pakhosi paazondi wako;
ninga mphondolo ikazi; mbani angayese angamutokonye?
Mphsimbo yawumambo in'zachoka lini pana Judha,
panango mphsimbo yakutonga kuchoka pakati paminyendo yake,
Adawona kuti mbuto yakupumulila ikhali yabwino,
Nakutenepo iye adakotamisa phewa kuti atakule,
iye adazakhala kapolo pakuphata basa lachibhalo.
na Mulungu waapayi wako uyo an'zakuthandiza,
Iyi ndiyo mishowo khumi namiwili yaa Izraeli, ibzi ndibzo bzidalewedwa naapayi wawo kwayiwo paakhaadalisa, kudalisa munthu yekha-yekha namadaliso yaniyendelana nayiye.
Pamwepo Jakobho adawuza wana wake kuti, “Nthawe yakufa kwangu yafika. Imwe mukandiyikhe kumanda kudayikhiwa makholo yangu, mumphako ili m'munda wa Efuloni mu Hiti,
mumphako ili m'munda pa Makipela, chakumabveladzuwa kwa Mamure mudziko la Kenani, idaguliwa na Abhurahamu pabodzi namunda wa Efuroni mu Hiti kukhala manda.
Kumweko ndiko kudayikhiwa Abhurahamu nankazi wake Sara; pomwe kumweko ndiko kudayikhiwa Isaki nankazi wake Rabheka; pomwe kumweko ndiko kwandidayikha Liya,
munda namphako bzili mwemo bzidaguliwa kwaa Hiti.”
Jakobho paadamaliza kuwuza wana wake adagona pakuchalimba pake nkufa achikayikhiwa kwawanthu wakwake.
Pamwepo Jozefi adagwa padzulu paapayi wake, adalila achiwapsopsoda.
Jozefi adawuza anyabezi wakuwumisa bzitanda, kuti awumise chitanda chaapayi wake. Nakutenepo anyakuwumisa adawumisa Izraeli.
Adatola ntsiku makumi manayi kuchiwumisa, pakuti ndizo ntsiku zikhafunika kuwumisa munthu. Wanthu wa Ijipiti adalila Jakobho kwantsiku makumi manomwe.
Ntsiku zakumulila pazidamala, Jozefi adalewa-lewa nawanyumba ya Farawo achiti, “Tsapano peno mwandikomela ntima, ndaphata minyendo, kaleweni kwa Farawo muchiti,

apayi wangu adandilumbilisa achiti, ‘Ndaa pafupi kufa, ndina manda yangu ku Kenani yandidabzichelela ndekha, mukandiyikhe m'mwemo.’ Nakutenepo lekani ndiyende, ndaphata minyendo, ndikayikhe apayi wangu, ndichizabwelela.”
Farawo adati, “Yenda ukayikhe apayi wako kuteyeza kulumbila kwawudachita.”
Nakutenepo Jozefi adayenda kayikha apayi wake. Adayenda naalanda wentse wa Farawo naakulu-akulu wentse wanyumba yake, naakulu-akulu wentse wadziko la Ijipiti,
nawentse wanyumba ya Jozefi, naabale wake, nawanyumba yaapayi wake; koma wana wawo, namabila yawo, nang'ombe zawo ndibzo bzidasala mu Gosheni.
Adayenda nangolo nawakuzifambisa, chikhali chipani chikulu kwene-kwene.
Paadafika pambuto yakupulila pa Atadhi, kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumabveladzuwa, adalila mphele ikulu kwene-kwene kwantsiku zinomwe, kulila apayi wake.

Wanthu wamu Kenani paadawona kulila kwaakhachita, paakhali pambuto yakupulila pa Atadhi iwo adati, “Iyi ninkhawa ikulu kwaa Ijipiti.” Nakutenepo mbuto imweyo adazayipasa dzina lakuti, “Abheli-mizirayimu,” mbuto imweyo ili kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani.

pakuti wana wake adatakula chitanda chake nkuyenda nacho kudziko la Kenani, achikachiyikha mumphako m'munda wa Makipela chakumabveladzuwa kwa Mamure, yaadagula Abhurahamu pabodzi namunda, kwa Efuroni mu Hiti kukhala mbuto yakuyikha wanthu.
Paadamaliza kuyikha chitanda chaapayi wake, Jozefi adabwelela ku Ijipiti naabale wake, nawentse waakhadayenda nawo kayikha apayi wake.
Abale wa Jozefi paadawona kuti apayi wawo afa, adati, “Panango Jozefi atizonde, achibwezambo kwayise bzentse bzakuyipa bzatidachita kwayiye?”
Nakutenepo iwo adatuma fala kwa Jozefi lakuti, “Apayi wanu anati afa adatiwuza kuti,

‘Uzani Jozefi kuti lekelela bzakuyipa bzaabale wako nakutaza kwawo, ndaphata minyendo, pakuti adachita chakuyipa kwayiwe.’ Tsapano, taphata minyendo yanu, lekelelani bzakuyipa bzaalanda wa Mulungu waapayi wanu.” Jozefi adalila paadamuwuza mafala yamweyo.
Pamwepo akulu wake adafika patsogolo pake achimukotamila, nkuti, “Wonani, ndise alanda wanu.”
Koma Jozefi adati kwayiwo, “Lekani kugopa, ko ine ndatola mbuto ya Mulungu?
Imwe mudandichitila chakuyipa, koma Mulungu adachita chabwino, kuti wanthu azinji akhale wamoyo, ninga bzaali lelo.
Nakutenepo imwe lekani kugopa, ine ninkupasani chakudya imwe nawana wanu.” Nakutenepo iye adaalimbisa achiwanyamaliza.
Jozefi adakhala mu Ijipiti, iye nawanyumba yaapayi wake; Jozefi adakhala kwamagole dzana nakhumi.
Jozefi adawona wana wa Efulemu wam'badwe wachitatu, nawana wa Makiri mwana Manase, awo waakhatola ninga wana wake.
Jozefi adati kwaabale wake, “Ine ndawa pafupi kufa. Koma Mulungu an'zakuzungilani, achizakuchosani mudziko lino achikuyendesani kudziko laadalumbila kupasa Abhurahamu na Isaki na Jakobho.”
Pamwepo Jozefi adalumbilisa abale wake wana wa Izraeli iye adati, “Mulungu an'zakuzungilani imwe mun'zatakula mabondo yangu kuchoka mudziko lino.”
Nakutenepo Jozefi adafa ali namagole dzana nakhumi; chitanda chake chidawumisiwa, nkuyikhiwa m'bawulu mu Ijipiti.
Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta paadafa, Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni, uyo akhatumikila Mozisi,
“Mulanda wangu Mozisi wafa, tsapano iwe sumuka pabodzi nawanthu wawunawo uyende kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumadokelo, kudziko landili kupasa wana wa Izraeli.
Mbuto yentse yamun'zaponda nanzayo zanu ndakupasani kuteyeza kutsimikiza kwandidachita kwamulanda wangu Mozisi.
Kuyambila kuchipululu kufika ku Lebhanoni, mpaka kukamadzi kakulu ka Ufuratesi, nadziko lentse laa Hiti kufika kunyanja ikulu, mpaka kun'nyulila dzuwa, lin'zakhala dziko lanu.
Palibe munthu an'zakwanisa kuyimisana nayiwe pantsiku zentse zawumoyo wako. Ninga bzandidachita kwa Mozisi nin'zachitambo kwayiwe, nin'zakulekelela lini panango kukusiya wekha.
Khala wamphamvu, limba ntima, pakuti ndiwe un'zachitisa kuti a Izraeli atole dziko landidalumbila kupasa azipayi wawo.
Khala wamphamvu, limba ntima, uchenjelele kuteyeza mitemo yentse yamudawuziwa na Mozisi mulanda wangu, lekani kupatukila kujanja ladidi panango lanzele, kuti musumukile kwentse kwamuniyenda.

Bhukhu ili lamitemo ngalileke kuchoka pamulomo wako, ulikumbukile ntsiku zentse usiku namasikati, kuti uchenjelele kuchita bzentse bzidanembewa m'mwemo, ukatenepo un'zasumukila munjila zako zentse, pamwepo uninga watokwanisa.
Ko sindakuwuza? Khala wamphamvu, limba ntima. Leka kugopsewa panango kushupika, pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wako ana iwe kwentse kwawuniyenda.”
Amwepo Joshuwa adawuza manduna yawanthu wa Izraeli kuti,

“Yendani nkati mwamisasa mukawuze wanthu kuti, ‘Konzekelani mbuwa zanu, pantsiku yachitatu kuyambila lelo munkayambuka Jorodhani, muchiyenda katola dziko lanthaka yanu lamudapasiwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu.’ ”
Pamwepo Joshuwa adawuza wanthu wanshowo wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati wanshowo wa Manase kuti,
“Kumbukani mafala yamudawuziwa na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta yakuti, ‘Chawuta Mulungu wanu an'zakupasani pakukhala, an'zakupasani dziko ili.’

Azikazi wanu nawana wanu nabzifuwo bzanu bzin'zasala kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumabveladzuwa kudziko lamudapasiwa na Mozisi. Koma wamphamvu wentse ali pakati panu, an'zatsogola adapklhata bzida adakonzekela nkhondo achitsogolela abale wanu, kuti aathandize,

kufikila Chawuta wapasa abale wanu pakukhala bzaadachita kwayimwe. Iwo achikakhala mudziko laadapasiwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu. Pamwepo imwe mun'zabwelela kudziko lanu, kudziko lachakumabveladzuwa kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani lamudapasiwa na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta.”
Iwo adadayila kwa Joshuwa, “Bzentse bzamuntiwuza tin'chita, kwentse kwamuntituma tiniyenda.
Ise tinkutetekelani bzatidachita kwa Mozisi, nakutenepo ise tinkutetekelani. Chawuta Mulungu wanu ngaakhale nayimwe bzaadachita kwa Mozisi!
Wentse ampandukila mitemo yanu, nakuleka kutetekela mafala yamulomo wanu, nabzentse bzamuniwawuza ngaaphewe. Imwe limbani ntima, khalani wamphamvu.”

Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni, adatuma amuna awili kabisila, adachoka ku Shitimu achiyenda kanyangana dziko la Jeriko, iye adati, “Yendani mukanyangane dziko, maka-maka guta la Jeriko.” Nakutenepo iwo adayenda, nkufika panyumba pahule akhachemelewa nadzina lakuti Rahabhi, achigona pamwepo.
Mambo wa Jeriko adawuziwa kuti, “Pana amuna waku Izraeli abwela usiku kuzanyangana dziko.”
Pamwepo mambo waku Jeriko adatuma fala kwa Rahabhi, achiti, “Bulisa amuna abwela kwayiwe, apita munyumba mwako, pakuti abwela kuzanyangana dziko lino.”
Koma nkaziyo akhadatobisa kale amunawo, iye adati, “Chadidi, amunawo abwela kwayine, koma ndilibe kudziwa kuti achoka kuponi.
Pakudayamba kuchita n'dima, chakumawulo, pakhafungiwa nsuwo, amunawo adabula, nin'dziwa lini kuti ayenda kuponi, mukakulumiza kuwateyela muniwaphata.”
Koma iye akhadaakwizika mudzulu muntsodzi mwanyumba, akhadaabisa pantsi pamiti yamifulakisi ikhadagwezeka padzulu panyumbayo.
Nakutenepo wanthu adaateyela nanjila ikhayenda ku Jorodhani, achikafika pakhayambukila wanthu. Wanthu paadabula muguta achiwateyela, nsuwo waguta la Jeriko udafungiwa.
Akadidiya anati agona, Rahabhi adakwila kuntsodzi mudzulu mwanyumbayo,
adati kwayiwo, “Nin'dziwa kuti Chawuta wakupasani kale dziko lino, pomwe kugopsa kwanu kwatigwela. Wanthu wentse aphatiwa kale namantha, akutotetemela.
Pakuti tidabva kuwumisa kwaadachita Chawuta Nyanja Ifuyila
Patidabzibva, mitima yathu idaphatiwa namantha, ntima wamunthu wentse udamala mphamvu, nathangwe layimwe, pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wanu ni Mulungu wakudzulu napantsi.

Nakutenepo, lumbilani kwayine nadzina la Chawuta, pakuti ine ndakuchitilani chifundo, nayimwembo mun'zachitilambo chifundo wabanja laapayi wangu, ndipaseni chilatizo chakuwonesa kukhulupilika kwanu kuti,
mun'zachiza apayi naamayi wangu wamoyo, naazimano wangu naazinana, namabanja yawo yentse, mutipulumuse kuyimpfa.”
Amunawo adati kwayiye, “Bzili bwino kuti ise tiphewe pana kuti iwe ufe! Iwe ukaleka kulewa bzatafambila, ise tin'zawonesa chifundo nachikhulupililo kwayiwe, Chawuta akatipasa dziko lino.”
Pamwepo Rahabhi adaabulusa napazhanela nathambo, pakuti nyumba yake ikhali nkati mwampanda waguta.
Iye adati kwayiwo, “Yendani kumapili, kuchitila kuti wakukuteyelani aleke kukugumanani. Mukabisale kwantsiku zitatu, kufikila wakukuteyelaniwo abwelela, muchizayenda ulendo wanu.”
Amunawo adati kwayiye, “Tin'zaphatiwa lini namulandu nakutilumbilisa kwawachita,
koma patin'zabwela mudziko lino, uzamangilile kathambo kafuyila pazhanela pawatibulusa napo, uzakocheze apayi naamayi wako naabale wako nawentse wabanja laapayi wako munyumba mwako.
Munthu am'bula kunja kwansuwo wanyumba yako achiyenda munjila akafa, gazi lake lin'zakhala pansolo payiye, ise tin'zaphatiwa lini namulandu.
Koma ukawuza wanthu bzatafambila, ise tin'zaphatiwa lini namulandu pakutilumbilisa kwawachita.”
Iye adati, “Ngabzichitike ninga kulewa kwamwachita.” Pamwepo iye adaaleka achiyenda, iye adamangilila kathambo kafuyila pazhanela.
Akadidiya wale, adayenda kabisala m'mapili kwaadakakhala ntsiku zitatu, kufikila wakuwateyela abwelela. Amuna akhaateyela adaapsaga munjila zentse koma alibe kuwawona.
Pamwepo amuna awiliwo adabuluka m'phili, achiyambuka Jorodhani achikafika kwa Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni. Adamuwuza bzentse bzaadawona.
Iwo adati kwa Joshuwa, “Chadidi n'chakuti, Chawuta wayikha kale dziko lentse m'manja mwathu. Wanthu wentse adaphatiwa kale namantha aakutogopa thangwe layise.”
Mangwana yache machibese-bese Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse, adachoka ku Shitimu, achiyenda ku Jorodhani, adakhalako pamwepo anati ayambuka.
Pakumala kwantsiku zitatu manduna yadapita pakati pamatenti,
yachiwuza wanthu kuti, “Mukawona Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta Mulungu wanu, latakuliwa naanyantsembe wa Mulungu wachi Levi, pamwepo imwe muchoke pambuto zanu muliteyele,

kuti imwe mudziwe njila yamun'zafamba nayo, pakuti imwe munati mwafamba nanjila imweyi. Koma pazasale mbuto pakati pa Bhokisi la Chibvano nayimwe, koma pazakhale mbuto yamphimo yamakhalo masawuzande mawili pakati payimwe nalo, lekani kufika pafupi nalo.”
Joshuwa adati kwawanthu, “Bzicheneseni, pakuti mangwana Chawuta an'zachita bzidabwiso pakati panu.”
Joshuwa adati kwaanyantsembe wa Mulungu, “Takulani Bhokisi la Chibvano, muyende patsogolo pawanthu. Iwo adatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano achiyenda patsogolo pawanthu.”
Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Lelo niniyamba kukukuza pamaso paa Izraeli, adziwe kuti, ndina iwe bzandidachita kwa Mozisi.”
Wuza anyantsembe wa Mulungu antakula Bhokisi la Chibvano kuti akafika mphepete mwa Jorodhani ayime.
Joshuwa adati kwawana wa Izraeli, “Bwelani pafupi mubve mafala yakulewedwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu.”
Joshuwa adati, “Dziwani kuti, Mulungu wamoyo ali pakati panu, antaza lini kukuthamangisilani a Kenani naa Hiti naa Hivi naa Perezi naa Girigashi naa Amori naa Jebhusi.
Wonani, Bhokisi la Chibvano la Mfumu wapantsi pentse, liniyamba kuyenda patsogolo panu, pamunkayambuka Jorodhani.
Nakutenepo imwe sankhulani amuna khumi naawili kunshowo waa Izraeli, panshowo wokha-wokha sankhulani mwamuna m'bodzi.

Anyantsembe wa Mulungu antakula Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta, Mfumu wapantsi pentse, nzayo zawo pazinkaponda m'madzi mu Jorodhani, madzi yakhayelela kuchoka chakudzulu yankayima, yachigwezekana kuchita mudwi ubodzi.”
Nakutenepo wanthu adafuluka pamatenti yawo, achiyenda kayambuka Jorodhani, achitsogolelewa naanyantsembe wa Mulungu akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano.

Anyantsembe wa Mulungu akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano paadafika pa Jorodhani, paadachuza minyendo yawo mphepete mwamadzi, madzi yamu Jorodhani yadayima, (madzi yamu Jorodhani yakhafashukila nthawe yentse yakukolola),

madzi yakhachoka nachakudzulu yadagwezekana kuchita mudwi, kutali paguta la Adhamu lili pambali pa Zaretani. Madzi yakhayelela yachiyenda kunyanja ya Arabha, nyanja yamunyu, yadagwatikilatu. Wanthu adayambuka napakhadanyanganana na Jeriko.
Anyantsembe wa Mulungu, akhatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta adayima pakuwuma pakati pa Jorodhani, kufikila nshowo wentse wa Izraeli wamala kuyambuka.
Wanthu wentse paadamala kuyambuka Jorodhani, Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa,
“Sankhula amuna khumi naawili muwanthu, panshowo wokha-wokha pachoke munthu m'bodzi,
uwawuze kuti, ‘Alokote minyala khumi namiwili pakati pa Jorodhani, pambuto padayima minyendo yaanyantsembe wa Mulungu, muyitakule muyambuke nayo mukayiyikhe pambuto pamunkagona usiku walelo.’”
Pamwepo Joshuwa adachemela amuna khumi naawili waadasankhula kuchoka kunshowo wawana wa Izraeli, panshowo wokha-wokha pakhachoka munthu m'bodzi.

Joshuwa adati kwayiwo, “Yendani pakati pa Jorodhani kutsogolo kwa Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta Mulungu wanu. Munango namunango wanu atakule mwala ubodzi awusumuse awuyikhe paphewa lake, kuteyeza kuwanda kwanshowo wawana Izraeli.”
Minyala imweyo izakhale chilatizo pakati panu. Wana wanu akazakubvunzani kuti, “Minyala imweyi inilewanyi?”
Imwe mun'zaawuza kuti, “Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta, palidayambuka Jorodhani madzi yadayima. Nakutenepo minyala imweyi niyakukumbusa wana wa Izraeli bzidachitika kufika lini nalini.”

Wanthu wa Izraeli adachita bzaadawuziwa na Joshuwa. Adakatakula minyala khumi namiwili kuchoka pakati pa Jorodhani, kuteyeza kuwanda kwanshowo wawana wa Izraeli, kuteyeza bzikhadawuziwa Joshuwa na Chawuta. Adatakula minyalayo achikayiyikha paadagona, adayigwezeka pamwepo.
Joshuwa adagwezekambo pomwe minyala khumi namiwili pantsi pakati pa Jorodhani pakhadayima minyendo yaanyantsembe wa Mulungu akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano. Minyala imweyo ilipo pamwepo mpaka lelo.
Anyantsembe wa Mulungu akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano adayima pakati pa Jorodhani, mpaka Joshuwa wamaliza kuchita bzentse bzaadawuziwa na Chawuta, kuteyeza bzentse bzikhadawuziwa Joshuwa na Mozisi.
Wanthu wentse paadamala kuyambuka, anyantsembe wa Mulungu akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta, adayambukambo wanthu wentse achiwona.
Wana wa Rubheni nawana wa Gadhi nakati-nakati yawana wanshowo wa Manase adayambuka adakonzekela nkhondo, ali patsogolo pawanthu wa Izraeli, kuteyeza bzaakhadawuziwa na Mozisi.
Wanthu masawuzande makumi manayi (40,000) akhadakonzeka kumenya nkhondo adayenda patsogolo pa Chawuta, adayambukila kumadambo ya Jeriko.
Ntsiku imweyo Chawuta adasumusa Joshuwa pamaso paa Izraeli wentse, iwo adamugopa ninga kugopa kwaadachita Mozisi, munthawe zentse zawumoyo wake.
“Wuza anyantsembe wa Mulungu adatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano abule mu Jorodhani.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adawuza anyantsembe kuti, “Chokani mu Jorodhani.”

Anyantsembe wa Mulungu akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta paadandoti chokeni pakati pa Jorodhani, bzithatha bzanzayo zawo pabzidandoti pondeni pakuwuma, madzi yamu Jorodhani yadabwelela pambuto payene, yachidzala mphepete mwentse bzayakhali pakuyamba.
Wanthu adachoka mu Jorodhani pantsiku yakhumi mumwezi wakuyamba, adakazika matenti yawo pa Giligali, kumalile yachakumabveladzuwa kwa Jeriko.
Minyala ile khumi namiwili yaadatakula kuchoka Jorodhani, Joshuwa adachita kuti igwezekewe pa Giligali.
Iye adati kwaa Izraeli, “Mutsogolo wana wanu akazabvunza azipayi wawo kuti, ‘Minyala iyi inilewanyi?’
Imwe mun'zawuza wana kuti, ‘Wanthu wa Izraeli adayambuka kamadzi ka Jorodhani kakuwuma.’
Pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wanu adawumisa madzi mu Jorodhani patsogolo panu kufikila mwayambuka, ninga bzaadakuchitilani Chawuta Mulungu wanu pa Nyanja Ifuyila, yaadatiwumisila kufikila tayambuka.
Kuchitila kuti, wanthu wentse wapadziko lapantsi azadziwe kuti Chawuta niwamphamvu, kuti mugope Chawuta Mulungu wanu kufika lini nalini.”

Mazimambo yentse yaa Amori, yakung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumadokelo, namazimambo yentse yaa Kenani akhali yamphepete mwanyanja adabva kuti Chawuta adawumisila madzi wana wa Izraeli pa Jorodhani kufikila ayambuka, mitima yawo idachita mantha, akhalibe ne moyo nathangwe labzidachitiliwa a Izraeli.
Panthawe imweyo Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Konza bzisu bzaminyala ugwate ntsonga zachimuna wanthu wa Izraeli wam'badwe wachiwili.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adakonza bzisu bzaminyala achigwata makanda yachimuna wana wa Izraeli paakhali paphili la Gibheyati-haraloti.
Joshuwa adaagwata khanda lachimuna nathangwe lakuti, amuna wentse akhadziwa kumenya nkhondo adachoka ku Ijipiti, adafela munjila paakhazungayila muchipululu.
Ne, wanthu wentse adabula mu Ijipiti adagwatiwa khanda lachimuna, koma wanthu wentse adabaliliwa munjila muchipululu paadachoka ku Ijipiti ndiwo akhalibe kugwatiwa khanda lachimuna.

Wanthu wa Izraeli adafamba muchipululu kwamagole makumi manayi, kufikila amuna wentse akhamenya nkhondo adachoka mu Ijipiti amala kufa, thangwe lakuti alibe kutetekela Chawuta. Chawuta adalumbila kuti iwo aniwona lini dziko laadalumbila kuzapasa makholo yawo, dziko liniyelela uchi nankaka.
Nakutenepo wana wawo ndiwo waadayikha pambuto yawo, awo adazagwatiwa khanda yachimuna na Joshuwa, pakuti akhanati agwatiwa khanda paakhali pawulendo.
Kugwatiwa khanda lachimuna kwawanthu wentse pakudamala, iwo adakhala pambuto zawo m'misasa kufikila bzilonda bzawo bzapola.
Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Lelo ndakungulusa ndichichosa kunyazisiwa kwanu kwakukhala alanda mu Ijipiti.” Mbuto imweyi adayipasa dzina lakuti Giligali
Wana wa Izraeli paakhadazika matenti pa Giligali mudambo pafupi na Jeriko, adasekelela phasika chakumawulo pantsiku yakhumi nanayi yamwezi wakuyamba.
Mangwana yache padamala phasika, ntsiku imweyo adadya chakudya chamudziko limwelo, adadya mikate ikhalibe chakufutisa namapila yakukazinga.
Mangwana yache mana idaleka kuwoneka, paadadya chakudya chamudziko m'mwemo, wanthu wa Izraeli alibe kuzadya pomwe mana, koma iwo adadya michelo yamudziko la Kenani mugole limwelo.

Joshuwa paakhali pafupi na Jeriko, adasumusa maso yake nkuwona mwamuna adayima patsogolo pake, adaphata bhemba m'manja lakupsolomola kale. Joshuwa adayenda kwayiye nkuti, “Ndiwe wathu panango waazondi wathu?”
Iye adati, “Nee, ndabwela ninga nkulu wankhondo ya Chawuta.” Pamwepo Joshuwa adagona fufumimba pantsi achipemphela, iye adati, “Mbuya wangu, munfuna kuti mulanda wanu achite tani?”
Nkulu wankhondo ya Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Bvula shango zako pakuti mbuto yawudayima naminyendo yako iniyela.” Pamwepo Joshuwa adachita bzaadawuziwa.
Misuwo yamipanda ya Jeriko ikhakhala idafungiwa, nathangwe lakugopa wana wa Izraeli, palibe akhabvumiziwa kubula panja panango kupita nkati.
Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Nyangana, ndayikha guta la Jeriko m'manja mwako, mazimambo yalene yentse naanyankhondo wamphamvu.
Iwe nawankhondo wako muzungunuke guta kabodzi pantsiku yokha-yokha. Muchite tenepo kwantsiku zitanthatu.
Anyantsembe wa Mulungu anomwe atakule wunda zanyanga zamabila patsogolo pa Bhokisi la Chibvano. Pantsiku yachinomwe iwe nawankhondo wako muzungunuke guta kanomwe kentse, anyantsembe alize wunda zawo.
Tsapano anyantsembe wa Mulungu paan'zapitiliza kuliza wunda zawo, wanthu wentse azakuwise, pamwepo mpanda waguta un'zagwelatu pantsi, munthu wentse achipita napaadanyanganana napo.”

Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni, adachemela anyantsembe wa Mulungu, adati kwayiwo, “Takulani Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta, anyantsembe wa Mulungu anomwe atakule wunda zinomwe zaminyanga yamabila ayende patsogolo palene.”
Joshuwa adati kuwanthu, “Yendani patsogolo, fambani muzungunuke guta, wankhondo wakukonzeka apite patsogolo pa Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta.”

Joshuwa paadawuza wanthu, anyantsembe wa Mulungu anomwe akhatakula wunda zaminyanga ya mabila, adayenda patsogolo pa Chawuta achiliza wunda zawo, anyantsembe wa Mulungu akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta akhali m'mbuyo mwawo.
Anyankhondo wakukonzeka adakochela patsogolo paanyantsembe akhaliza wunda, kumambuyo kwawo kukhana anyantsembe akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano, wunda zichiliziwa.
Tsapano Joshuwa adawuza wanthu kuti, “Lekani kuchemelela, ne kubveka fala lanu, panango kuchosa lili lentse nkamwa mwanu kufikila ine ndakuwuzani bzakuchita.”
Nakutenepo iye adachitisa kuti Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta lizungunuke guta kabodzi, adabwelela pomwe m'matenti achigona usiku umwewo m'matenti.
Joshuwa adalamuka machibese-bese pantsiku yachiwili, anyantsembe achitakula Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta.

Anyantsembe wa Mulungu anomwe akhatakula wunda, ndiwo adakochela patsogolo pa Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta achiliza wunda zawo. Patsogolo pawo pakhana anyankhondo wakukonzeka achiteyelewa naanyantsembe akhadatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta, wakuliza wunda achiliza wunda zawo.
Pantsiku yachiwili adazungunuka pomwe guta kabodzi achibwelela pansasa, adachita tenepo kwantsiku zitanthatu.
Pantsiku yachinomwe adalamuka machibese-bese chakumadandakucha, achizungunuka guta ninga bzaadachita pakuyamba. Ntsiku imweyo ndiyo yaadazungunuka guta kanomwe kentse.
Paadazungunuka kachinomwe kentse, anyantsembe wa Mulungu paadazaliza wunda zawo, Joshuwa adakuwa kuwanthu, “Chemelelani, pakuti Chawuta wayikha kale guta limweli m'manja mwanu.”

Guta limweli nabzinthu bzentse bzili m'mwemo ngabzipelekewe kwa Chawuta, kuti bzichenekewe. Koma hule Rahabhi basi, nawabanja lake waanawo munyumba mwake ansala wamoyo, pakuti adabisa atumiki watidatuma.
Koma imwe chenjelelani kuchoka pabzinthu bzidalewedwa kuti bzichenekewe, mukabzitakula mun'chitisa kuti nsasa waa Izraeli uphwanyiwe, muchibwelesa nyathwa.
Siliva yentse yam'mwemo nagolidhe, nabzombo bzankuwa nasimbi m'bzakuyela kwa Chawuta. Bziyendesewe muniyikhiwa chuma cha Chawuta.

Anyantsembe adaliza wunda zawo, wanthu paadabva kulila kwawunda, adakuwa kwene-kwene, pamwepo mpanda udagwa pantsi. Nakutenepo wanthu wentse adapita muguta, napaakhadanyanganana napo, achitola gutalo.
Iwo adapha wanthu wentse akhali mugutamo namulomo wabhemba, adapha amuna naakazi akulu naang'ono namititi yang'ombe namabila namadhonki.
Joshuwa adati kwaamuna awili adayenda kanyangana dziko, “Yendani munyumba mwahule lile, mukam'bulise iye nawentse waanawo, kuteyeza kulumbila kwamudachita kwayiye.”
Nakutenepo alumbwana wale adayenda kanyangana dziko, adayenda kabulisa Rahabhi naapayi wake naamayi wake, nawabanja lake nawentse waakhanawo. Adaapasa pakukhala kunja kwansasa waa Izraeli.
Pamwepo adatentha guta namoto, nabzinthu bzentse bzikhali m'mwemo, kudasala siliva nagolidhe, nabzombo bzankuwa nabzasimbi, adabziyikha munyumba mukhachengetelewa chuma cha Chawuta.

Koma Joshuwa adachiza Rahabhi hule lile, nawanyumba yaapayi wake, nawentse waakhanawo, ali wamoyo, iye akukhala pakati paa Izraeli nalelo, thangwe lakuti iye adabisa akadidiya adatumiwa na Joshuwa kanyangana Jeriko.
Nthawe imweyo Joshuwa adalumbila kwayiwo kuti, “Munthu wentse an'zamanga guta la Jeriko, an'zakhala wakutembelelewa patsogolo pa Chawuta.”
Munthu an'zamanga tsinde laguta la Jeriko,
Munthu an'zamanga misuwo yaguta an'zafelewa namwana wake mung'ono.
Nakutenepo Chawuta adatsogolela Joshuwa, mbili yake idafika kumadziko yentse.

Koma wanthu wa Izraeli alibe kuwonesa chikhulupililo pabzinthu bzakuyela bzidalewedwa na Chawuta kuti bzichenekewe. Akani mwana wa Karimi, Karimi mwana wa Zabhudhi, Zabhudhi mwana wa Zera wanshowo wa Judha, ndiye adatakula bzinthu bzinango pabzinthu bzikhadapelekewa kwa Chawuta. Pomwe ukali wa Chawuta udagakila wanthu wa Izraeli.
Joshuwa adatuma amuna kuchoka ku Jeriko achiyenda ku Ayi, pafupi na Bheti-aveni, chakumabveladzuwa kwa Bheteli, adati kwayiwo, “Yendani mukanyangane dziko.” Amunawo adayenda kanyangana dziko la Ayi.

Paadabwelela kwa Joshuwa iwo adati, “Wanthu wentse ngaleke kubzishupa kuyenda, ngakuyende wanthu masawuzande mawili panango matatu kamenya Ayi, lekani kuyendesa wanthu wentse, pakuti wanthu ali kumweko mbaang'ono-ng'ono.”
Nakutenepo wanthu masawuzande matatu ndiwo adayenda, koma wanthu adathamangisiwa nawanthu waku Ayi.

Pamwepo amuna waku Ayi adapha wanthu makumi matatu naatanthatu, adaathamangisa kuyambila pansuwo mpaka ku Shebharimu, achiwaphela m'matelo m'mwemo. Pamwepo mitima yaa Izraeli idabva mantha, achimala mphamvu.

Pamwepo Joshuwa naakulu-akulu wa Izraeli adang'amba bzakubvala bzawo, achikagona fufumimba pantsi patsogolo pa Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta, mpaka kumawulo. Adabzidzola dotha mumisolo yawo achiwonesa kulila kwawo.

Joshuwa adalila, “Aa, Mfumu Mulungu wangu! Mudayambusilanyi wanthu awa kuchoka kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani kumabveladzuwa. Thangwe lanyi Chawuta kutipeleka m'manja mwaa Amori kuti aticheneke? Bzikhadatikomela ninga mudatisiya kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani kumabveladzuwa kwatikhali?
Ko Mfumu niniti tani, pakuti a Izraeli athawa azondi wawo?
Pakuti a Kenani nawanthu wentse wamudziko lino an'zabva bzachitika, an'zatizungunuka achithima dzina lathu padziko lentse! Imwe mun'zachita tani nambili yadzina lanu ikulu?”
Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Sumuka! Thangwe lanyi kugona fufumimba tenepa?”
Wanthu wa Izraeli adataza! Adaphwanya chibvano changu, alibe kuteyeza bzandidaawuza kuti achite. Adatakula bzinthu bzandidaawuza kuti acheneke, adaba achibziyikha pakati pabzinthu bzawo.

Ndiye thangwe lache wana wa Izraeli ankwanisa lini kuyimisana naazondi wawo. Adathawa azondi wawo, pakuti iwo akhafunika kuphewa. Ine nin'zapitiliza lini kukutsogolelani, kufikila mwachosa bzinthu bzakuyela bzili pakati panu bzidalewedwa kuti bzichenekewe!

Sumuka! Chenesa wanthu, awuze kuti, “Bzicheneseni mukonzekele mangwana, pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli wati, ‘Pakuti pana bzinthu bzakuyela bzikhafunika kuchenekewa. Nakutenepo imwe a Izraeli munkwanisa lini kukunda azondi wanu, kufikila mwachosa bzinthu bzimwebzo pakati panu!

Mangwana machibese-bese munfunika kubwela namishowo yentse. Nshowo uninga wasankhuliwa na Chawuta um'bwela pafupi, dzinza lentse, dzinza linsankhuliwa lim'bwela banja nabanja, banja linsankhuliwa lim'bwela munthu namunthu.’ ”

Munthu an'zaphatiwa ana bzinthu bzimwebzo bzidalewedwa kuti bzichenekewe, iye nabzinthu bzake bzentse bzaanabzo an'zatenthewa namoto, pakuti adaphwanya chibvano cha Chawuta, pomwe nathangwe lakuti adachita chinthu chin'nyazisa mu Izraeli.
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adalamuka machibese-bese mangwana yache, achibwelesa a Izraeli pafupi nshowo nanshowo, nakutenepo nshowo wa Judha udaphatiwa.
Pamwepo nshowo wa Judha udapita, dzinza la Zera ndilo lidaphatiwa, adabwelesa pafupi dzinza lentse la Zera munthu namunthu, banja la Zabhudhi ndilo lidaphatiwa.
Joshuwa adabwelesa pafupi wabanja la Zabhudhi munthu namunthu, Akani mwana wa Karimi, mwana wa Zabhudhi mwana wa Zera, wanshowo wa Judha, ndiye adaphatiwa.
Pamwepo Joshuwa adati kwa Akani, “Mwanangu, kuza Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli, umudumbize, ndiwuze kuti n'chinyi chawudachita, leka kundibisa nee chibodzi chokha pabzinthu bzawudachita.”
Akani adadayila Joshuwa, iye adati, “Chadidi, ine ndidatazila Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli, ndidachita tenepa.

Pakati pasipodyo idapambiwa, ndidawona n'khanjo wabwino waku Shinari namasheleni yasiliva yakhalema mashekele mazana mawili nachigodo chagolidhe chikhalema mashekele makumi mashanu, ndidabzifuna nkubzitakula ndichibzibisa. Nakutenepo bzinthu bzimwebzo ndidabzibisa pantsi patenti yangu, siliva ndiyo ili pantsi pabzinango bzentse.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adatuma atumiki. Adathamanga kutenti kukhadabisiwa bzinthubzo, wanthu paadafika kutenti adakawona bzinthubzo bzidabisiwa mutenti yake, siliva ndiyo ikhali pantsi.
Iwo adabzitakula nkati mwatenti achikabzipeleka kwa Joshuwa nakwawana wa Izraeli wentse. Adabzikhuthula pantsi patsogolo pa Chawuta.

Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse adatakula Akani mwana wa Zera, nasiliva nan'khanjo nachigodo chagolidhe nawana wake wachimuna nawachikazi nantiti wang'ombe namadhonki namabila yake, natenti yake nabzentse bzaakhanabzo, achiyenda naye kuchigowa cha Akori.
Joshuwa adati, “Thangwe lanyi udatibwelesela nyathwa? Chawuta wabwelesambo nyathwa kwayiwe.” Wanthu wentse wa Izraeli adatema Akani naminyala pabodzi nawentse waakhanawo, achiwatentha namoto.
Adagwezeka mudwi waminyala padzulu pake pabodzi nabzinthu bzake, nalelo uno minyalayo ilipo pamwepo. Nakutenepo mbuto imweyi in'chemelewa nadzina lakuti chigowa cha Akori.

Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Leka kugopa panango kushupika, takula wankhondo wentse wawunawo, yenda kamenye guta la Ayi. Wona, ndayikha m'manja mwako, mambo waku Ayi nawanthu wake naguta lake nadziko lake.

Bzamudachita kuguta la Jeriko namambo walene, ndibzo bzamunkachita kuguta la Ayi namambo walene, koma sipodyo yamunkapamba m'mwemo, nabzifuwo bzikachite bzanu. Chitani bzakukalibisalila nakumbuyo kwalene.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adasumuka nawanthu wankhondo, achiyenda kuguta la Ayi. Joshuwa adasankhula amuna wamphamvu masawuzande makumi matatu, achiwatuma kuti ayende nawusiku.
Joshuwa adaawuza kuti, “Wonani, mukabisale chakumbuyo kwaguta, lekani kuyenda kutali naguta, koma mukakhale mudakonzeka.
Ine nawanthu wentse wandinawo tin'zafika paguta. Paan'zatibulila bzaadachita pakuyamba, ise tin'zaathawa.
Iwo paan'zachoka kuzatithamangisa, tin'zaayendesa kutali naguta, tikatenepo iwo an'zati, ‘Akuthawa bzaadachita pakuyamba.’
Pamwepo imwe mun'zabula mwamuninga mudabisala, muchikatola gutalo, pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wanu wayikha kale gutalo m'manja mwanu.
Mukatola guta limwelo mulitenthe namoto, kuteyeza bzidalewedwa na Chawuta, mukachite bzandikukuwuzani.”

Nakutenepo Joshuwa adaawuza kuti ayende, iwo adayenda kumbuto zawo kabisala, adakabisala pakati pa Bheteli na Ayi, chakumadokelo kwa Ayi. Koma Joshuwa usiku umwewo adagona pansasa pabodzi nawanthu wentse.
Mangwana yache Joshuwa adalamuka machibese-bese, nkukocheza wankhondo wake wentse naakulu-akulu wa Izraeli achiyenda kuguta la Ayi.
Wankhondo wentse waakhanawo adayenda pabodzi na Joshuwa, adafendela pafupi naguta nkuzika matenti yawo chakudzulu kwaguta la Ayi, pakati pawo na Ayi pakhana gowa.
Joshuwa adatola amuna masawuzande makumi mashanu, achiwawuza kuti akabisale pakati pa Bheteli na Ayi nachakumadokelo kwaguta.
Nakutenepo adayikha wankhondo wawo, nsasa wawo ukulu ukhali nachakudzulu kwaguta, wakumbuyo ukhali nachakumadokelo kwaguta. Joshuwa usiku umwewo adagona pakati pachigowa.
Mambo waku Ayi paadawona ibzi, iye nawanthu wake, nawanthu wentse wamuguta, adakulumiza kuyenda machibese-bese, kumpata wa Arabha adalungama kuchigowa cha Jorodhani
Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse adathawila utowa, adathawila kunjila yakuchipululu kuchita ninga akundiwa.
Nakutenepo wanthu wentse akhali muguta la Ayi adachemelewa kuti azaathamangise. Paakhaathamangisa tenepo Joshuwa akhatowayendesa kutali naguta.
Palibe munthu adasala muguta la Ayi panango ku Bheteli, alibe kubula kuyenda kathamangisa a Izraeli. Iwo adasiya misuwo yamuguta idafungula, achithamangisa a Izraeli.
Pamwepo Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Lata dipa lili m'manja mwako ku Ayi, pakuti ndikuyikha guta limweli m'manja mwako.” Joshuwa adalata dipa laakhanalo kuguta.
Joshuwa paadandolata janja lake, wentse akhadabisala adabula mumbuto zawo, adakulumiza kuthamangila muguta achikalitola, achilitentha namoto.

Nakutenepo wanthu waku Ayi paadanyangana kumbuyo adawona utsi pwititi muguta uchiyenda kudzulu, uchiyenda m'mitambo. Alibe kuzawona mphamvu zakuthawila uku panango uko, pakuti wanthu akhadathawila kuchipululu, adabwelela achiwathamangisa achiwamenya.
Joshuwa naa Izraeli waakhanawo, paadawona kuti akhadabisala atola guta, utsi waakutosumuka muguta, pamwepo iwo adabwelela nkupha wanthu waku Ayi.

Wanthu wa Izraeli anango akhali muguta adabula achiyamba kumenya wanthu waku Ayi, iwo adakhala pakati paa Izraeli mbali zentse uku nawuku; Izraeli adaapha kufikila kudasala kulibe ne m'bodzi wamoyo ne adathawa.
Koma mambo waku Ayi adamutola wamoyo achimuyendesa kwa Joshuwa.
Wanthu wa Izraeli paadamaliza kupha wanthu waku Ayi muchipululu mwaakhaathamangisa, adabwelela ku Ayi, achikapha namulomo wabhemba wanthu wentse akhadasala.
Nakutenepo wanthu wentse adafa ntsiku imweyo, amuna naakazi adafika, masawuzande khumi namawili (12,000) yawanthu wentse wamu Ayi.
Joshuwa adapitiliza kulata dipa lake ku Ayi kufika amala kucheneka wanthu wentse akhali m'mwemo.
Wanthu wa Izraeli adapamba bzifuwo nasipodyo yentse ikhali mugutamo, ninga kuwuziwa kukhadachitiwa Joshuwa na Chawuta.
Joshuwa adatentha guta la Ayi, adalisiya lawa mathele kwalini nalini. Matheleyo yachalipo nalelo.

Joshuwa adachita kuti chitanda chamambo waku Ayi chimangililiwe pamuti mpaka nthawe yakumawulo, pakudoka kwadzuwa Joshuwa adawuza wanthu kuti achose chitanda chake pamuti. Adatakula chitanda chake achichithusa pansuwo wamuguta. Adagwezeka mudwi waminyala padzulu pachitandacho, nalelo minyalayo ichalipo pamwepo.
Joshuwa adamangila Chawuta Mulungu waa Izraeli mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe paphili la Ebhali,

kuwuziwa kudachitiwa wana wa Izraeli na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta, kuteyeza bzikhadanembewa mubhukhu lantemo wa Mozisi lichiti, “Mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe, imangiwe naminyala ilibe kusemewa nasimbi ili yentse.” Aphe apeleke ntsembe yakutentha kwa Chawuta pamwepo, nantsembe yakudelekha.
Joshuwa ali pamwepo, patsogolo pawanthu wa Izraeli, adanemba pomwe pamwala ntemo wa Mozisi.

Wana wa Izraeli wentse, anyakubwela nanzika zam'mwemo, naakulu-akulu namanduna naatongi wawo, akhali pamwepo adayima adanyangana Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta, adayima mbali zentse za Bhokisi la Chibvano, patsogolo paanyantsembe wa Mulungu wachi Levi akhatakula Bhokisi la Chibvano la Chawuta. Kati-nakati yawo ikhali kutsogolo kwaphili la Gerizimu, inango kati-nakati ikhali kutsogolo kwaphili la Ebhali, kuteyeza bzaakhadawuziwa pakuyamba na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta, kuti a Izraeli adalisiwe.
Pamwepo Joshuwa adawelenga mafala yentse yantemo yakudalisa nayakutembelela, kuteyeza bzentse bzikhadanembewa mubhukhu lantemo.
Palibe ne fala libodzi laadawuziwa na Mozisi laalibe kuwelenga Joshuwa kwaa Izraeli wentse akhadakochezana pamwepo, akazi nawana nawachilendo wentse awo akhakhala pakati pawo.

Mazimambo yentse yakumadokelo yang'ambu ya Jorodhani, mudziko lamapili namubzigowa nawentse akhali mphepete mwanyanja ikulu ikhadanyanganana na Lebhanoni naa Amori naa Kenani naa Perezi naa Hivi naa Jebhusi, adabva bzidachitika.
Wentse adakochezana pabodzi kumanga mpfundo ibodzi kamenyana na Joshuwa naa Izraeli.
Koma wanthu waku Gibheyoni adabva bzidachita Joshuwa kumaguta yaku Jeriko naku Ayi,

iwo adachita mwakuchenjela. Adatakula mbuwa pamadhonki yawo kuchita ninga atumiki akuchoka kutali. Pakuyenda ulendo wawo adatakula masakha yakung'ambika nabzikasi bzakhanda bzavinyu bzakubaduka bzakusonewa-sonewa.
Adabvala bzakubvala bzakung'ambika-ng'ambika, nashango zakusonewa-sonewa kunzayo zawo, mbuwa zawo nazingwa yawo bzikhadawuma kwene-kwene.
Tsapano adayenda kwa Joshuwa pamisasa yapa Giligali, adati kwa Joshuwa nakwawanthu wentse wa Izraeli, “Ise tachoka kudziko lakutali kwene-kwene, nakutenepo tinfuna kuchita chibvano nayimwe.”
Koma a Izraeli adati kwaa Hivi, “Panango mun'khala pakati pathu, tingachite tani chibvano nayimwe, wanthu watinsaya kudziwa kuti mun'choka kuponi?”
Iwo adati kwa Joshuwa, “Ndise alanda wanu.”
Joshuwa adati kwayiwo, Ko ndimwe yani, mun'choka kuponi?
Iwo adati, “Ise alanda wanu tachoka kudziko lakutali, pakuti tidabva mbili yadzina la Chawuta Mulungu wanu, tidabva bzentse bzaadachita mu Ijipiti,
nabzentse bzaadachita kumazimambo mawili yaa Amori akhakhala kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumabveladzuwa. Mambo Sihoni waku Heshibhoni namambo Ogi waku Bhashani akakhala mu Ashitaroti.”
Akulu-akulu wathu nawanthu wentse wamudziko lathu adati kwayise, “Takulani mbuwa muyende ulendo mukagumane nawo, adati tikuwuzeni kuti, ‘Ise ndise alanda wanu, bwelani tichite chibvano nayimwe.’ ”
Nyanganani zingwa yathu, patidachoka nayo kwathu ninga mbuwa yathu tichibwela kuno ikhathuma, koma tsapano yawuma kwene-kwene.

Bzikasi bzathu bzakhanda bzakutakulila vinyu patidabzidzadza vinyu bzikhali bzinyowani, koma nyanganani muwone bzatong'ambika. Bzakubvala bzathu nashango zathu bzang'ambika pakuti tafamba ulendo utali.
Wanthu wa Izraeli adatambila chakudya, koma alibe kubvunza mulomo wa Chawuta bzakuchita.
Joshuwa adayanjana nawo, nkuchita nawo chibvano achiwachita kuti akhale. Manduna yawo yagunyenye lawanthu yadalumbila kwayiwo.
Pakudamala ntsiku zitatu kuchoka pantsiku yaadachita chibvano nawanthu wale, a Izraeli adabva kuti wanthu waadachita nawo chibvano akhakhala nawo pafupi, achikhala pakati pawo.
Nakutenepo wana wa Izraeli adafuluka achikafika kumaguta yawo ntsiku yachitatu. Maguta yawo yakhali, Gibheyoni na Kefira na Bheeroti na Kiriyati-jeyarimu.

Koma wana wa Izraeli alibe kuwamenya, pakuti manduna yagunyenye lawanthu yakhadalumbila kwayiwo nadzina la Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli. Pamwepo wanthu wentse adang'ung'uzikila akulu-akulu wawo nabzankhani ikhadachitika pakati pawo.
Koma manduna yagunyenye yadati, “Pakuti ise tidalumbila kale nadzina la Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli, nakutenepo ise tinkwanisa lini kuwaphata-phata.
Nathangwe lakulumbila kwatidachita, tin'zachita kuti iwo akhale wamoyo, pakuti ukali wa Mulungu ungatifikile.”
Manduna yadati kwayiwo, “Alekeni ali wamoyo. Nakutenepo adaaphatisa basa lakutema nkhuni nakutungila madzi gunyenye lentse lawanthu. Kuteyeza bzidalewedwa naakulu-akulu wawo.”
Joshuwa adaachemela nkuti kwayiwo, “Thangwe lanyi kutinamiza ise, kulewa kuti, ‘Tin'choka kutali,’ koma imwe muchikhala pakati pathu?
Tsapano imwe mwatembelelewa, wanthu anango pakati panu an'zakhala alanda, wakutema nkhuni nakutunga madzi panyumba ya Mulungu wangu.”

Iwo adadayila kwa Joshuwa, “Chadidi tidabzichita, pakuti ise alanda wanu, tidawuziwa kuti Chawuta Mulungu wanu, adawuza Mozisi mulanda wake kuti akupaseni dziko lentse, achipha wanthu wentse an'khala m'mwemo. Tsapano ise tidachita tenepo, nathangwe lakugopa kuphewa.
Tsapano, ise tili m'manja mwanu, chitani bzabwino bzidalungama m'maso mwanu.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adaapulumusa, kuchoka m'manja mwawana wa Izraeli, alibe kuzaapha.

Koma kuyambila ntsiku imweyo, Joshuwa adaachita alanda wakutema nkhuni nakutungila madzi gunyenye lawanthu, pankochezana wanthu pambuto yakupelekela ntsembe kwa Chawuta. Wanthu amwewa nalelo akuphata basa limwelo, pambuto zaaninga asankhula.

Adhoni-zedheki mambo wa Jerusalema, adabva kuti Joshuwa adapamba guta la Ayi achiliphwanya, achipha mambo wam'mwemo, bzaadachita ku Jeriko namambo walene. Adabva pomwe kuti wanthu waku Gibheyoni adayanjana naa Izraeli achitokhala pakati pawo.
Adhoni-zedheki nawanthu wake adabva mantha, pakuti Gibheyoni ikhali guta likulu kuchita ninga guta likhana mambo kuposa guta la Ayi nawanthu walene wamphamvu.
Nakutenepo Adhoni-zedheki mambo wa Jerusalema adatuma atumiki kwa Hohamu mambo waku Hebhuroni na Piramu mambo waku Jarimuti na Jafiya mambo waku Lakishi na Dhebhiri mambo waku Egiloni, iye adati,
“Bwelani muzandithandize kumenya guta la Gibheyoni, pakuti layanjana na Joshuwa nawana wa Izraeli.”

Pamwepo mazimambo mashanu yaa Amori, mambo wa Jerusalema, mambo wa Hebhuroni, mambo wa Jarimuti, mambo wa Lakishi, namambo waku Egiloni adakocheza wankhondo wawo, nkuzika matenti adanyanganana naguta la Gibheyoni achimenyana nalo.

Wanthu wa Gibheyoni adatuma atumiki kwa Joshuwa paakhadazika nsasa wawo pa Giligali achiti, “Mambo, lekani kutilekelela ise alanda wanu. Kulumizani, bwelani muzatithandize mutichize, pakuti mazimambo yentse yaa Amori an'khala mudziko lamapili akochezana kuti azatimenye.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa naanyankhondo wake wentse, naanyankhondo wamphamvu adachoka pa Giligali.
Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Leka kuwagopa pakuti ndaayikha kale m'manja mwako, palibe ne m'bodzi wawo ankakwanisa kuyimisana nayiwe.”
Joshuwa naanyankhondo wake adafamba usiku wentse kuchoka ku Giligali, achiyenda ku Gibheyoni kwaadakafikila a Amori mwadzidzimu.

Chawuta adazungayilisa anyankhondo waa Amori. Wanthu wa Izraeli adapha wanthu azinji kwene-kwene waa Amori pa Gibheyoni. Wanthu wa Izraeli adaathamangisa nanjila yapampata wapa Bheti-horoni, adaapha mpaka ku Azeka naku Makedha.

Wanthu wachi Amori paakhathawa a Izraeli, nanjila yakumatelo ya Bheti-horoni, Chawuta adagwesa minyala kuchoka kudzulu, mpaka pa Azeka, iwo adafa. Matalala yadapha wanthu azinji, wanthu adafa namvula yamatalala akhadawanda kupita wanthu adaphewa naa Izraeli namabhemba.
Pamwepo Joshuwa adalewa-lewa na Chawuta, pantsiku Chawuta yaadayikha a Amori m'manja mwawana wa Izraeli, adabzilewa pamaso paa Izraeli, iye adati,
kufikila wanthu wa Izraeli abwezelambo kwaazondi wawo.
Ko ibzi sibzidanembewa mu Bhukhu la Jashari? Dzuwa lidayima pakati pakudzulu, lilibe kukulumiza kudoka kwantsiku yentse.
Kulibe kumbachitikako ntsiku yakutenepo chikhalilo, panango kumbuyoko, Chawuta kutetekela munthu. Chawuta ntsiku imweyi adamenyela nkhondo a Izraeli!
Pamwepo Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse waakhanawo adabwelela kunsasa wawo pa Giligali.
Mazimambo mashanu yaa Amori adathawa, adakabisala mphako yapa Makedha.
Joshuwa adawuziwa kuti, “Mazimambo mashanu yawoneka yadabisala mphako yapa Makedha.”
Joshuwa adati, “Kungulusani minyala mikulu, mufunge mulomo wamphakoyo, musankhule wanthu wakukhaliliza pamwepo.
Koma imwe lekani kukhala pamwepo, pitilizani kuteyela azondi wanu, afikileni nachakumbuyo. Lekani kuwalekelela achipita mumaguta yawo. Chawuta Mulungu wanu waayikha kale m'manja mwanu.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa pabodzi nawana wa Izraeli waakhanawo paadamala kuwapha bzakuwamalizilatu wentse, ang'ono-ng'ono adasala adakathawila m'maguta yakuchinjiliziwa,
wanthu wentse adabwelela kwa Joshuwa kunsasa wa Makedha mwan'delekho.
Palibe ne m'bodzi bzake pawanthu wamudziko adasumusa lilimi nabzawana wa Izraeli.
Pamwepo Joshuwa adati, “Fungulani mulomo wamphako mubulise mazimambo yale mashanu muwabwelese kwayine.”
Nakutenepo iwo adabulisa mazimambo mashanuyo mphako, mambo waku Jerusalema, waku Hebhuroni, waku Jarimuti waku Lakishi nawaku Egiloni, achiwayendesa kwa Joshuwa.

Paadabulisa mazimamboyo adaayendesa kwa Joshuwa. Joshuwa adachemela a Izraeli wentse, adati kumanduna yawanthu wankhondo waakhadayenda nawo, “Fikani pafupi, muponde makhosi yamazimambo aya nanzayo zanu.” Pamwepo iwo adafika pafupi nkuponda minyendo yawo pamakhosi yamazimambo yale.
Joshuwa adati, “Lekani kugopa, panango kushupika, khalani wamphamvu mulimbe, pakuti Chawuta an'zachita tenepo kwaazondi wanu wentse wamum'menyana nawo.”
Pamwepo Joshuwa adapha mazimambo yentse mashanu, achiwamangilila pamiti mishanu. Adaamangilila pamiti mpaka, kumawulo.

Koma panthawe yakunyula kwadzuwa, Joshuwa adawuza wanthu kuti abuluse mathupi yawo pamitipo, achikayathusa m'mphako mwaakhadabisala. Adayikha minyala mikulu pamulomo wamphakoyo, nalelo minyalayo ilipo pamwepo.

Ntsiku imweyo Joshuwa adatola guta la Makedha, adapha mambo walene namulomo wabhemba, palibe ne m'bodzi adasala. Adaphelatu wanthu wentse akhali m'mwemo, palibe ne m'bodzi adathawa. Bzaadachita kwamambo waku Makedha ndibzo bzaadachita kwamambo waku Jeriko.
Pamwepo Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse waakhanawo adachoka pa Makedha, nkuyenda ku Libhina kwaadakamenya gutalo.

Chawuta adayikha guta limwelo namambo walene m'manja mwaa Izraeli. A Izraeli adapha wanthu wentse namulomo wabhemba palibe ne m'bodzi adasala muguta limwelo, adachita bzibodzi-bodzi kwamambo walene, ninga bzaadachita kwamambo wa Jeriko.
Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse waakhanawo adachoka ku Libhina nkuyenda kazika matenti yawo kuguta la Lakishi, adalizungunuka achilimenya.
Chawuta adayikha guta la Lakishi m'manja mwaa Izraeli. Joshuwa adatola gutalo pantsiku yachiwili, adapha wanthu wentse akhali m'mwemo namulomo wabhemba, bzaadachita kuguta la Libhina.
Pamwepo Horamu mambo wa Gezeri adabwela kuzathandiza wanthu waku Lakishi, koma Joshuwa adamupha pabodzi nawankhondo wake, palibe ne m'bodzi adasala.
Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse waakhanawo adachoka ku Lakishi nkuyenda kuguta laku Egiloni, kwaadakazika matenti yawo achilimenya.
Guta limwelo adalitola ntsiku imweyo, adapha wanthu wentse akhali m'mwemo namulomo wabhemba, bzaadachita kuguta la Lakishi.
Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse waakhanawo adachoka ku Egiloni, nkuyenda kuguta la Hebhuroni, achikalimenya.

Adalipamba, achilimenya namulomo wabhemba, achipha wanthu wentse wam'mwemo pabodzi namambo walene namiyi yalene, palibe ne m'bodzi wawo adasalamo, bzaadachita guta la Egiloni, kwaadapha wanthu wentse akhali m'mwemo.
Pamwepo Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse waakhanawo adabwelela kuguta la Dhebhiri, kwaadakamenya gutalo.

Iye adalipamba namambo walene namaguta yayene yentse, adapha wanthu wentse akhali m'mwemo namulomo wabhemba, palibe ne m'bodzi wawo adasalamo, bzaadachita ku Hebhuroni naku Libhina namazimambo yalene, ndibzo bzaadachita ku Dhebhiri namambo walene.

Nakutenepo Joshuwa adakunda dziko lentse, dziko lam'mapili namu Negebhu namubzigowa namumatelo namazimambo yawo yentse, palibe ne m'bodzi adasala, adapha bzentse bzikhafema, kuteyeza bzaadawuziwa na Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli.
Joshuwa adaakunda kuchoka ku Kadheshi-bhareneya kufika ku Gaza, namadziko yentse ya Gosheni mpaka ku Gibheyoni.
Joshuwa adatola mazimambo namadziko yentse kabodzi, pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli akhaamenyela nkhondo.
Pamwepo Joshuwa naa Izraeli wentse waakhanawo adabwelela kunsasa wawo pa Giligali.
Jabhini mambo wa Hazori paadabva bzidachitika, adatumila fala kwamambo Jobhabhi wa Madhoni nakwamambo Shimironi waku Akishafi,
nakwamazimambo yachakudzulu kwadziko lamapili, naku Arabha chakunyantsi kwa Galileya, nakubzigowa naku Nafidhori chakumadokelo.

Adatumila pomwe fala kwaa Kenani wakumabveladzuwa nawakumadokelo, nakwaa Amori, kwaa Hiti, kwaa Perezi, kwaa Jebhusi akakhala mudziko lamapili, nakwaa Hivi akhakhala munyantsi mwaphili la Herimoni mudziko la Mizipa.
Iwo adabula nawankhondo wawo wentse, akhali azinji kulingana nan'chenga wam'mphepete mwanyanja. Akhana mahachi mazinji kwene-kwene nangolo zawo.
Mazimambo yentse yamweya yadakocheza wankhondo wawo pabodzi, achizika matenti yawo pantsantsa ya Meromu, kuti amenyane naa Izraeli.
Chawuta adati kwa Joshuwa, “Leka kuwagopa, pakuti mangwana panthawe zino nin'zaayikha m'manja mwaa Izraeli, achiphewa. Muzagwate mikangato yaminyendo yamahachi yawo, muchizatentha ngolo zawo namoto.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa pabodzi nawankhondo wake adaafikila mwadzidzimu pantsantsa yapa Meromu achiwamenya.

Chawuta adaayikha wentse m'manja mwaa Izraeli. Pamwepo a Izraeli adaapha achiwathamangisa mpaka ku Sidhoni ikulu, nakuguta la Misirefi-mayimu chakumabveladzuwa, kafika kuchigowa cha Mizipa. Adaapha, palibe ne m'bodzi adasala.
Joshuwa adachita kwayiwo, bzaadawuziwa na Chawuta. Adagwata mikangato yamahachi yawo, nkutentha ngolo zawo namoto.
Joshuwa adabwelela m'mbuyo nthawe imweyo, achikapamba guta la Hazori, achipha mambo waguta limwelo nabhemba. Dziko la Hazori panthawe imweyo ndilo likhali guta likulu lawumambo wentse.
Wanthu wa Izraeli adapha wanthu wentse muguta limweli namulomo wabhemba, adaaphelatu, palibe ne chibodzi chikhafema chidasala, adatentha Hazori namoto.
Joshuwa adapamba maguta yentse yamazimambo yamweyo, pabodzi namazimambo yayene. Adachenekelatu wanthu wentse namulomo wabhemba, kuteyeza bzaakhadawuziwa na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta.
Koma a Izraeli alibe kutentha maguta yakhadamangiliwa pamitunthu, kunja kwaguta la Hazori lokha lidatenthewa na Joshuwa.
Wana wa Izraeli adapamba sipodyo yentse yam'maguta yamweya, nabzifuwo kukhala bzawo, koma adapha wanthu wentse namulomo wabhemba, kufika aachenekelatu, palibe ne chibodzi chikhafema chaadasiya.
Chawuta adapeleka mitemo yake kwamulanda wake Mozisi, Mozisi adayiwuzambo Joshuwa. Joshuwa palibe chaadasiya pabzentse bzaadawuziwa Mozisi na Chawuta.
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adatola dziko lentse: Dziko lam'mapili, la Negebhu, la Gosheni namubzigowa bza Jorodhani na Arabha namudziko lamapili la Izraeli namuchigowa chalene,
kuyambila paphili la Halaki, liniyenda naku Seyiri mpaka pa Bhaali-gadhi muchigowa cha Lebhanoni, munyantsi mwaphili la Herimoni. Iye adaphata mazimambo yamadziko yamweyo achiwapha.
Joshuwa adachita nkhondo namazimambo yamweyo kwantsiku zizinji.
Maguta yamweyo yalibe kuyanjana nawana wa Izraeli, kunja kwaa Hivi akhakhala ku Gibheyoni. Adatola maguta yentse munkhondo.

Chawuta ndiye akhachita kuti wanthuwo alimbise mitima yawo kuti akachite nkhondo naa Izraeli, kuchitila kuti achenekewe, nakutenepo akhaaphelatu bzakusaya kuwabvela ntsisi, kuwanyangalisilatu kuteyeza bzikhadawuziwa Mozisi na Chawuta.

Panthawe imweyo Joshuwa adayenda kapha wanthu wachi Anakimu, wamudziko lamapili, la Hebhuroni nawamudziko la Dhebhiri wamu Anabhi, nawamudziko lamapili la Judha, nawentse wamudziko lamapili la Izraeli. Joshuwa adaapha wentse achiphwanya maguta yawo.
Palibe ne m'bodzi wadzinza la Anakimu adasala mudziko lawana wa Izraeli, koma akhali m'maguta yamu Gaza naku Gati namu Ashidhodhi ndiwo adasalako.
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adatola dziko lentse kuteyeza bzikhadalewedwa na Chawuta kwa Mozisi. Joshuwa adapeleka dziko limwelo kwawana wa Izraeli kukhala nthaka yawo, adaagawila kuteyeza mishowo yawo.
Nakutenepo dziko lidawa nan'delekho kuchoka munkhondo.

Aya ndiyo mazimambo yamadziko yadakundiwa nawana wa Izraeli, yaadatolela nthaka yamadziko yawo, yakung'ambu kwa Jorodhani ku Arabha chakumabveladzuwa, kuyambila pachigowa cha Arinoni kafika kuphili la Herimoni, nawentse wamubzigowa bza Jorodhani chakumabveladzuwa.

Sihoni mambo waa Amori uyo akhakhala mu Heshibhoni akhatonga kuyambila pa Aroyeri, ili mumphepete mwachigowa cha Arinoni, pomwe kuyambila pakati pachigowa kufikilatu pakamadzi ka Jabhoki, pamalile yawanthu Amoni kati-nakati yadziko la Giliyadhi,

yakhayambila kuchigowa cha Jorodhani yachikafika kunyanja ya Galileya chakumabveladzuwa, yadalungama kunjila yaku Bheti-jeshimoti yachikafika kunyanja ya Arabha, nyanja ya munyu, yachikafika chakunyantsi kumatelo ya Pisiga.
Adakunda pomwe dziko lamambo Ogi waku Bhashani, ule adasala pawanthu wamphamvu wa Refayimu akhakhala pa Ashitaroti napa Edhireyi,

uyo akhatonga wanthu akhakhala m'phili la Herimoni na Saleka nadziko lentse la Bhashani, kufika kumalile yaa Geshuri naa Maaka, nakati-nakati yaa Giliyadhi, mpaka kafika kumalile ya Sihoni mambo waku Heshibhoni.

Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta nawana wa Izraeli adakunda mazimambo yamweyo. Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta adapeleka dziko limwelo kunshowo wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yawanthu wadzinza la Manase kukhala lawo.

Aya ndiyo mazimambo yadakundiwa na Joshuwa pabodzi nawana wa Izraeli, dziko lachakumadokelo kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani, kuyambila ku Bhaali-gadhi mugowa la Lebhanoni mpaka kuphili la Halaki ilo linkwiza lichiyenda ku Seyiri. Joshuwa adapeleka dziko limwelo kumishowo ya Izraeli kuti likhale lawo kugawiliwa kwaadachitiliwa.

Adagawa dziko lentse kuphatanizila dziko lamapili, namunyantsi mwalene, muchigowa cha Jorodhani nam'matelo yam'mapili namuchipululu chamu Judhiya, namu Negebhu, mudziko laa Hiti, laa Amori, laa Kenani, laa Perezi, laa Hivi nadziko laa Jebhusi.
Wanthu wa Izraeli adakunda mambo waku Jeriko namambo waku Ayi, pambali pa Bheteli,
mambo waku Shimuroni-meroni, mambo waku Akishafi
mambo waku Kedheshi nawaku Jokineyamu mu Karimeli
mambo waku Dhori nawaku Nafati-dhori nawaku Goyimu mu Giligali
nawaku Tiriza. Mazimambo yentse pabodzi yakhafika makumi matatu nam'bodzi.
Tsapano Joshuwa akhadakalamba kwene-kwene, Chawuta adati kwayiye, “Iwe wakula, kwene-kwene koma pana mbuto yasala infunika kutolewa.
Ili ndilo dziko lidasala mundime yentse yaa Filistia nadziko lentse la Geshuri.

Kuchoka pakamadzi ka Shihori chakumabveladzuwa kwa Ijipiti, mpaka kumalile yachakudzulu kwamalile ya Ekironi. Mbuto imweyi ikhadziwika kuti niyaa Kenani, likhatongewa namazimambo mashanu yachi Filistia, waku Gaza, waku Ashidhodhi, waku Ashikeloni, waku Gati, waku Ekiloni naawo waa Avimu,
akhakhala chakunyantsi kwadziko lentse laa Kenani, na Meyara guta laa Sidhoni kufika ku Afeki kumalile yaa Amori,
nadziko laa Gebhali nadziko lentse la Lebhanoni chakumabveladzuwa, kuchoka pa Bhaali-gadhi munyantsi mwaphili la Herimoni Lebho kufika pampata wa Hamati,

nawanthu wentse akhakhala mudziko lamapili, kuyambila ku Lebhanoni kufika ku Misirepoti-mayimu, nadziko lentse laa Sidhoni. Ine nin'zathamangisila wana wa Izraeli wanthu amwewo, nin'zapasa a Izraeli dziko limwelo kuti likhale nthaka yawo, kuteyeza bzandidakuwuzani.
Nakutenepo gawa dziko limweli kumishowo pfemba nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase, kuti ikhale nthaka yawo.”
Nshowo wa Rubheni na Gadhi nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase akhadapasiwa kale nthaka yawo na Mozisi kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumabveladzuwa, mbuto ile yaadapasiwa na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta.
Kuyambila ku Aroyeri kumphepete kwachigowa cha Arinoni, naguta lili pakati padambo, namadziko yentse yam'madambo ya Medhebha mpaka ku Dhibhoni,
namaguta yentse ya Sihoni mambo waa Amori, uyo akhatonga mu Heshibhoni, kufika kumalile yawanthu wa Amoni.
Kuphatanizila pomwe dziko la Giliyadhi, nazinango ndime za Geshuri na Maaka naphili lentse la Herimoni, nadziko lentse la Bhashani mpaka ku Saleka,
nadziko lentse lamambo Ogi ku Bhashani, ule akhatonga mu Ashitaroti namu Edhireyi. Ndiye yekha adasala mu Refayimu, awa adakundiwa achithamangisiwa na Mozisi.
Koma wanthu wa Izraeli alibe kuthamangisa wanthu wa Geshuri panango wa Maaka, a Geshuri naa Maakati akukhala naa Izraeli nalelo.
Nshowo waa Levi ndiwo ulibe kupasiwa nthaka na Mozisi, iye adati kwayiwo, “Ntsembe zakutentha namoto zimpelekewa kwa Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli ndiyo nthaka yawo.”
Mozisi adapeleka nthaka yadziko kunshowo kwawana wa Rubheni kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Nakutenepo dziko lawo likhayambila pa Aroyeri, kumphepete kwachigowa cha Arinoni, naguta lili pakati pachigowa nam'madambo mwa Medhebha,
na Heshibhoni namaguta yentse yam'madambo yaniti, Dhibhoni na Bhamoti-bhaali na Bheti-bhaali-meyoni
na Jahazi na Kedhemoti na Mefayati
na Kiriyatayimu na Sibhuma na Zereti-shahari paphili lili muchigowa
na Bheti-peyori napamatelo yapaphili lapa Pisiga napa Bheti-jeshimoti.

Kulewa kuti maguta yentse yam'buwa nadziko lentse la Sihoni mambo waa Amori, adatonga mu Heshibhoni. Awa pabodzi naakulu-akulu waa Midhiyani adakundiwa na Mozisi, Evi na Rekemu na Zuri na Huri na Rebha, aya yakhali manduna ya Sihoni akhakhala mudziko limwelo.
Wanthu wa Izraeli adaphambo Bhalamu mwana wachimuna wa Bheyori uyo akhachita bzakuwombeza, adaphewa namabhemba pabodzi naanango wentse adaphewa.
Kamadzi ka Jorodhani ndiyo yakhali malile yawanthu wanshowo wa Rubheni. Iyi ndiyo ikhali nthaka yawanthu wa Rubheni, kuteyeza mabanja yawo namaguta yawo namiyi yawo.
Mozisi adapasa nthaka yadziko kwawana wa Gadhi kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Dziko lawo likhali Jazeri, namaguta yentse ya Giliyadhi, nakati-nakati yadziko lawana wa Amoni kufika ku Aroyeri, kumabveladzuwa kwa Rabha.
Kuyambila pa Heshibhoni kufika ku Ramati-mizipa naku Bhetonimu, yachiyambila pomwe pa Mahanayimu mpaka kudziko la Dhebhiri,

yachilungama kuchigowa chaku Bheti-haramu naku Bheti-nimura naku Sukoti naku Zafoni, nadziko lentse la Sihoni mambo waku Heshibhoni. Kamadzi ka Jorodhani ndiyo yakhali malile yawo yakumabveladzuwa, kufika kugombe kwanyanja ya Galileya, chakumabveladzuwa kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani.
Iyi ndiyo nthaka yawana wa Gadhi, kuteyeza mabanja yawo namaguta yawo namiyi yawo.
Mozisi adapasa nthaka kati nakati yawana wa Manase, idagawiliwa kwakati nakati yanshowo wa Manase kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Dziko lawo likhayambila pa Mahanayimu, nadziko lentse la Bhashani, nawumambo wentse wa Ogi mambo waku Bhashani, namiyi yentse ya Jayiri ili mu Bhashani, namaguta makumi matanthatu,
nakati-nakati yadziko la Giliyadhi na Ashitaroti na Edhireyi, namaguta yamambo Ogi waku Bhashani. Dziko limweli lidapasiwa wanthu wa Makiri mwana wa Manase kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Uku ndiko kugawa kwaadachita Mozisi nthaka yadziko, mudambo la Moabhi kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani kumabveladzuwa kwa Jeriko.
Koma Mozisi alibe kupasa nthaka yadziko nshowo waa Levi. Iye adati, “Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli ndiyo nthaka yawo.”
Iyi ndiyo nthaka idagawiliwa wanthu wa Izraeli mu Kenani. Nyantsembe wa Mulungu Eliyezari na Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni naakulu-akulu wanyumba zaazipayi wawo wanshowo waa Izraeli, ndiwo adagawa mbutozo.
Nthaka yawo idagawiwa nanjila yakuwombeza kwa Mulungu ichipasiwa mishowo pfemba nakati-nakati, ninga kuwuziwa kukhadachitiwa Mozisi na Chawuta.
Mozisi akhadatogawila kale nthaka kumishowo miwili nakati-nakati yachakumabveladzuwa kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani, koma a Levi ndiwo alibe kupasiwa nthaka yadziko pakati pawo.

Wanthu wa Jozefi akhana mishowo miwili, nshowo wa Manase nawa Efulemu. Koma a Levi ndiwo alibe kugawiliwa mbuto yawo yadziko, adapasiwa maguta yakukhala nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo nambuto zakuyikha bzinthu bzawo.
Wanthu wa Izraeli adachita bzaadawuziwa Mozisi na Chawuta. Nakutenepo adagawa dziko.

Pamwepo wanthu wa Judha adabwela kwa Joshuwa pa Giligali. Kelebho mwana wa Jefune wanshowo wachi Kenizi adati kwayiye, “Munkumbuka bzidalewedwa na Chawuta kwa Mozisi munthu wa Mulungu pa Kadheshi-bhareneya bzayiwe nayine.

Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta paadandituma kuchoka ku Kadheshi-bhareneya kuzanyangana dziko lino, ndikhali mwamuna wamagole makumi manayi. Nakutenepo ine ndidabwelela ndichimuwuza bzikhali muntima mwangu.
Koma abale wangu wandidayenda nawo adabwela achilewa mafala yakhagopsa wanthu. Koma ine ndidakhulupilila Chawuta Mulungu wangu mwakukwana.

Mozisi ntsiku imweyo adalumbila achiti, ‘Chadidi dziko lawaponda naminyendo yako lin'zakhala nthaka yako nakum'badwe wako kufika lini nalini. Pakuti iwe wawonesa chikhulupililo kwa Chawuta Mulungu wangu mwakukwana.’
