Nakutenepo, wonani, Chawuta wandisiya wamoyo kwamagole makumi manayi namashanu kuteyeza kulewa kwaadachita kwa Mozisi, a Izraeli paakhafamba muchipululu. Koma lelo ndawa munthu wamagole makumi masele namashanu.

Koma nalelo ndichadalimba ninga kulimba kwandikhadachita ntsiku yaadandituma Mozisi. Mphamvu zandinazo zidandolingana nazandikhanazo nthawe imweyo, ninkwanisa kubula kuyenda kamenya nkhondo ndichibwelela.

Nakutenepo ndipaseni dziko lamapili lidalewedwa na Chawuta ntsiku imweyo. Imwe mun'dziwa kuti wanthu wachi Anakimu an'khala kumweko ana maguta yansaya kufikika. Koma peno Chawuta ana ine, ninkaathamangisa kuteyeza kulewedwa kwabzidachitiwa na Chawuta.”
Pamwepo Joshuwa adadalisa Kelebho mwana wa Jefune achimpasa guta la Hebhuroni kuti likhale nthaka yake.
Nakutenepo Hebhuroni idakhala nthaka ya Kelebho mwana wa Jefune wachi Kenizi mpaka nalelo, nathangwe lakuti iye adakhulupilila Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli mwakukwana.
Dziko la Hebhuroni likhambachemelewa pomwe nadzina lakuti Kiriyati-aribha. Aribhayo akhali munthu nkulu pakati paa Anakimu.
Pamwepo mudziko mudawa nan'delekho kuchoka munkhondo.
Dziko lidagawiliwa nshowo wawanthu wa Judha kuteyeza mabanja yawo, likhayambila chakunyantsi lichikafika kumalile ya Edhomu, mpaka chakunyantsi kwachipululu cha Zini.
Malile yawo yachakunyantsi yakhayambila pam'malila nyanja yamunyu, kuchoka pampamba uninyangana chakunyantsi.

Malile yamweyo yakhayenda chakunyantsi kwampata wa Akirabhimu kuyenda naku Zini, yachikhwizika nachakunyantsi kwa Kadheshi-bhareneya, yachipita naku Hezironi, kafika ku Adhari, yachigonyoka pomwe kafika ku Karika,
yachipita naku Azimoni, yachiyenda kukamadzi kaku Ijipiti yachikamalila panyanja. Aya ndiyo malile yako yachakunyantsi.
Nyanja yamunyu, ndiyo yakhali malile yakumabveladzuwa yachikafika padzalo la Jorodhani.
Malile yambali yachakudzulu yakhayambila mumpamba mwanyanja kafika padzalo la Jorodhani,
malileyo yachilungama ku Bheti-hogila, yachikapita nachakudzulu kwa Bheti-arabha, kufika kumwala wa Bhohani. (Bhohani akhali mwana wachimuna wa Rubheni).

Malile yamweyo yakhayambila pachigowa cha Akori, yachikwiza yadalungama ku Dhebhiri, yachigonyoka chakudzulu, yadalungama ku Giligali, pakhadanyanganana napampata wa Adhumimu m'mbali yachakunyantsi kwachigowa, yachipita nakuntsantsa ya Enishemeshi mpaka ku Enirogeli;

malileyo yaniyenda nakuchigowa cha Hinomu chakumadokelo, kumatelo yachakunyantsi kwaphili laa Jebhusi, kukhana guta la Jerusalema; yankwiza padzulu paphili lidanyanganana nachigowa cha Hinomu chakumadokelo chakudzulu kumapeto kwagowa la Refayimu.
Malile yamweyo yakhachokela padzulu paphili yachifika pantsantsa ya Nefutowa, yachilungama kumaguta yakufupi naphili la Efuroni, yachifika ku Bhaala iyo ikhachemelewa pomwe kuti Kiriyati-jeyarimu,

malile yamweyo yakhazwengelela nachakumadokelo kwa Bhaala, yachikafika kuphili la Seyiri, yachipita nachakumatelo yakudzulu kwaphili la Jeyarimu, iyo ikhachemelewa pomwe kuti Kesaloni, yachibuluka ku Bheti-shemeshi, yachipita naku Timuna.
Malileyo yakhapita pomwe nakumatelo yachakudzulu kwaphili laku Ekironi yachizwengelela kafika ku Shikeroni, yachipita nakuphili la Bhaala yachikafika ku Jabhineyeli yachimalila panyanja.
Malile yakumadokelo ikhali nyanja ikulu nam'mphepete mwayene.
M'malile yamweyo ndimo mukhakhala wanthu wa Judha kuteyeza mabanja yawo.

Joshuwa adagawila Kelebho mwana wa Jefune, mbali inango yadziko pakati pawanthu wa Judha, kuteyeza bzidachoka pamulomo wa Chawuta. Kelebho adapasiwa guta la Kiriyati-aribha, ilo ntsiku zino lin'chemelewa kuti Hebhuroni. Aribha akhali apayi wa Anaki.
Kelebho adathamangisa wana atatu wa Anaki, Sheshayi na Ahimani na Talimayi, wam'badwe wa Anaki.
Paadachoka pamwepo iye adazayenda kamenyana nawanthu akakhala mu Dhebhiri, iyo kale-kale ikhambachemelewa nadzina lakuti Kiriyati-seferi.
Kelebho adati, “Munthu an'zamenya guta la Kiriyati-seferi achilitola, nin'zampasa mwana wangu wachitsikana Akisa kuti akhale nkazi wake.”
Otiniyeli mwana wa Kenazi, nkulu wa Kelebho ndiye adalitola, nakutenepo Otineli adapasiwa Akisa kukhala nkazi wake.
Pantsiku yafeshita yan'chato Otiniyeli adapembzelela Akasa nkazi wake kuti akumbile munda kwaapayi wake. Iye paadafika kwaapayi wake achibuluka padhonki lake, Kelebho adati kwayiye, “Ukufunanyi.”

Iye adati kwaapayi wake, “Ndipaseni daliso, pakuti dziko lamudandipasa nimbuto yakuwuma kwene-kwene, ndipaseni pomwe n'chela wamadzi.” Nakutenepo Kelebho adapasa Akasa mwana wake michela yachakudzulu nayachakunyantsi.
Iyi ndiyo nthaka yadziko idapasiwa wanthu wa Judha kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Maguta yawanthu wanshowo wa Judha yachakunyantsi chambali yakumalile ya Edhomu yakhali, Kabhuzeyeli na Edheri na Jaguri
na Kina na Dhimona na Adhadha
na Kedheshi na Hazori na Itinani na
na Hazori-hadhata na Keriyoti-hezironi likhachemelewa pomwe kuti Hazori
na Amamu na Shema na Moladha
na Hazari-gadha na Heshimoni na Bheti-peleti
na Hazari-shuwali na Bheeri-shebha na Bhiziyotiya
na Bhaala na Limu na Ezemu,
kuchizabwela Elitoradhi na Kesilu na Horima,
na Zikilagi na Madhimana na Sanisana,
na Lebhayoti na Shilihimu na Ayini na Rimoni. Maguta yentse pabodzi namiyi yayene yakhafika makumi mawili napfemba.
Aya ndiyo maguta yakhali mubzigowa, Eshitaoli na Zora na Ashina,
na Zanowa na Eniganimu na Tapuwa na Enamu
na Jarimuti na Adhulamu na Soko na Azeka
na Shaarayimu na Adhitayimu na Gedhera na Gedherotayimu. Maguta yentse pabodzi namiyi yayene yakhafika khumi namanayi.
Kuzabwela Zenani na Hadhashi na Migidhali-gadhi
na Dhilani na Mizipa na Jokitiyeli
na Lakishi na Bhozikati na Egiloni
na Kabhoni na Lahimasi na Kitilishi
na Gedheroti na Bheti-dhagoni na Naama na Makedha. Maguta yentse pabodzi namiyi yayene yakhafika khumi natanthatu.
Pakhana yanango pomwe maguta yakhali, Libhina na Eteri na Ashani
na Ifuta na Ashina na Nezibhi
na Keyila na Akizibhi na Maresha, maguta yentse pabodzi namiyi yayene yakhafika pfemba.
kuchoka ku Ekironi kufika kunyanja, nabzentse bzikhali kumbali ya Ashidhodhi, namiyi yentse ikhadazungunuka.
Kuzabwela Ashidhodhi namaguta yayene namiyi yayene na Gaza namaguta yayene namiyi yayene, kufika kukamadzi kaku Ijipiti nam'malile mwakene.
Mudziko lamapili mukhana, Shamiri na Jatiri na Soko
na Dhana na Kiriyati-sana iyo ikhachemelewa pomwe kuti Dhebhiri,
kuzabwela Anabhi na Eshitemowa na Animu
na Gosheni na Holoni na Gilo. Maguta namiyi yayene yakhafika khumi nalibodzi.
Kuchizabwela Arabhu na Dhuma na Eshani
na Janimu na Bheti-tapuwa na Afeka
na Humuta na Kiriyati-aribha iyo ikhachemelewa kuti Hebhuroni na Ziori. Maguta pfemba namiyi yayene.
Kuzabwela Mawoni na Karimeli na Zifu na Juta
na Jezireyeli na Jokidheyamu na Zanowa
na Kayini na Gibheya na Timuna. Maguta yakhafika khumi namiyi yayene.
Kuzabwela Halihuli na Bheti-zuri na Gedhori,
na Maarati na Bheti-anoti na Elitekoni, maguta yakhafika matanthatu namiyi yayene.
Kuzabwela Kiriyati-bhaali iyo ikhachemelewa pomwe kuti Kiriyati-jeyarimu na Rabha, maguta mawili namiyi yayene.
Muchipululu mukhana maguta aya, Bheti-arabha na Midhini na Sekaka
na Nibhushani guta lamunyu na Enigedhi, yentse pabodzi yakhali matanthatu namiyi yayene.
Wanthu wa Judha alibe kukwanisa kuthamangisa a Jebhusi akhakhala mu Jerusalema, nakutenepo a Jebhusi akukhala nawanthu wa Judha mu Jerusalema nalelo.

Dziko lidagawiliwa m'badwe wa Jozefi nanjila yakuwombeza, likhayambila pakamadzi ka Jorodhani pafupi na Jeriko, kumabveladzuwa kwantsantsa ya Jeriko, kafika kuchipululu yachipita namudambo yachibula kuchoka mu Jeriko yachiyenda kudziko lamapili la Bheteli.
Yakhachoka pa Bheteli kafika ku Luzi, yachipita naku Ataroti mudziko la Ariki,
yachipolika yachiyenda nachakumadokelo kwadziko la Jafuleti, kufika kudziko lachakunyantsi kwa Bheti-horoni, mpaka ku Gezeri, yachimalila kunyanja.
Wanthu wa Jozefi nawa Manase nawa Efulemu adatambila nthaka yawo.
Dziko lidapasiwa m'badwe wa Efulemu namabanja yawo likhadayima tenepa: Dziko la Ataroti-adhari ndiyo yakhali malile yanthaka yawo yakumabveladzuwa, mpaka chakudzulu kwa Bheti-horoni,
yachiyenda kunyanja. Mikimetati ikhali nachakudzulu, malile yachakumabveladzuwa yakhazungunuka naku Tanati-shilo yachipita nachakumabveladzuwa kwa Janowa.
Yakhachoka pa Janowa, yachipolika ku Ataroti yachiyenda ku Naara kufika ku Jeriko, yachimalila pa Jorodhani.
Yakhachoka ku Tapuwa yachiyenda nachakumadokelo kwakamadzi ka Kana, yachikamalila kunyanja. Dziko limwelo lidapasiwa mabanja yam'badwe wa Efulemu kuti ikhale nthaka yawo,
pabodzi namaguta yakhadapatuliliwa wanthu wa Efulemu nkati mwanthaka ya Manase, maguta yentse namiyi yayene.
Wanthu wa Efulemu alibe kuthamangisa a Kenani akhakhala mu Gezeri, nakutenepo a Kenani adakhala pakati paa Efulemu nalelo, koma akuwaphatisa basa lachibhalo.

Dziko lachakumadokelo kwa Jorodhani lidagwatiliwa wanthu wanshowo wa Manase nanjila yakuwombeza, pakuti ndiye akhali mwana wakuyamba wa Jozefi. Makiri mwana wakuyamba wa Manase, Makiri apayi wa Giliyadhi adapasiwa dziko la Giliyadhi nala Bhashani, pakuti akhali nyabezi wabzankhondo.

Dziko lentse lachakumadokelo kwa Jorodhani lidagawiliwa nshowo wa Manase udasala, kuteyeza mabanja yawo yaniti, Abhiyezeri na Heleki na Asiriyeli na Shekemu na Heferi na Shemidha. Awa akhali amuna wam'badwe wa Manase mwana wa Jozefi, kuteyeza mabanja yawo.

Tsapano Zelofehadhi akhali mwana wa Heferi, Heferi akhali mwana wa Giliyadhi, Giliyadhi akhali mwana wa Makiri, Makiri akhali mwana wa Manase, Manase alibe kubala mwana wachimuna, adabala wana wachikazi basi, aya ndiyo madzina yawana wake wachikazi, Mahila na Nowa na Hogira na Milika na Tiriza.

Wana wachikaziwo adayenda kwanyantsembe wa Mulungu Eliyezari nakwa Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni nakumanduna kwaadakati, “Chawuta adawuza Mozisi kuti atipasembo nthaka yadziko pabodzi naabale wathu.” Joshuwa adaapasa nthaka yawo yadziko pakati paabale wawo wana waapayi wawo, kuteyeza bzidachoka pamulomo wa Chawuta.
Nathangwe limwelo Manase adapasiwa bzigawo khumi, kuchosako dziko la Giliyadhi na Bhashani yakumabveladzuwa kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani,
pakuti wana wachitsikana wa Manase adapasiwambo nthaka yawo yadziko pakati pawana wake wachimuna. Dziko la Giliyadhi lidagawiliwa nshowo wentse wa Manase ukhadasala.
Malile yadziko la Manase yakhayambila kwa Asheri yachifika ku Mikimetati, chakumabveladzuwa kwa Shekemu yachiyenda nachakunyantsi kumbali yajanja ladidi kukhakhala wanthu waku Enitapuwa.
Dziko la Tapuwa likhali la Manase, koma guta la Tapuwa lam'malile ya Manase, likhali lawana wa Efulemu.

Malileyo yakhapolika nakukamadzi ka Kana. Maguta yentse yachakunyantsi kwakamadzi kamweka pakati pamaguta ya Manase yakhali ya Efulemu. Malile ya Manase yakhayenda pomwe nachakudzulu kwakamadzi, yachikamalila panyanja.
Dziko lachakunyantsi likhali la Efulemu, dziko lachakudzulu likhali la Manase. Malile yawo ikhali nyanja. Asheri infikika nachakudzulu, chakumabveladzuwa kukhana Isakari.

Manase akhana maguta yanango pomwe mudziko la Isakari namudziko la Asheri yaniti, Bheti-sheyani namiyi yayene na Ibhileyami namiyi yayene namaguta yamu Dhori (Nafati-dhori) namiyi yayene namaguta yamu Enidhori namiyi yayene namaguta yamu Tanaki namiyi yayene namaguta yamu Megidho namiyi yayene, lachitatu likhali guta la Nafati.
Koma wanthu wa Manase alibe kukwanisa kutola maguta yamweyo, nakutenepo a Kenani adapitiliza kukhala mumadziko yamweyo.
Ne wana wa Izraeli paadazalimba, alibe kuthamangisa a Kenani wentse akhakhala pakati pawo, koma akhaaphatisa basa lachibhalo.
M'badwe wa Jozefi udati kwa Joshuwa, “Thangwe lanyi kutipasa chigawo chibodzi chadziko nanjila yakuwombeza kukhala nthaka yathu? Ise ndise azinji kwene-kwene pakuti Chawuta adatidalisa.”
Joshuwa adati kwayiwo, “Peno ndimwe azinji kulumizani muyende m'mathengo yadziko laa Perezi nalaa Refayimu mukabzikonzele pakukhala pamwepo, pakuti dziko lamapili la Efulemu niling'ono kwayimwe.”

Wanthu wanshowo wa Jozefi adati, “Dziko lamapili latidawona ise tinkwana lini. Pomwe a Kenani an'khala kudambo ana ngolo zasimbi, nawentse akukhala, mu Bheti-sheyani namiyi yayene naawo akukhala muchigowa cha Jezireyeli.”
Joshuwa adawuza wanthu wanshowo wa Jozefi nawa Efulemu nawa Manase kuti, “Ndimwe azinji, pomwe ndimwe wakulimba, nakutenepo mungawombezelewe lini mbuto ibodzi.

Tsapano dziko lamapili lin'zakhala lanu, ne lingakhale thengo, mulichenese likhale lanu mpaka kum'malila malile. Mun'zathamangisa a Kenani akukhala mudziko limwelo, ne angakhale ana ngolo zasimbi, ne angakhale ali wakulimba.”
Tsapano gunyenye lentse lawana wa Izraeli adakochezana pa Shilo, adazika Tenti yakugumanilana pamwepo. Dziko limwelo lidagwela m'manja mwawo.
Koma padasala mishowo minomwe yawana wa Izraeli ikhanati yagawiliwa nthaka yadziko.
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adati kwawana wa Izraeli, “Thangwe lanyi mukuleka kuyenda katola dziko lamudapasiwa na Chawuta Mulungu waazipayi wanu?”
Ndipase amuna atatu kuchoka panshowo wokha-wokha, ndiwatume kuti ayende akanyangane dziko lentse, akanembe dziko lin'zakhala nthaka yawo, achizabwela kuzandiwuza namulomo bzaaninga awona.
Dziko limwelo azaligawe mubzigawo bzinomwe. Judha an'zapitiliza kukhala mudziko lachakunyantsi, wanyumba ya Jozefi an'zapitiliza kukhala mudziko lachakudzulu.
Munembe pantsi dziko limwelo mubzigawo bzinomwe, mubwelese bzinembobzo kwayine. Tsapano ine nin'zakuwombezelani patsogolo pa Chawuta Mulungu wathu.

A Levi an'gawiliwa lini mbuto pakati panu, pakuti unyantsembe wa Chawuta ndiyo nthaka yawo. Nshowo wa Gadhi nawa Rubheni nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase adapasiwa kale nthaka yawo kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumabveladzuwa na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta.

Nakutenepo amunawo adayenda kanyangana dziko, Joshuwa adaawuza kuti, “Yendani mukanyangane dziko lentse mukanemba bzamuninga mwawona, mukamaliza muzabwelele kwayine, ndichizawombeza patsogolo pa Chawuta pa Shilo.”
Nakutenepo amunawo adayenda kanyangana dziko lentse, adanemba mubhukhu bzinembo bzamaguta mubzigawo bzinomwe. Achibwelela kwa Joshuwa pansasa ku Shilo.
Joshuwa adawombeza kwa Chawuta paakhali pa Shilo, pomwe adagawa dziko kwawana wa Izraeli kuteyeza nshowo wawo.
Nthawe yakuwombezela m'badwe wa Bhenjemani kuteyeza mabanja yawo idafika. Dziko laadapasiwa likhali pakati panshowo wa Judha nawa Jozefi.
Malile yawo yambali yachakudzulu yakhayambila pa Jorodhani yachiyenda nakumatelo yachakudzulu kwa Jeriko, yachipita nachakumadokelo kwadziko lamapili yachimalila kuchipululu cha Bheti-aveni.

Kuchoka pamwepo, malileyo yakhapita nachakunyantsi kumatelo yaguta la Luzi, ilo tsapano lin'chemelewa kuti Bheteli. Yakhayenda yachipolika chakunyantsi kwa Ataroti-adhari paphili lachakunyantsi kwa Bheti-horoni.

Malileyo yadagonyoka kuyenda chakunyantsi kuteyeza mbali yachakumadokelo yaphili yachinyanganana naguta la Bheti-horoni, yachikamalila pamuyi wa Kiriyati-bhaali, uwo un'chemelewa kuti Kiriyati-jeyarimu, guta lam'badwe wa Judha. Aya yakhali malile yachakumadokelo.
Malile yambali yachakunyantsi yakhayambila kunja kwa Kiriyati-jeyarimu, yachilungama ku Efuroni, mpaka kuntsantsa yamadzi ya Nefutowa,

pamwepo malile yampolika pomwe namunyantsi mwaphili likhadanyanganana nachigowa cha Hinomu, chakudzulu kum'malila chigowa cha Refayimu, yachiyenda pomwe kunyantsi kwachigowa cha Hinomu, chakunyantsi kwamatelo yaa Jebhusi, mpaka ku Enirogeli,

yachigonyoka pomwe yachiyenda nachakudzulu yachikafika ku Enishemeshi, yachiyenda naku Geliloti guta likhadanyanganana napampata wa Adhumimu, pomwe yachipolika kumwala wa Bhohani (Bhohani akhali mwana wachimuna wa Rubheni),
yachipita napamatelo yachakudzulu kwa Bheti-arabha yachipolika kuchigowa cha Jorodhani,
yachipita pomwe nachakunyantsi kwamatelo ya Bheti-hogila, yachimalila chakudzulu kumpamba wanyanja yamunyu, chakunyantsi yakhamalila pa Jorodhani. Aya ndiyo yakhali malile yachakunyantsi.
Kamadzi ka Jorodhani ndiyo yakhali malile yachakumabveladzuwa. Iyi ndiyo ikhali nthaka yam'badwe wa Bhenjemani, kuteyeza mabanja yawo, namalile yawo kumbali zentse.
Maguta yam'badwe wa Bhenjemani kuteyeza mabanja yawo yakhali, Jeriko na Bheti-hogila na Emeki-kezizi na
na Avimu na Parahi na Ofira na
Kefaramoni na Ofini na Gebha, maguta yentse yakhali khumi namawili namiyi yayene.
Kuzabwela Gibheyoni na Rama na Bheeroti na
na Rekemu na Iripeyeli na Taralahi

na Zela na Hayelefu na Jebhusi, tsapano in'chemelewa kuti Jerusalema, na Gibheya na Kiriyati-jeyarimu. Maguta yentse yakhali khumi namanayi namiyi yayene. Iyi ndiyo ikhali nthaka yam'badwe wa Bhenjemani kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Kuwombeza kwachiwili kudafikila m'badwe wa Simiyoni, kuteyeza mabanja yawo. Adapasiwa nthaka yawo yadziko pakati panshowo wa Judha.
Maguta yanthaka yawo yakhali, Bheeri-shebha na Shebha na Moladha
na Hazari-shuwali na Bhala na Ezemu
na Elitoradhi na Bhetuli na Horima
na Zikilagi na Bheti-marikabhoti na Hazarisusa
na Bheti-libhayoti na Sharuheni. Maguta yentse yakhali khumi namatatu namiyi yayene.
Kuzabwela pomwe, Ayini na Rimoni na Eteri na Ashani. Maguta yentse yakhali manayi namiyi yayene,
kuphatanizila miyi yentse ikhadazungunuka maguta mpaka ku Bhaalati-bheyeri naguta la Rama laku Rama-negebhu. Iyi ndiyo nthaka idapasiwa m'badwe wa Simiyoni kuteyeza mabanja yawo.

Nthaka idapasiwa m'badwe wa Simiyoni ikhali nkati mwadziko yanthaka ya Judha, pakuti chigawo chidapasiwa m'badwe wa Judha chikhali chikulu kwene-kwene. Nakutenepo nshowo wa Simiyoni udapasiwa nthaka yawo pakati panthaka ya Judha.
Kuwombeza kwachitatu kudagwela m'badwe wa Zebhuluni kuteyeza mabanja yake. Dziko lanthaka yake likhafika pa Saridhi.
Malile yake yakhapita nachakumadokelo yachikafika ku Marala, yachikafika ku Dhabhesheti nakukamadzi kakumabveladzuwa kwa Jokineyamu.
Yakhayambila ku Saridhi yachipita nakumbali inango yachakumabveladzuwa kufika kumalile yaku Kisiloti-tabhori, yachipita naku Dhabherati mpaka ku Jafiya.
Kuchoka pamwepo yachipitilila kuyenda chakumabveladzuwa kufika ku Gati-heferi naku Etikazini, yachiyenda ku Rimoni yachigonyoka kuyenda ku Neya.
Malile yachakudzulu yakhazungunuka naku Hanatoni yachikamalila kuchigowa cha Ifitaheli.
Kuphatanizila guta la Katati nala Nahalali nala Shimironi nala Idhala nala Bhetelehemu. Maguta yentse yakhali khumi namawili namiyi yayene.
Iyi ndiyo nthaka yam'badwe wa Zebhuluni kuteyeza mabanja yawo, maguta yamweya namiyi yayene.
Kuwombeza kwachinayi kudafikila m'badwe wa Isakari kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Madziko yawo yakhali, Jezireyeli na Kesuloti na Shunemu
na Hafarayimu na Shiwoni na Anaharati
na Rabhiti na Kishoni na Ebhezi
na Remeti na Eniganimu na Enihadha na Bheti-pazezi.
Malile yamweyo yakhafika pomwe ku Tabhori naku Shahazuma naku Bheti-shemeshi, yachikamalila pa Jorodhani. Maguta yentse yakhali khumi namatanthatu namiyi yayene.
Iyi ndiyo nthaka yam'badwe wa Isakari kuteyeza mabanja yawo, namaguta namiyi yawo.
Kuwombeza kwachishanu kudafikila m'badwe wa Asheri kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Dziko lawo likhaphatanizila maguta ya Helikati na Hali na Bheteni na Akishafi
na Alameleki na Amadhi na Mishali yachikafika pa Karimeli chakumadokelo na Shihori-libhinati,
yachilungama chakumabveladzuwa yachiyenda ku Bheti-dhagoni yachikafika ku Zebhuluni nakuchigowa cha Ifitaheli chakudzulu kwa Bheti-emeki naku Neyiyeli, yachiyenda nachakudzulu mpaka ku Kabhuli,
ku Ebhuroni, ku Rehobhi, ku Hamoni, ku Kana, mpaka ku Sidhoni ikulu.

Tsapano malile yadzikolo yadazagonyoka yachilungama ku Rama, kufika kuguta la Tire, guta lakuchinjiliziwa, yachizungunuka kulungama ku Hosa, yachimalila panyanja, kuphatanizila Mahalabhi, na Akizibhi,
na Uma na Afeki na Rehobhi, maguta yentse yakhali makumi mawili namawili namiyi yayene.
Iyi ndiyo nthaka yam'badwe wa Asheri kuteyeza mabanja yawo, maguta yamweya namiyi yawo.
Kuwombeza kwachitanthatu kudafikila m'badwe wa Nafitali kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Malile yawo yakhayambila pa Helefi pamuti wamuoki waku Zaananimu yachikafika ku Adhami-nekebhu naku Jabhineyeli mpaka ku Lakumi, yachikamalila ku Jorodhani.
Malileyo yakhagonyoka yachilungama chakumadokelo, yachipita naku Azinoti-tabhori, yachilungama ku Hukoki yachigumana na Zebhuluni chakunyantsi na Asheri chakumadokelo, na Judha
Maguta yakhadachinjiliziwa yakhali, Zidhimu na Zeri na Hamati na Rakati na Kinereti
na Adhama na Rama, na Hazori
na Yironi na Migidhaleli na Horemu na Bheti-anati na Bheti-shemeshi. Maguta yentse yakhali khumi napfemba namiyi yayene.
Iyi ndiyo ikhali nthaka yam'badwe wa Nafitali kuteyeza mabanja yawo, maguta namiyi yayene.
Kuwombeza kwachinomwe kudafikila m'badwe wa Dhani kuteyeza mabanja yawo.
Dziko laadapasiwa kukhala nthaka yawo likhaphatanizila, Zora na Eshitaoli na Irishemeshi
na Shaalabhinu na Ayijaloni na Itila
na Eloni na Timuna na Ekironi
na Eliteke na Gibhetoni na Bhaalati
na Jehudhi na Bhene-bheraki na Gati-rimoni
na Mejarikoni na Rakoni nadziko likhadanyanganana na Jopa.

Wanthu wa Dhani paadatolelewa dziko lawo, adayenda kamenya guta la Leshemu. Nakutenepo iwo adapamba guta limwelo achipha wanthu akhali m'mwemo. Adapha wanthu wentse namulomo wabhemba achitola dzikolo kukhala nthaka yawo, gutalo adalipasa dzina lakuti Dhani, dzina lakholo lawo.
Iyi ndiyo nthaka idapasiwa m'badwe wa Dhani, kuteyeza mabanja yawo, maguta yamweya namiyi yayene.
Wanthu wa Izraeli paadamaliza kugawa dziko kukhala nthaka yawo, adapeleka mbali inango yadziko kuchoka nkati mwawo kwa Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni kuti ikhale nthaka yake.

Ninga kulewa kwaadachita Chawuta, kuti Joshuwa angapasiwe guta lentse laadakumbila. Joshuwa adasankhula guta la Timunati-sera lamudziko lamapili la Efulemu. Nakutenepo iye adamanga pomwe guta achikhala m'mwemo.

Izi ndizo nthaka zidagawiwa na Eliyezari nyantsembe wa Mulungu na Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni naatsogoleli wanyumba zaazipayi wawo wanshowo wa Izraeli. Adachita bzakuwombeza kwa Chawuta, nthawe yaakhali pansuwo wa Tenti yakugumanilana pa Shilo. Nakutenepo iwo adazamaliza kugawa dziko.
“Wuza wanthu wa Izraeli kuti asankhule maguta yakupotela, kuteyeza kuwuziwa kudachitiwa Mozisi,
kuti munthu akapha mwanzake mwakusaya kudziwa, munthuyo athawe apotele kumweko kuti alombolewe kwaabale wamunthu waadapha kuchitila kuti angabwezelembo kutayika kwagazi lam'bale wawo.

Iye angathawile kuguta linango pamaguta yamweyo, achikayima pansuwo ukulu waguta, achikalongosola nkhani yake m'makutu mwaakulu-akulu waguta limwelo iwo ankamutakula achiyenda naye muguta, achimpasa mbuto, iye achikhala nawo pabodzi.
Nyakubwezela gazi lanyakufa akamuteyela, wanthu wamuguta ngaaleke kuwapasa munthuyo, pakuti adapha mwanzake mwakusaya kudziwa, ne panango akhazondana naye kale.

Wakutazayo angakhale muguta kufikila wayima patsogolo pagunyenye lawanthu kuti atongewe, kufikila nyantsembe nkulu wa Mulungu akhatonga panthawe imweyo wafa. Pamwepo nyakupha munthu angayende kuguta lake, laadathawa.”

Nakutenepo iwo adasankhula guta la Kedheshi mu Galileya, mudziko lamapili la Nafitali na Shekemu mudziko lamapili la Efulemu, na Kiriyati-aribha, tsapano in'chemelewa kuti Hebhuroni mudziko lamapili la Judha.

Kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani kumabveladzuwa kwa Jeriko, adasankhula guta la Bhezeri muchipululu, m'madambo yanshowo wa Rubheni na Ramoti mu Giliyadhi, namudziko la Gadhi na Golani mu Bhashani namudziko la Manase.

Maguta yamweya ndiyo yadasankhuliliwa a Izraeli, pabodzi nawachilendo akhakhala pakati pawo, kuti yakhale maguta yakuthawila, pakachita munthu aninga wapha mwanzake mwakusaya kudziwa, kuchitila kuti aleke kuphewa namunthu an'zafuna kubwezelambo gazi lam'bale wake, kufikila wayima patsogolo pagunyenye lawanthu.
Akulu-akulu wamabanja yaazipayi waa Levi adabwela pafupi na Eliyezari nyantsembe wa Mulungu nakwa Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni, nakwaakulu-akulu wamabanja yanshowo wawanthu wa Izraeli.
Ali pa Shilo mudziko la Kenani iwo adati kwayiye, “Chawuta adawuza Mozisi kuti, tidapasiwa maguta yakukhalamo, pabodzi nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzathu.”
Nakutenepo wana wa Izraeli adapasa a Levi maguta aya nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo kuchoka munthaka yawo, kuteyeza bzidalewedwa namulomo wa Chawuta.

Kuwombeza kwakuyamba kudagwela kwadzinza la Kohati kuteyeza mabanja yawo. A Levi wam'badwe wa Aroni nyantsembe wa Mulungu, adapasiwa maguta khumi namatatu kuchoka munshowo wa Judha nawa Simiyoni nawa Bhenjemani.

Wanthu wentse wadzinza la Kohati akhadasala adapasiwa maguta khumi nanjila yakuwombeza kuchoka kumabanja yanshowo wa Efulemu, pomwe kuchoka munshowo wa Dhani nakati-nakati yawanthu wanshowo wa Manase.
Wanthu wadzinza la Gerishoni adapasiwa maguta khumi namatatu nanjila yakuwombeza, kuchoka munshowo wa Isakari, nakunshowo wa Asheri nawa Nafitali, nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase mu Bhashani.
Dzinza la Merari kuteyeza mabanja yawo, adapasiwa maguta khumi namawili kuchoka kum'badwe wa Rubheni, wa Gadhi nawa Zebhuluni.
Wana wa Izraeli adachita bzakuwombeza kuti apase a Levi maguta nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, kuteyeza bzaadawuziwa na Chawuta mwa Mozisi.
Kuchoka kunshowo wawana wa Judha nanshowo wawana wa Simiyoni adapeleka maguta aya yalewedwa namadzina,
kuti yakhale yam'badwe wa Aroni, wadzinza la Kohati wanshowo wa Levi, pakuti kuwombeza kudagwela iwo pakuyamba.
Adaapasa guta la Kiriyati-aribha mudziko lamapili la Judha, tsapano lin'chemelewa kuti Hebhuroni pabodzi nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo. (Aribha akhali apayi wa Anaki.)
Koma minda yagutalo namiyi yayene bzikhadapasiwa kale Kelebho mwana wa Jefune kukhala bzake.
M'badwe wa Aroni nyantsembe wa Mulungu adapasiwa guta la Hebhuroni, guta lakupotela munthu akhapha mwanzake mwakusaya kukumbukila nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, na Libhina nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo,
na Jatiri nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo na Eshitemowa nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo
na Holoni nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo na Dhebhiri nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo
na Ayini nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo na Juta nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo na Bheti-shemeshi nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo. Maguta yentse yadachoka munshowo wa Judha na Simiyoni yakhali pfemba.
Kushowo wa Bhenjemani adapasiwa Gibheyoni nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Gebha nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo
na Anatoti nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Alimoni nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo. Maguta yentse yakhali manayi.
Maguta yadapasiwa m'badwe wa Aroni nyantsembe wa Mulungu yakhali khumi namatatu nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo.
Wanthu wentse wadzinza la Kohati wamabanja yaa Levi adasala adagawiliwa maguta nanjila yakuwombeza kuchoka kunshowo wa Efulemu.
Iwo adapasiwa guta la Shekemu, guta lakupotela munthu akhapha mwanzake, nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo, mudziko lamapili la Efulemu na Gezeri nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo,
na Kibhizayimu na Bheti-horoni, nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo, maguta yentse yakhali manayi.
Kunshowo wa Dhani kudachoka, Eliteke nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Gibhetoni nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo
na Ayijaloni nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Gati-rimoni nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, maguta yentse yakhali manayi.
Kukati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase kudachoka, Tanaki nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, Gati-rimoni nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, adapasiwa maguta mawili.
Maguta yentse yadzinza lam'badwe wa Kohati ukhadasala yakhali khumi, nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo.

Kudzinza laa Gerishoni, wabanja linango la a Levi adapasiwa maguta mawili kuchoka kukati nakati yanshowo unango wa Manase, Golani mu Bhashani nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, guta lakupotela munthu akapha mwanzake na Bheeshitera nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, maguta yentse yakhali mawili.
Kunshowo wa Isakari kudachoka, guta la Kishoni na Dhabherati nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo
na Jarimuti nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Eniganimu nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, maguta yentse yakhali manayi.
Kunshowo wa Asheri kudachoka maguta manayi, Mishali nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Abhidhoni nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo,
na Helikati nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Rehobhi nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo maguta yentse yakhali manayi.

Kunshowo wa Nafitali adapasiwa maguta matatu, Kedheshi ili mu Galileya nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, guta lakupotela munthu akapha mwanzake na Hamoti-dhori nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Karitani nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo.
Maguta yamabanja yentse yadzinza la Gerishoni yakhali khumi namatatu nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo.
A Levi adasala wam'badwe wa Merari, adapasiwa maguta kuchoka kunshowo wa Zebhuluni, adapasiwa Jokineyamu nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Karita nambuto zayene zakudyesela bzifuwo
na Dhimina nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Nahalali nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, maguta yentse yakhali manayi.
Kunshowo wa Rubheni adapasiwa, Bhezeri nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo na Jahazi nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo
na Kedhemoti nambuto yakudyesela bzifuwo, na Mefayati nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo, maguta yakhali manayi.
Kunshowo wa Gadhi kudachoka maguta manayi, Ramoti mu Giliyadhi nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo, guta lakupotela munthu akapha mwanzake na Mahanayimu nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo
na Heshibhoni na Jazeri nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo, maguta yentse yakhali manayi.
Nakutenepo maguta yadagawiliwa mabanja yam'badwe wa Merari nanjila yakuwombeza namabanja yaa Levi akhadasala yakhafika khumi namawili.
Maguta yadapasiwa a Levi nambuto zakudyesela bzifuwo bzawo nkati mwanthaka yawana wa Izraeli kuti ikhale yawo, yakhali makumi manayi namasele.
Maguta yamweya, paguta lokha-lokha pakhana mbuto yakudyesela bzifuwo.
Nakutenepo Chawuta adapasa a Izraeli dziko lentse laadalumbila kuzapasa makholo yawo. Adalitola kukhala lawo, iwo nkukhala m'mwemo.

Chawuta adachita kuti mudziko lentse mukhale nan'delekho, kuteyeza kulumbila kwaakhadachita kumakholo yawo. Palibe ne m'bodzi paazondi wawo adakwanisa kuyimisana nawo, pakuti Chawuta akhaapasa mphamvu zakukunda azondi wawo.
Palibe ne chibodzi chabwino chaakhadatsimikiza Chawuta kwaa Izraeli chidagwela pantsi, bzentse bzidachitika.
Joshuwa adachemela nshowo wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase,
achiti kwayiwo, “Mudateyeza bzentse bzamudawuziwa na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta, mudatetekela bzandidakuwuzani kuti muzachite.
Ntsiku zizinji zimwezi mulibe kusiyana naabale wanu a Izraeli, mukhateyeza bzamudawuziwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu.

Nakutenepo Chawuta Mulungu wanu wapeleka mpumulo kwaabale wanu kuteyeza kulumbila kwaadachita kwayiwo. Tsapano imwe bwelelani kumatenti yanu, kudziko lanthaka yanu lamudapasiwa na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumabveladzuwa.”

Koma uchenjelele kuteyeza bzifundiso nantemo wamudawuziwa na Mozisi mulanda wa Chawuta ule uniti, “Funa Chawuta Mulungu wako, ufambe munjila zake, nakuteyeza mitemo yake, umamatile payiye nakumutumikila nantima wanu nanzelu zanu zentse.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adaadalisa achiwawuza kuti ayende, iwo adayenda kumatenti yawo.

Tsapano kati nakati yanshowo wa Manase, Mozisi akhadaapasa kale dziko lawo mu Bhashani, pomwe kati nakati inango, Joshuwa akhadaapasa kale dziko pafupi naabale wawo chakumadokelo kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani. Joshuwa adaadalisa, achiwabweza kumatenti yawo,
adati kwayiwo, “Bwelelani kumatenti yanu nachuma chanu chizinji nabzifuwo bzanu nasiliva nagolidhe nankuwa nasimbi, nabzakubvala bzizinji. Gawanani naabale wanu sipodyo yaazondi wanu.”

Nakutenepo wanthu wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase adabwelela kumiyi yawo. Adasiya a Izraeli ali pa Shilo mudziko la Kenani, iwo achibwelela kudziko lawo kudziko la Giliyadhi, laadatola kukhala nthaka yawo kuteyeza bzidalewedwa namulomo wa Chawuta kwa Mozisi.

Tsapano nshowo wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yawanthu wa Manase paadafika kufupi na mphimpha ya Jorodhani, mudziko la Kenani, akali chakumadokelo kwa Jorodhani adamanga mbuto ikulu yakupelekela ntsembe.

Wanthu wa Izraeli adabva kuti, “Wanthu wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase amanga pakupelekela ntsembe kumalile kwadziko la Kenani, pafupi na Jorodhani, ng'ambu ino mudziko lawanthu wa Izraeli.”
Tsapano wana wa Izraeli paadabzibva, adakochezana pa Shilo, kuti achite nawo nkhondo.
Pamwepo a Izraeli adatuma Finiyasi mwana Eliyezari nyantsembe wa Mulungu kunshowo wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase mudziko la Giliyadhi.
Adayenda namanduna khumi, panshowo wokha-wokha wamabanja yaa Izraeli pakhachoka m'bodzi, ali n'tsogoleli panshowo waa Izraeli.
Paadafika mudziko la Giliyadhi, kwawanthu wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yanshowo wa Manase, adati kwayiwo,
“Gunyenye lentse la Chawuta lati, ‘Thangwe lanyi kuchita umaluku tenepa kwa Mulungu wa Izraeli. Mwapandukila Chawuta, nakubzimangila kwamwachita mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe?
Ko chakuyipa chamudachita pa Peyori ching'ono? Chidabwelesa matenda kugunyenye lentse la Chawuta, nalelo tinati tabzichenesa pachakuyipa chimwecho.
Koma lelo mwaakupandukila Chawuta pomwe? Tsono lelo mukamupandukila Chawuta, mangwana an'zakalipila gunyenye lentse la Izraeli.

Peno dziko lanu nilakupsipa kuti mupembeze Chawuta, yambukilani kuno kudziko la Chawuta kuna Tenti ya Chawuta, mukatole nthaka yanu pakati pathu. Imwe lekani kupandukila Chawuta panango kumpandukila ise pakubzimangila mbuto inango yakupelekela ntsembe, kunja kwambuto yakupelekela ntsembe ya Chawuta Mulungu wathu.

Ko Akani mwana wa Zera, saadataya chikhulupililo nathangwe lakutakula bzinthu bzakuyela bzikhadapelekewa kwa Chawuta? Pamwepo ukali wa Chawuta udafikila gunyenye lentse la Izraeli. Iye alibe kufa yekha nathangwe lakutaza kwake.’ ”
Pamwepo wanthu wanshowo wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yawanthu wa Manase adadayila akulu-akulu wamabanja yaa Izraeli achiti,

“Chawuta wamphamvu, Mulungu Chawuta, Chawuta wamphamvu, Mulungu Chawuta! An'dziwa, lekani Izraeli idziwe! Peno bzatidachita kukhali kupanduka panango kutaya chikhulupililo patsogolo pa Chawuta, lelo lekani kutichiza.

Koma peno kumanga kwatidachita mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe patsogolo pa Chawuta kukhali kupanduka, panango kuti tipeleke ntsembe yakutentha panango ntsembe yamphunga panango ntsembe yakuyanjana pamwepo, Chawuta pachake anfunika kutilanga.
Nee, koma ise tidabzichita, tichibva mantha kuti kutsogolo wana wanu akazati kwawana wathu, ‘Ko imwe ndimwe yani kwa Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli?

Pakuti Chawuta adayikha kamadzi ka Jorodhani kukhala malile pakati payimwe nayise, imwe wanthu wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi, mulibe chigawo kwa Chawuta.’ Nakutenepo wana wanu angazachitise kuti wana wathu azaleke kugopa Chawuta.”
Nakutenepo ise tidazati, “Ngatimange mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe, koma ikhali lini yakupelekela ntsembe zakutentha panango mpfupo,

koma izakhale mboni pakati payimwe nayise, pakati pamibadwe yathu im'bwela, kuti ise tiphatile basa Chawuta mu Tenti yake yakuyela nakupeleka ntsembe zakutentha nazakuyanjana. Pakuti wana wanu muntsiku zim'bwela an'zati kuwana wathu, ‘Mulibe chigawo mwa Chawuta.’ ”

Ise tidakumbuka kuti, wana wanu akazabzilewa kwayise panango kum'badwe wathu un'zabwela, ise tin'zati, “Wonani, chifanikizo chambuto yakupelekela ntsembe kwa Chawuta, chaadamanga makholo yathu, mpakupelekela lini mpfupo zakutentha panango ntsembe zakutentha, koma kuti chizakhale umboni pakati payimwe nayise.

Ise tingapandukile lini Chawuta, tingaleke lini kumuteyela thangwe lakuti tidamanga mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe zakutentha nantsembe zamphunga. Tingamange lini inango mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe kunja kwambuto yakupelekela ntsembe kwa Chawuta Mulungu wathu, ile ili patsogolo panyumba yakuyela.”

Finiyasi nyantsembe wa Mulungu namanduna yagunyenye, naatsogoleli wamabanja yaa Izraeli waakhanayo, adabva bzidalewedwa nawanthu wanshowo wa Rubheni na Gadhi nakati-nakati yawa Manase, ibzi bzikhali bwino m'maso mwawo.

Finiyasi mwana wa Eliyezari nyantsembe wa Mulungu adati kwawanthu wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi nakati-nakati yawa Manase, “Lelo tawona kuti Chawuta ali pakati pathu, thangwe lakuti imwe mulibe kupandukila Chawuta, koma imwe mudachiza a Izraeli kuchoka m'manja mwa Chawuta.”

Pamwepo Finiyasi mwana wa Eliyezari nyantsembe wa Mulungu namanduna yaakhanayo adabwelela kuchoka kwawanthu wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi mudziko la Giliyadhi. Adabwelela ku Kenani kwaa Izraeli achikaalongosolela bzidachitika.

Wanthu wa Izraeli paadabva bzidachitika adakondwa kwene-kwene, achilemekeza Mulungu. Alibe kuzalewa-lewa pomwe bzakuyenda kachita nawo nkhondo, nabzakukaphwanya dziko likhakhala wanthu wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi.
Nakutenepo wanthu wa Rubheni nawa Gadhi adapasa dzina mbuto yakupelekela ntsembe ile kuti Mboni, pakuti iwo adati, “Ndiyo mboni pakati payimwe nayise kuti Chawuta ni Mulungu wathu.”
Tsapano pakudapita ntsiku zizinji, Chawuta adapumuza a Izraeli kwaazondi wawo akhadaazungunuka. Nthawe imweyo Joshuwa akhadakalamba kwene-kwene.
Joshuwa adachemelesa a Izraeli wentse naakulu-akulu naatsogoleli wamabanja naatongi namanduna achiti kwayiwo, “Ine ndakula, ndakalamba kwene-kwene.
Imwe mudawona bzentse bzidachitiwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu, kumishowo yentse thangwe layimwe, pakuti Chawuta Mulungu ndiye akhakumenyelani nkhondo.
Wonani, ndidakupasani madziko yale yadasala kumishowo minango kuti ikhale nthaka yanu, pabodzi namadziko yadatolewa kale, kuchokela pa Jorodhani kufika kunyanja ikulu kun'nyulila dzuwa.
Chawuta Mulungu wanu an'zaagwinya kumambuyo patsogolo panu, achizaathamangisa pamaso panu, imwe muchizakhala mudziko lawo kuteyeza bzidalewedwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu.
Nakutenepo limbikilani kuchengeta, nakuchita bzentse bzidanembewa mubhukhu lantemo wa Mozisi. Paleke kuwoneka nee chibodzi chinkupatusani, kuyenda kujanja ladidi panango lanzele,
kuti muleke kuphatana namishowo iyi idasala pakati panu. Lekani kudoma madzina yaamilungu wawo, panango kuwalumbila, panango kuwatumikila panango kuwapemphela.
Koma imwe mamatilani pana Chawuta Mulungu wanu, ninga bzamudachita kufika lelo.
Chawuta adakuthamangisilani mishowo yamphamvu patsogolo panu, palibe adakwanisa kuyimisana nayimwe kufika lelo.
Munthu m'bodzi pakati panu ankwanisa kuthamangisa wanthu masawuzande khumi, pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wanu ndiye ankumenyelani kuteyeza kulumbila kwaadachita.
Nakutenepo imwe chenjelelani kuti mufune Chawuta Mulungu wanu kuchitila imwepo mwekha.
Koma imwe mukapanduka, muchimamatilana namishowo idasala pakati panu, muchiloolelana nawo, wana wanu achiloola wana wawo, wana wawo achiloolambo wana wanu,

mudziwiletu kuti Chawuta Mulungu wanu an'zapitiliza lini kukuthamangisilani mishowo imweyi patsogolo panu, koma iwo an'zakhala maliwa nawukhukha kwayimwe, an'zakhala nchamu unkumenyani mbali zentse, an'zakhala minga m'maso mwanu, kufikila mwentse mwamala mudziko labwino lamudapasiwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu.

“Tsapano ine ndaakuyenda nanjila iniyenda nawentse wapantsi. Mun'dziwa mwentse mumitima yanu namunzelu zanu, pabzinthu bzentse bzabwino bzikhadalumbiliwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu, palibe ne chibodzi chidagwela pantsi. Bzentse bzidachitika palibe ne chibodzi chidagwela pantsi.

Koma, ninga Chawuta Mulungu wanu kukuchitilani kwaadachita bzentse bzabwino bzaadalumbila kuzakuchitilani, Chawuta an'zakubweleselani bzakuyipa bzentse, kufikila mwachenekeka mudziko labwino lamudapasiwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu,

mukaleka kuteyeza chibvano chamudawuziwa na Chawuta Mulungu wanu, muchiyenda katumikila amilungu anango, muchiwagodamila. Pamwepo ukali wa Chawuta un'zakugakilani, muchizakulumiza kumala mudziko labwino laadakupasani.”
Joshuwa adakocheza pabodzi mishowo yentse yaa Izraeli ku Shekemu. Adachemela akulu-akulu naatsogoleli naatongi namanduna yamu Izraeli, achikayima patsogolo pa Mulungu.

Pamwepo Joshuwa adati kwawanthu wentse, “Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli wati, ‘Kholo lanu Tera nawana wake Abhurahamu na Nahori, awo kale akhakhala chakumabveladzuwa kung'ambu kwakamadzi ka Ufuratesi adatumikila anango amilungu.
Pamwepo ndidatola kholo lanu Abhurahamu kung'ambu kwakamadzi ka Ufuletesi ndichimuyendesa mudziko lentse la Kenani. Ndidachita kuti m'badwe wake ukhale uzinji kwene-kwene. Ndidampasa Isaki,
Isaki ndidamupasambo Jakobho na Esau. Esau ndidampasa dziko lamapili la Seyiri kuti likhale lake, koma Jakobho nawana wake adapolika kuyenda ku Ijipiti.
Tsapano ndidazatuma Mozisi na Aroni, ndidamenya Ijipiti nabzandidachita pakati pawo, pakumalizila ndidakuchosani.
Ndidachosa makholo yanu mu Ijipiti. Paadafika panyanja, wanthu wa Ijipiti adateyela makholo yanu nangolo zawo zankhondo nawamahachi mpaka pa Nyanja Ifuyila.

Makholo yanu yadalila kwa Chawuta, iye adayikha n'dima pakati payimwe nawanthu wa Ijipiti. Chawuta adachita kuti nyanja iwagwanile. Pomwe maso yanu yadawona bzandidachita kwawanthu wa Ijipiti. Mudakhala muchipululu kwantsiku zizinji.

Pamwepo ine ndidakubwelesani kudziko laa Amori, awo akhakhala kung'ambu kwa Jorodhani chakumabveladzuwa. Imwe pamudamenyana nawo ine ndidaayikha m'manja mwanu, muchitola dziko lawo, ndichiwacheneka patsogolo panu.
Pamwepo Bhalaki mwana wa Zipori, mambo wa Moabhi adasumuka kamenyana na Izraeli. Iye adatuma fala kwa Bhalamu mwana wa Bheyori kuti akutembeleleni.
Koma ine ndilibe kufuna kutetekela Bhalamu, ndidatochita kuti akudaliseni, nakutenepo ndidakupulumusani kuchoka m'manja mwake.

Mudazayambuka Jorodhani muchibwela ku Jeriko. An'chilo wa Jeriko pabodzi naa Amori naa Perezi naa Kenani naa Hiti naa Girigashi naa Hivi naa Jebhusi adamenyana nayimwe. Koma ine ndidakukundisani wanthu amwewa.
Tsapano ine ndidatumila malumi kumazimambo mawili yaa Amori, ndiyo yadaathamangisa patsogolo panu. Mulibe kukunda namabhemba panango utati.
Ndidakupasani dziko lamulibe kushupikila, namaguta yamulibe kumanga. Mudakhala m'mwemo, muchidya michelo yam'minda yamivayini nayam'minda yamiolive yamulibe kubzala.’ ”

Joshuwa adati, “Tsapano imwe gopani Chawuta, mumutumikile nantima wanu wentse mwakukwana mwakukhulupilika. Chosani amilungu adapembezewa namakholo yanu, kung'ambu kwakamadzi ka Ufuratesi na Ijipiti, tumikilani Chawuta basi.

Peno bzidayipa m'maso mwanu kutumikila Chawuta, lelo sankhulani wamunfuna kutumikila, panango kutumikila amilungu akhapemphelewa namakholo yanu mudziko lakung'ambu kwakamadzi ka Ufuratesi, panango amilungu waa Amori wamudziko lino lamukukhala. Koma ine nabanja langu tin'zatumikila Chawuta.”
Pamwepo wanthu adadayila, “Koma ise tingasiye lini Chawuta tichitumikila anango amilungu,

pakuti Chawuta Mulungu wathu ndiye adalombola makholo yathu muwulanda mudziko la Ijipiti, adachita bzilatizo bzatidawona namaso yathu. Adatichengeta pawulendo watidafamba nkati mwamishowo mwatikhapita namo.
Chawuta adatithamangisila mishowo yentse kuphatanizila a Amori akhakhala mudziko lino. Nayisembo pomwe tin'zatumikila Chawuta pakuti ndiye Mulungu wathu.”
Joshuwa adati kwawanthu, “Imwe mungakwanise lini kutumikila Chawuta, pakuti Mulungu niwakuyela, ni Mulungu wanchanje an'zakulekelelani lini bzakuyipa bzanu, panango kutaza kwanu.
Mukasiya Chawuta muchikatumikila anango amilungu wachilendo, iye an'zakulinzani ngoto achizakulangani, an'zakumalani, an'zakuchitilani bzakuyipa, pambuyo pakukuchitilani bzabwino.”
Wanthu adati kwa Joshuwa, “Nee! Ise tin'zatumikila Chawuta.”
Pamwepo Joshuwa adati kwayiwo, “Imwe mwabzichitila umboni mwekha kuti mwasankhula kutumikila Chawuta.”
Joshuwa adati, “Tsapano chosani amilungu wachilendo ali pakati panu, ikhani mitima yanu kwa Chawuta Mulungu wa Izraeli.”
Wanthu adati kwa Joshuwa, “Ise tin'zatumikila Chawuta Mulungu wathu, tin'zatetekela bzentse bzaan'zalewa.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adachita chibvano nawanthu ntsiku imweyo, adaapasa mitemo pa Shekemu kuti ayiteyeze.
Pamwepo Joshuwa adanemba mafalayo mubhukhu lantemo wa Mulungu, adatola mwala ukulu achiwuyikha pantsi pamuti wamuoki pambuto yakuyela ya Chawuta.

Joshuwa adati kwawanthu wentse, “Wonani, mwala uwu un'zakhala mboni pakati pathu, pakuti wabva mafala yentse yalewedwa na Chawuta kwayise, nakutenepo un'zakhala mboni yakukupasani mulandu, kuti muleke kutazila Mulungu wanu.”
Nakutenepo Joshuwa adawuza wanthu kuti abwelele kumadziko yanthaka yawo.
Pambuyo payibzi, Joshuwa mwana wa Nuni mulanda wa Chawuta, adafa wawa namagole dzana nakhumi.
Adamuyikha mudziko lanthaka yake ku Timunati-sera, mudziko lamapili la Efulemu, nachakudzulu kwaphili la Gaashi.
Wanthu wa Izraeli adapitiliza kutumikila Chawuta muntsiku zentse za Joshuwa, namuntsiku zaakulu-akulu akhadayikhiwa na Joshuwa, awo adawona mabasa yentse yadachitiliwa a Izraeli na Chawuta.

Mabondo ya Jozefi yadatakuliwa ku Ijipiti naa Izraeli yadayikhiwa ku Shekemu, muchigawo chamunda udaguliwa na Jakobho kwawana wa Hamori, apayi wa Shekemu, nabzigodo bzamasheleni dzana. Mbuto imweyo idazawa nthaka yam'badwe wa Jozefi.
Eliyezari mwana wa Aroni adafa, achimuyikha pa Gibheya, muguta lamwana wake Finiyasi, laadapasiwa mudziko lamapili la Efulemu.
Koma kukondwa kwake kuli pamitemo ya Chawuta,
Koma wanthu wakuyipa an'chita lini tenepo,
Nakutenepo wakuyipa an'zapayima lini padale lakutongewa,
Thangwe lanyi mishowo yawanthu ikupangana bzapezi-pezi?
Ndikumbile, ndikupase mishowo yawanthu kuti ikhale nthaka yako,
Koma imwe Chawuta ndimwe nchinjilizo yangu kumbuyo kwangu,
mbili yangu, ndimwe mum'bwezela wunthu wangu.
Nin'chemelela kwa Chawuta nafala langu lentse,
iye achindidayila ali paphili lake lakuyela. Selah
ampangana bzakundizungunuka m'mbali zentse achifuna kundimenya.
Pakuti imwe mum'menya azondi wangu wentse pamatama,
daliso lanu likhale pawanthu wanu. Selah.
Imwe wanthu munfika lini muchichosa ulemo wangu muchindinyoza?
“Mufika lini muchifuna mafala yapezi-pezi, muchipsaga magunkha?” Selah
Dziwani kuti Chawuta wabzipatulila wanthu wakudziwa-Mulungu,
Imwe wanthu kalipani, koma lekani kutaza,
kumbukani mumitima yanu muli pakugonela panu, mukhale chete. Selah.
Imwe mwayikha kukondwa kukulu muntima mwangu,
kuposa paankolola mphunga izinji navinyu inyowani.
pakuti imwe Chawuta ndimwe mun'chita kuti ndikhale mwakuchinjilizika.
Pakuti ndimwe lini Mulungu anfuna chakuyipa,
munfuna lini chakuyipa kukhala pamaso panu.
Nin'zagodama ndichikupembezani mu Tembele yanu iniyela,
Nathangwe labzakuyipa bzawo muwathamangise pamaso panu,
mundilape Chawuta, pakuti mabondo yangu yamala basa.
usiku wokha-wokha nintotesa pakugona pangu namisozi,
Diso langu lachita zungwe, nathangwe lakuwawa
Chokani kwayine imwe wakuphata mabasa yakuyipa!
Pakuti Chawuta wabva fala lakulila kwangu.
Azondi wangu wentse an'zanyala achizungayila kwene-kwene,
angakwachule-kwachule moyo wangu ninga bzin'chita mphondolo,
pakuti ndimwe mudatonga kuti pakhale nakulinganiza.
Nakutenepo mukocheze wanthu wentse patsogolo panu,
chitani kuti wakuyipa aleke bzakuyipa bzake,
ni Mulungu aniwonesa ukali wake nthawe zentse.
Mulungu an'noza bhemba lake, an'thamula utati wake.
achichita kuti misewe yake igake moto.
Wonani wakuyipa ankumbuka bzakuyipa, nthawe zentse
ndewo zawo zin'zakulumukila padzulu pamisolo yawo.
Nintenda imwe Chawuta nathangwe lakulungama kwanu,
nin'zayimba ndichidumbiza dzina la Chawuta, Nyakudzulu-dzulu.
nkukula tani kwawukulu wadzina lanu padziko lentse lapantsi!
Ndikanyangana kudzulu kwanu kwamudakonza nabzala bzanu,
ko munthu n'chinyi kuti mungakumbuke nabzake?
Ko mwana wamunthu mbani kuti mungamutetekele?
muchibziyikha m'manja mwake, napantsi panzayo zake,
nkukula tani kwawukulu wadzina lanu padziko lentse lapantsi!
nin'zayimba ndichidumbiza dzina lanu imwe Nyakudzulu-dzulu.
imwe muli pampando muchipeleka kutonga kwakulungama.
Imwe mudatsimula madziko, imwe mudacheneka wakuyipa,
mudathimilatu madzina yawo kufika lini nalini.
Koma Chawuta an'khala pampando wake kufika lini nalini,
Wentse an'dziwa dzina lanu an'zathemba imwe,
pakuti imwe Chawuta muntaya lini munthu ankupsagani.
Imbani muchidumbiza Chawuta an'khala mu Ziyoni,
nyanganani kudzudzika kwangu thangwe laazondi wangu!
kuti ndikawilikize mbili yanu pamisuwo yamwana wachitsikana wa Ziyoni,
mukombe waadateya minyendo yawo wokha idaphatiwa.
wacheneka wakuyipa namabasa yamanja yawo. Higayiyoni. Selah.
Pakuti wakusaya an'zaataya lini nthawe zentse,
Sumukani Chawuta! Lekani kuti munthu akunde!
Mishowo yawanthu wakuyipa ilangiwe pamaso panu.
Chitani kuti madziko yadziwe kuti niwanthu basi!
Ko mum'bzibisilanyi panthawe yatininga tina nthamu?
chitani kuti wanthu amwewo aphatiwe nabzaankumbuka kuchita.
Munthu wakuyipa am'bzidalisa nabzinfuniwa nantima wake,
Munthu wakuyipa nakubzifuna kwake, ampsaga lini Mulungu nee pang'ono pokha,
Njila zake zaanin'chita zinsumukila nthawe zentse,
ntongelo wanu uli kutali kwene-kwene nayiye,
azondi wake wentse aniwawona lini ninga chinthu.
Nkamwa mwake mudadzala nakutembelela, nakunama nakupondelela,
kuntsi kwalilimi lake kuna umaluku nakuyipa basi.
bzakabisila achimbapha wanthu alibe namilandu nayiye.
an'chita bzakubisalila ali mumbuto zawo bzin'chita mphondolo pachidzambwa.
Sumukani Chawuta! Mulungu, dzuntsani janja lanu!
achilewa mumitima mwawo kuti, “Imwe munkumbuka lini”?
Imwepo muniwona, muniwona nthamu nakushupika kwamunthu
muntakula m'manja mwanu, munthu watsoka am'bzipeleka kwayimwe,
kuchitila kuti munthu wapadziko alekeletu kugopsa anango.
pakuti wonani wakuyipa akoka kale utati wawo,
kuti alase mun'dima, wanthu wakukonkholoka muntima.
Chawuta ali mu Tembele yake iniyela,
Chawuta kudzulu ndiko kuna mpando wake.
Maso yake yaniwona, bzikope bzake bziniyesa wana wawanthu.
uyo anfuna bzandewo, n'zimu wa Chawuta un'zonda.
Am'bvumbisila wakuyipa masimbe yamoto naminyala yasalufa,
mphepo intentha ichizakhala mpfupo yankombo wawo.
Pakuti Chawuta niwakulungama anfuna mabasa yachilungamo,
wanthu wakukhulupilika achawoneka lini pakati pawana wawanthu.
Chawuta ngaagwate milomo yentse inilewa bzakunama,
yan'chita ninga siliva idatsukiwa muchipala chamoto,
Nakutenepo tin'dziwa kuti imwe Chawuta, muniwachinjiliza.
Tichengeteni kuyambila kum'badwe uwu kufika lini nalini.
ninga kukuziwa kun'chita kuyipa pakati pawanthu.
Kufika lini muchibisa nkhope yanu kwayine?
Kufika lini azondi wangu achisumusiwa pamaso pangu?
Banganusani maso yangu, pakuti ndileke kugona tulo twakufa,
pakuti azondi wangu angalewe kuti, “Ndamukunda ule,”
pakuti azondi wangu angakondwe nathangwe lakuti ndatekenyesewa.
palibe nee m'bodzi wawo an'chita bzabwino.
Chawuta ali kudzulu an'nyangana pantsi kwawana wawanthu,
kuti awone kuti panango pana munthu wanzelu,
palibe nee m'bodzi wawo an'chita bzabwino,
Wentse anidya wanthu wangu ninga ali kudya zingwa,
Ninga chipulumuso cha Izraeli chachoka ku Ziyoni,
Awo an'chitisa lini chimbadzo pamasheleni yaankweletesa,
ansaya kutambila chivalamulomo chakuti apase mulandu alibe mulandu.
Munthu ansaya kuchita ibzi antekenyesewa lini kwalini nalini.
Mulungu ndichinjilizeni, pakuti ine nimpotela mwayimwe.
Ine ninti kwa Chawuta, “Ndimwe Mfumu wangu,
Wanthu wakuyela awo ali mudziko, ana ukulu,
Nin'zapeleka lini ntsembe zakuthila gazi kwaamilungu wawo
nin'zapembeza lini amilungu wawo namilomo wangu.
Chawuta ndiye chigawo chanthaka yangu, nakhomeshi yangu
Malile yanthaka yangu yagwa mumbuto zabwino,
Nin'dalisa Chawuta pakuti animpasa nzelu zabwino,
ne panthawe yawusiku ntima wangu un'ninfundisa bzakuchita.
Ndayikha Chawuta patsogolo pangu nthawe zentse,
pakuti ali kujanja langu ladidi nintekenyesewa lini.
Pakuti munintayilila lini kumbuto yawanthu wakufa,
munilekelela lini wakukhuma muchikhupililo wanu achiyenda kawola.
Kujanja lanu ladidi kuna bzinthu bzabwino kufika lini nalini.
Ibvani pemphelo kuchokela kumilomo yakusaya kunama!
ndakumbuka kuti mulomo wangu un'zalewa lini chakuyipa.
nakutenepo teyani makutu yanu kwayine mutetekele mafala yangu.
imwe mun'chiza wentse ampotela kwayimwe kujanja lanu ladidi,
Ndichengeteni ninga kuchengeta kwamun'chita mboni yadiso lanu,
wanthu ana chigawo chawo pano padziko lapantsi.
An'dzadza mimba zawo nabzamudaachengetela pantsi pano,
Koma ine nin'zawona nkhope yanu muchilungamo,
Chawuta ndiye mphako yangu, ndiye pakuthawila pangu, ndiye animpulumusa,
nchinjilizo yangu, nyanga yachipulumuso changu, pakubisala pangu.
Nin'chemelela kwa Chawuta uyo anfunika kudumbiziwa,
Munthawe yandikhali panyathwa ndidachemelela kwa Chawuta,
ndidalila kwa Mulungu wangu kuti andithandize.
Iye adabva fala langu ali mu tembele yake,
kulila kwangu patsogolo pake kudafika m'makutu mwake.
lidatetemela lichizunguzika uku nawuku pakuti Mulungu akhadakalipa.
pantsi paminyendo yake pakhana n'dima upsipa.
Adachita n'dima kukhala chakufunika chake, chakubzigwanila nacho,
m'mitambo yakupsipa mudachoka matalala namasimbe yamoto.
Nakutenepo Chawuta adandipagali kuteyeza kulungama kwangu,
kuteyeza kuchena kwamanja yangu patsogolo pake.
Pakuti nayimwe ninkwanisa kuphwanya azondi wangu,
Mbani munango Mulungu kunja kwa Chawuta?
Mwala mbani kunja kwa Mulungu wathu?
manja yangu yankwanisa kuthamula utati wankuwa.
kupfatsa kwanu kudandichita kuti ndichite nkulu.
wanthu wadziko nin'dziwa lini alibe kunditumikila.
uyo ampeleka kukuziwa kwakukunda kwamambo wake,
kwa Dhaveti nakum'badwe wake kufika lini nalini.
Kudzulu kuli kulalikila mbili ya Mulungu,
kudzuluko kuli kuwonesa padecha basa la Mulungu.
Koma mafala yawo yanfika pantsi pentse.
Fala lawo linfika kum'malila dziko lentse,
kudzulu kumweko Mulungu adakonzela dzuwa tenti,
linibula ninga nkuwasa ali kuchoka munyumba mwake,
ninga mwamuna wamphamvu, an'thamanga njila yentse nakukondwa.
Ko mbani munthu angabvesese kutaza kwake?
Ndibwezeni ine mulanda wanu, pabzakuyipa bzanin'chita nakubzikuza,
lekani bzaninkumbuka muntima mwangu bzikhale patsogolo panu,
Lekani dzina la Mulungu wa Jakobho likusumuseni.
Lekani atume thandizo yake kuchoka kumbuto yakuyela,
tichizasumusa bandela mudzina la Mulungu wathu.
Lekani Chawuta adzadzikize mapemphelo yanu yentse!
Tsapano ndadziwa kuti Chawuta an'chiza nyakudzodzewa wake,
Anango an'dumba nangolo zankhondo anango namahachi,
koma ise tin'dumba nadzina la Chawuta Mulungu wathu.
Mumphamvu zanu Chawuta, ndimo mwaankondwa mambo,
bzaakhakumbila namulomo wake mulibe kumunyima. Selah.
muchibvadzika pansolo wake ngundu yabwino yagolidhe chayiyo,
ntsiku zizinji zakulalama kufika lini nalini.
Kulemekezeka kwake nkukulu kwene-kwene nathangwe lakukunda kwanu,
Pakuti mudapeleka madaliso yanu kufika lini nalini,
mun'chita kuti akondwe achisekelela nakuwapo kwanu.
Pakuti mambo uyo, an'themba na Chawuta,
janja lanu ladidi lin'zaphata wentse ankuzondani.
wana wawo kuchoka nkati mwawana wawanthu.
bzakuyipa bzawobzo bzaaninga apangana bzin'chitika lini.
Kuchiziwa kwangu kuli patali namafala yakubuwula kwangu.
Mulungu wangu ninilila masikati, koma munin'dayila lini;
Koma ine ndine nkhonye, ndine lini munthu;
wakunyozeka kumishowo yawanthu, pomwe wakuchepesewa nawanthu.
muchichita kuti ndithembe namasuku yaamayi wangu.
kuchokela m'mimba mwaamayi, ndimwe mukhali Mulungu wangu.
ndidayilenkoni, pakuti ndili pampaniko panyanga zanyati.
Thangwe labzamwachitabzi, nin'zakudumbizani nkati mwawanthu azinji,
bzandidalumbila nim'bzichita ndili patsogolo pawanthu ankugopani.
Mbumba zentse zamadziko zin'zagodama kumupembeza patsogolo pake.
Chadidi, kukoma kwanu nantsisi zanu bzin'zanditeyela,
dziko nawanthu wentse ali m'mwemo m'bza Chawuta.
Munthu wamanja yalibe mulandu nawantima ulibe katsa,
nachilungamo kuchoka kwa Mulungu wachipulumuso chake.
iye ndiye mambo wa Ndemela! Selah.
Kumbukani chifundo chanu nantsisi zanu, Chawuta!
Thangwe lakuti m'bzakale kuchokela lini nalini.
nakutenepo anfundisa wakuyipa njila yaanfamba nayo.
Njila zentse za Chawuta nintsisi pomwe n'zakukhulupilika,
kwaawo wentse an'chengeta chibvano chake nawufakazi wake.
wana wake an'zatola dziko kukhala nthaka yawo.
Kuyeluza kwa Chawuta kuna awo animugopa
Nthawe zentse maso yangu yali kwa Chawuta,
pakuti ndiye an'tsudzula minyendo kuchoka muwukonde.
Nyanganani azondi wangu pakuti awanda kwene-kwene,
Lekani kundilekelela ndichinyala, pakuti nimpotela kwayimwe!
Pakuti ntsisi zanu zili patsogolo pangu,
wanthu wakuyipa, nin'khala lini pabodzi nawo.
ndichiyenda kazungunuka mbuto yanu yakupelekela ntsembe, Chawuta.
Lekani kuchosa n'zimu wangu pabodzi nawakuyipa,
lekani kuchosa umoyo wangu pabodzi nawanthu wakutaya gazi,
pomwe manja yawo yadidi yadadzala nabzivalamulomo.
Mwendo wangu udayima pambuto ili thasa,
Chawuta ndiye mwenje wangu nachipulumuso changu,
Chawuta ndiye mbuto yakuthawila, yawumoyo wangu,

kuti ndiwone kukoma ntima kwa Chawuta,

Nee Chawuta ali padzulu, aniwona wapantsi;
mumpfuthula janja lanu pankwiyo waazondi wangu,
ntsisi zanu, imwe Chawuta zim'mala lini.
Ne fala likanati lawa palilimi langu,
Ko ningayende kuponi kuchoka pan'zimu wanu?
Ko ningathawile kuponi kuchoka pamaso panu?
Ndikakonza chalimba changu kumbuto yawanthu wakufa, wonani imwe muliko!
Pakuti imwe mudakonza bzidzo bzangu bzankati,
Ninkutendani pakuti malengelo yamudandichita yan'gopsa, yan'dabwisa,
Maso yanu yakhawona bzidzo bzangu bzinati bzawumbiwa,
Nkukoma tani kudachita nkhumbukila zanu kwayine, imwe Mulungu!
kuti wanthu wakutaya gazi achoke pana ine,
azondi wanu antola dzina lanu ninga chinthu chapezi-pezi!
Ko niniwazonda lini, awo ankuzondani, imwe Chawuta?
Ndinyanganisiseni, imwe Mulungu! Dziwani ntima wangu!
Wonani, peno mwayine muna njila yakuyipa!
pantsi pamilomo yawo pana ululu wachipili. Selah.
Ndikhalilizeni, imwe Chawuta, kuchoka m'manja mwawanthu wakuyipa!
teyani makutu kufala lakukumbila kwangu, imwe Chawuta!”
Imwe Chawuta Mfumu wangu, mpulumusi wangu wakulimba!
Imwe Chawuta, lekani kupasa wakuyipa bzaanfuna!
Lekani kuchita kuti bzaampangana bzisumukile! Selah.
Lekani wamulomo aleke kuzika mizi mudziko;
lekani chakuyipa chisodze munthu wandewo kuti chim'menye!
Nin'dziwa kuti Chawuta aniyimilila nkhani yawakushupika,
Nin'chemela kwayimwe Chawuta, kulumizani kubwela kwayine!
Khazikisani pemphelo langu likhale bzakununkhila pamaso panu!
Kusumusa kwanin'chita manja yangu kuchite ninga ntsembe yakumawulo!
Ikhani nkhalilizi pamulomo wangu, imwe Chawuta,
Lekani munthu wabwino andimenye, panango anditsimule, nintsisi,
lekani nsolo wangu uleke kubzilamba, nimafuta yansolo wangu;
pakuti nthawe zentse pemphelo langu nilakumenyana nabzakuyipa bzawo.
pamwepo an'zabva mafala yangu kuti yankondwelesa.
nakutenepo mabondo yathu yan'zatayiwa pamulomo wambuto yawanthu wakufa.
Koma maso yangu yali kwayimwe, imwe Chawuta Mfumu wangu;
nimpotela kwayimwe, lekani kundisiya ndilibe kuchinjilizika!
Lekani wakuyipa wentse agwele mumawukonde yawo!
fala langu kwa Chawuta, ninkumbila kukomelewa ntima.
pakuti palibe wakulungama pamaso panu, pawentse wamoyo.
wachita kuti ndikhale mun'dima ninga wanthu adafa kale.
Nakutenepo n'zimu wangu um'mala mphamvu mwayine,
ntima wangu ukubva mantha nkati mwangu.
moyo wangu unibva nyota yayimwe ninga mbuto yakuwuma. Selah.
pakuti ningakhale ninga wale aniyenda kudindi.
Nathangwe ladzina lanu, imwe Chawuta, ndimusuluzeni!
uyo aniyikha mishowo yawanthu pantsi pake.
Imwe Chawuta, ko munthu n'chinyi kuti mumudziwe,
Imwe Chawuta, kotamisani kudzulu kwanu, bulukani!
awo janja lawo ladidi, nijanja ladidi lamagunkha.
Imwe Mulungu, nin'zayimba nyimbo inyowani kwayimwe;
mun'tsudzula Dhaveti mulanda wanu kubhemba lakuyipa.
awo janja lawo ladidi, nijanja ladidi lamagunkha.
wana wathu wachikazi an'zachita ninga ntsigilo zam'magonyo,
Ali bwino awo wanthu anfikiliwa namadaliso yakutenepo!
Ali bwino wanthu, awo Chawuta ndiye Mulungu wawo!
Nin'dalisa dzina lanu kufika lini nalini.
Ndichidumbiza dzina lanu kufika lini nalini!
Chawuta ninkulu, pomwe anfunika kudumbiziwa kwene-kwene,
M'badwe un'zawilikiza mabasa yanu kum'badwe unango,
Wanthu an'zalalikila mphamvu zamabasa yanu yan'gopsa,
wakuchedwa kuchita ukali, pomwe wantsisi zikulu.
pomwe chifundo chake chili pabzentse bzaadalenga.
Mabasa yanu yentse yan'zakutendani, imwe Chawuta,
Umambo wanu niwumambo um'mala lini kufika lini nalini,
pomwe kutonga kwanu kunfika kum'badwe nam'badwe wentse.
imwe mun'khutisa kufuna kwachinthu chentse chamoyo.
Chawuta ali pafupi nawentse an'chemela kwayiye,
Mulomo wangu un'zalewa dumbizo la Chawuta,
pomwe lekani nyama yentse idalise dzina lake lakuyela, kufika lini nalini!
Mpuye wake ukachoka, am'bwelela kudongo lake,
Ali bwino uyo thandizo lake ni Mulungu wa Jakobho,
uyo nyanganilo yake ni Chawuta Mulungu wake;
Mulungu wako, iwe Ziyoni, kum'badwe nam'badwe.
Mfumu wathu ninkulu, pomwe ana mphamvu zizinji;
an'chita kuti chonzi chake chikukume, madzi yachiyelela.
malango yake namitemo yake kwa Izraeli.
Pomwe imwe madzi yali padzulu pakudzulu!
ndemela yake ili padzulu padziko nakudzulu.
kwawana wa Izraeli, wanthu pafupi naye.
Lekani wana wa Ziyoni asekelele mwamambo wawo!
lekani ayimbe achisekelela ali paachalimba pawo!
